ESP.ORIGINAL: What's Going On?
ESP.TRADUIT: 发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Garza,
Where the fuck is Marko? We're getting picked apart by goddamn bounty hunters and he's off hiding in the fucking hills like some hermit. We gotta get organized, or pretty soon Randall and his gunmen are going to hunt us all down like animals.
How fucked up is this? He tells us to "Stay put" and then disappears without a word. I'm not saying we should go against his instructions, but I don't like sitting around and waiting to have my finger chopped off. We've got to take the fight to the bounty hunters at some point. I'll keep in touch.
- Ingram
ESP.TRADUIT:
加尔萨，
马尔科那鸡巴他妈的跑到哪里去了? 我们被那该死的赏金猎人隔离开了，而他像隐士一样躲在那傻逼山林中。我们必须赶快组织起来，不然兰道尔和他的枪手们会马上像秋季狩猎动物一样狩猎我们。
这他妈是怎么搞的？他叫我们“呆在原地不要走动”（我去买个橘子），然后就一言不发地消失了。我不是说我们应该违背他的指示，但老子可不喜欢坐在那里等我的手指被一根一根砍掉。我们必须在某个时候和那个傻逼赏金猎人交手。我会保持联系的。
- 英格拉姆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Payday, Bitch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 发财日，我操！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Saul,
Fucking outfit put out a fat bounty on &PCName;! 10,000 caps! Fuck, we could buy our way into the strip, get enough jet for a year, or anything we want.
This &PCName; is some kind of killer, so we need to round everyone up. We'll keep lookouts and jump this fucker near the strip.
10,000 caps! We're gonna be fucking rich!
-Dex
ESP.TRADUIT:
索尔，
狗日的机构用一大笔钱悬赏&PCName;！10,000瓶盖！我操，这可以让我们在罪恶城大花特花一年，或者买下我们想要的任何东西。
那个&PCName; 是个杀手，所以我们要召集所有人。我们可以再者蹲点，然后将那个蠢蛋转移到罪恶城附近。
10,000瓶盖！ 我们他妈的就要发财啦！
-迪克斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Off To Utah
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往犹他的路上

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Dear &PCName;,
It's me, Randall.
I'm sorry it took so long to contact you. For a while I wanted to be sure you weren't in on my assassination attempt, but I've ruled that out. Besides, everyone has heard of how you smoked Sergio in that street. It made me proud to hear that you were still hunting down those bastards.
In case you're wondering, I'm in fair health, all things considered. I'm glad you plugged Sugar, but deep down I'd give anything for a shot at that motherfucker for what he did to me. To make a long story short, I've been buried, irradiated, tortured, enslaved, and ghoulified... that's right, I'm a goddamn zombie now.
There's a lot to explain, but I'm short on time. I'll leave you with this - I'm up in Utah, trailing a lead on Marko. I might not have much time left on this shithole planet, but I'll spend every last minute making sure he faces justice. I suspect he's holed up in an outlaw town way up in the mountains, a place called Frosthilll. It will take some planning and firepower to clean that place out, so I'll send for you when the time is right.
Your Friend, Steven Randall
ESP.TRADUIT:
亲爱的&PCName;,
是我，兰道尔。
我很抱歉，隔了这么久才联系你。之前我一直担心你被卷入刺杀我的行动，都是我把一切搞得那么糟。此外，现在到处都有人在讨论，你把塞尔吉奥打得冒烟的故事。你能继续追踪那些可恶的混蛋，我为你感到自豪。
你不要为我担心，我现在一切都好，一切正常。我很高兴你把“糖”干掉了，但一想到那天他对我做的一切，如果能给我机会的话，我愿意不惜一切代价亲手让那个混蛋脑袋开花。长话短说，我后来被他埋了，受到辐射，遭受折磨，身体发生变化......然后就变成食尸鬼了。恩，我现在就是个僵尸。
要跟你说的东西太多了，我现在可能还没这个功夫。我要告诉你的是--我现在正在前往犹他的路上，追踪一条导向马尔科的线索。我能活着见到他的时间可能不多了，但即使只剩下最后一秒，我也要让他接受法律的制裁。我觉得他目前可能在一个叫冰霜山岭的地方，那是一个与外界隔离的小镇。要清理那里可不容易，所以时机合适的时候我会和你联系。我觉得现在是开启审判者之章的时候了，正义与法律现在需要我们。
你的朋友, 斯蒂文.兰道尔

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry For Your Loss
ESP.TRADUIT: 为你的损失默哀

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Dixon,
One of my lieutenants informed me that you were seeking information on the untimely death of your teenage son. With your permission, I allowed one of our physicians to perform a private autopsy.
The results are disturbing, though they confirm your suspicions. Your son did not succumb to an overdose, but was deliberately poisoned in what I suspect is a systematic campaign by the NCR to kill hapless addicts and the homeless.
Compelled to act, I ordered a thorough investigation of the rehab clinic near Westside. It seems that &PCName; is responsible for this merciless scheme. Unfortunately, the NCR doesn't have the inclination or power to prosecute &PCName;. Until someone takes action, I'm afraid more people will suffer.
I hope these facts put your mind at ease. To lose a child, barely fifteen years old - I cannot imagine. You are in my prayers.
Sincerely, K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
迪克森先生，
我的助手告诉我，你要寻找的儿子已经英年早逝。我让我的一个医生进行了私人的尸体解剖。
结果令人很不安，尽管他们认为你会怀疑。你的儿子不是死于服药过量，而是死于一场来自NCR的有预谋的投毒事件，他们的目的是杀死倒霉的毒瘾者和无家可归的人。
必须要采取行动，我已经下令对康复诊所进行一次彻底的检查。看起来&PCName;要对这个残忍的计划负责。不幸的是，NCR没有权利向&PCName;起诉。除非有人采取行动，否则将有更多的人受害。
我希望这些事实能让你感到舒服一点。失去一个不到15岁的孩子 - 我简直无法想象。我为你祈祷。
真诚地， K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Is It
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
When the nuke hit the surface nearby, I thought we had bought it. The cave-ins only got a few of us, but the reactor... something happened to it. The engineers didn't say anything, they just sealed off the entire level to non-essentials. I knew it was all wrong.
All this time, I thought it would be something outside, breaking in, overwhelming us.
I never imagined it would come from within. There are too many now. Elphinstone said it would be safe, that the meltdown was under control.
I don't want to die like the others. I told Sally and Jeff to go to bed and ignore the screams downstairs. I promised them it would be over soon.
I'm holding her now, looking into those baby blues. I don't know why I'm writing this. After the last ten minutes, I've got it coming. I can hear them scratching the door. The screams never stop.
This is it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
当核弹击中了地表的时候，我以为我们玩了。虽然我们只有少数地方塌方了，但是反应堆...出了点故障。工程师什么都没说，他们只是封住了整个楼层。我知道这是错误的。
一直以来，我以为外面会发生什么，会闯进来，然后淹没我们。
我从未想过会是内部出问题。就在此时此刻。埃尔芬斯通说灾难处于控制之下，我们很安全。
我不想像其他人那样死去。我让莎莉和杰夫去睡觉，不要管楼下的尖叫。我向他们承诺事情很快就会结束。
我现在抱着她，深深凝望着她蓝色的眼睛。我不知道我为什么写下这些。十分钟后，我知道一切将会结束。我能听到他们在门外的尖叫。尖叫从未停止。
就这样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terrorists Routed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 溃败的恐怖分子！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR officials confirmed that &PCName; has accomplished another daring act in the tireless pursuit of justice and philanthropy. Recently the plucky bounty hunter confronted the devilish, inbred rogues comprising the Kelly Gang, a terror squad committed to sowing havoc at every opportunity. Despite repeated offers for the terrorists to surrender in peace and accept a plea bargain, "Red Kelly" and his heathen relatives would have nothing of it. "They were a bunch of bloodthirsty bastards," said Fred Pharcas, medic, "And the Mojave is a better place without them. Every loyal citizen of the NCR is glad to see them dead."
Disgruntled by a petty land dispute, the irascible Kelly family took to banditry and murder as a means of protesting the NCR's presence in the Mojave. "It was nothing, as I recall," said Richard Sibelius, brahmin herder, "And they got butthurt real quick, then turned to murdering anybody with an NCR patch on them. I could tell from the start they was freaks."
Recently members of the Third Church of the Desert conducted a prayer service in honor of &PCName;. "&PCName; will lead us to the higher plane, so we pray for this sacred instrument of justice," said Heather Glenn, priestess, "And in time we may cleanse this land of taint and wickedness!"
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方证实&PCName;又完成一项艰巨而勇敢的任务，正义和仁爱有一次得到弘扬。最近，这为英勇的赏金猎人单枪匹马干掉凯利帮。这是个恐怖主义团伙，他们在这片和平的土地上到处制造创伤。在要求他们和平投降的提议被拒绝后，莱德.凯莉和他的人终于收到了英雄的制裁。“他们就是一群嗜血的混蛋，”军医弗雷德.哈卡斯说“莫哈维如果没有他们会变得更好。每一个莫哈维正值的公民都会对他们的死感到高兴。”
由于陷入与NCR的土地纠纷，凯莉家族将对NCR的仇恨撒播到整个莫哈维。“我记得完全是他们的问题，”双头牛放牧人理查德.西贝里斯说，“简直就是无理取闹，他们后来以向NCR复仇的名义骚扰在这一片所有的莫哈维公民。从一开始他们就疯了。”
最近，沙漠第三教堂的成员聚集在一起为&PCName;唱赞颂诗-- “&PCName;会带领我们走向新生活的曙光。我们为他祈祷，我们为正义欢呼，”海瑟.格伦神父说，“只有他才能帮助我们在这里建立起以一片神圣的乐土。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: &PCName; Slaughters Helpless Addicts!
ESP.TRADUIT: &PCName;屠杀手无寸铁的毒瘾者！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
In recent times, the Mojave has transformed from an idyllic haven for placid tribals into a burgeoning hub of avarice, bloated with greedy outsiders that have exploited its underclass for their monetary gain. Amidst this gross disparity in class and wealth, many of the poor and downtrodden have turned to drugs in an effort to blot out their despair and misery.
Instead of properly addressing the needs of its most vulnerable citizens, the NCR has dubbed this ilk of hapless addicts "Fiends", and built a stupendous myth of criminality and bestial aggression around these desperate souls.
Normally, hateful slander and reductionist appellations would suffice for the NCR's slimy bureaucrats, but not in the Mojave. Here they call upon &PCName;, the bane of the Mojave's underclass! With gelid nerves and a black heart, this so-called bounty hunter preys on New Vegas' underprivileged, underfed, and unwanted.
In recent months these "Fiends" managed to rally around a handful of charismatic leaders who energized their ranks, and stoked the flames of revolution, only to be snuffed out by that plutocratic tool, &PCName;. Most recently the "Fiends" arranged a conference with &PCName; at Zapp's Neon Sign in order to promote an exchange of ideas and possibly cement a peaceful understanding.
Sources indicate that &PCName; abruptly rejected any notion of discussion, and instead elected to shoot and bludgeon the defenseless addicts at will. Their stalwart leader, "Lobo", attempted a desperate defense in order to shield several small children who had fallen under &PCName;'s merciless blade, but to no avail. Over a dozen individuals were slain, including three children.
A witness reported &PCName; could be heard shouting, "I'm gonna kill you, puppies!" and "Barbacoa is delicious!" repeatedly. This is a dark day indeed for New Vegas' honest citizens.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
最近一段时间，莫哈维已经从一个平静的天堂变成一个混乱的中心。各种外来者蜂拥一般涌入这个地区，不仅造成社会动荡，而且几乎且灭了人们对平静生活的渴望。于是，大量的人开始靠吸食毒品，试图找回藏匿于内心深处的净土乐园。
然而NCR不仅没有对当前社会动乱采取任何措施改进，反而采取以暴制暴的方法，在称呼那些人为“暴民 恶魔帮”的同时，派遣部队血腥镇压这些绝望的灵魂。
通常，民众的强烈反应都会对当局造成压力，但可惜这里莫哈维，他们找来了&PCName;，这个莫哈维真正的恶魔！这个有着一副冷峻面孔和冰冷内心的赏金猎人令整个莫哈维的民间社会动荡不已。
最近一段时间，这群“恶魔帮”的人中间出现了几位极具魅力和远见的领导人。他们点燃了复兴的星星之火，相信凭他们的努力可以燎原。他们邀请&PCName;到乍普的霓虹灯工厂会面，计划相互交换意见以达成和平共处的共识。
但有消息说，&PCName;粗鲁地拒绝了他们的提议，相反在现场对那些手无寸铁的人展开了一场屠杀。所有的人都倒下了，包括他们杰出的领袖“洛勃”，为了保护几名无助的孩子而惨死在&PCName;的刀下。最终，死者共计数十人，包括3个孩子。
有目击者报告，听到&PCName;的大声喊叫，“我要杀死你，你这只狗！”以及“蠢货，你的血还不够擦我的鞋！”这是莫哈维最黑暗的一天，足以载入史册。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ranger Avenged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 游骑兵的复仇！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials confirmed that &PCName; successfully terminated Elza "Grandma" Burns, head of the Burns clan and the chief conspirator behind the brutal murder of Captain Gary Winstone and his family. "Some people operate beyond the confines of civilization and common morality, so extraordinary measures are necessary to effect justice. We're proud to report that &PCName; was able to collect the bounty on both Jake Burns and Grandma Burns," said Captain Larry Scull, Commander of the Boulder City Jail Detachment.
We should take heart in the relentless pursuit of justice by &PCName;, as well as the probity, courage, and leadership that mark this bounty hunter's every deed. The NCR needs more people like &PCName;, who elect to follow a path rife with obstacles, personal hazard, and endless sacrifice. Perhaps this bounty hunter will eventually move into the field of politics - &PCName; can certainly count on the Coyote Courier's endorsement.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方证实，&PCName;成功剿灭艾尔扎“祖母”。她是彭斯家族的族长，加里·温斯顿上尉一家惨案的缔造者。“有些人把法律当儿戏，把当局不放在眼里，任由自己的行为对社会文明秩序造成严重冲击。我们现在很自豪地向大家报告，&PCName;已经肃清了这帮捣乱分子。”巨石城监狱的负责人--拉里.斯科尔上尉说。
我们要用心牢记&PCName;对正义孜孜不倦的追寻，以及他的正值，勇气和独有的领导才能。NCR需要更多像&PCName;这样勇于自我奉献，勇于自我牺牲的人。这个杰出的赏金猎人将来有一天一定能步入政界，不过请他记住来我们自山狼快递的赞美之词。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR Targets the Elderly!
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR的目标居然是老人！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate &PCName; recently killed the geriatric matriarch of the Burns family in a raid on the clan's private distillery. NCR Officials declined to comment on the incident, deigning only to state that the Burns were suspected of running an illegal bootlegging operation, and that &PCName; used "Reciprocal Force". Given &PCName;'s track record, this claim is specious at best.
Saul Burns, husband to the murdered Elza Burns, said, "That pig didn't even give my darling a chance. He just up and killed her along with the rest of them. All this bloodshed is gonna come back and bite that bounty hunter in the ass. Mark my words." NCR officials refused to comment on the Burns' lawsuit against the state.
This marks a new low for the NCR and its chief cutthroat, &PCName;. Is the republic so desperate that it must outsource the targeted killing of old ladies? I sincerely hope the Burns' civil suit finds traction in court, and that the officials responsible are ultimately forced to answer for this gross malfeasance.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出&PCName;最近参与了一起针对彭斯家族族长的谋杀。NCR官方拒绝就此评论，只是不断强调彭斯家族正在从事某些违法经营活动，而&PCName;据此采取了“适当的措施”。根据&PCName;以往的行动记录，我对此表示非常怀疑。
萨尔·彭斯，被谋杀的艾尔扎·彭斯的丈夫，说：“那头猪根本就没有给她任何解释的机会。一个软弱的女性就这样残忍地死在他手里。屋子里到处都是鲜血的痕迹。”NCR官方对这番话依然沉默无声。
这是否说明了NCR理屈词穷？难道我们的共和体连这样一个可怜的老人都不放过？让我们大声问问&PCName;，你到底还有没有良心？我真诚地希望他们中能有任何一方勇敢地站出来，给生者一个交代，好让死者放心远去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR Hiring Assassins!
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR正在招募刺客！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
An unnamed source recently reported the NCR is actively recruiting assassins to perform state-sanctioned murder, a troubling development. Ostensibly the Boulder City Jail will license random ruffians of the wasteland to perform the duties of the state, with no regard for their background or affiliation. "I don't give two shits who they are, so long as they get the job done," said Captain Larry Scull, commander of the Boulder City Jail Detachment.
It's true that the Mojave is seated on the frontier, and that most of our resources are devoted to the looming contest with Caesar's Legion, but it should stand as no excuse for reliance on solo contractors. It bespeaks the state's corruption and desperation when it legitimizes the use of profiteering picaroons who affectionately dub themselves "Bounty Hunters". They are an ilk comprised entirely of reptilian killers and grasping brutes, not to be trusted in the least.
I vehemently implore our leaders to reconsider this short-sighted stance. We shoulder the responsibility of restoring law, order, and due process; utilizing murder will only serve to undermine our legitimacy in this effort.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有一位匿名消息人士说，NCR最近正在招募需要追踪某些重要罪犯的刺客。表面上巨石城监狱有一套严格执照申请流程，但事实上对于申请者的背景他们几乎完全不考虑。拉里.斯科尔上尉，巨石城监狱的负责人，这样说到：“我才不管他们是谁，从哪来，我只要他们能完成任务就行。”
莫哈维坐落于外围边境，我们大部分的精力都浪费在与军团抢夺资源上，但这不是我们的法律系统寻求外部独立个体支援的理由。这个政府正在腐败，绝望，不遗余力地依靠一帮以金钱为最终目标的自称“赏金猎人”的一帮人维护社会安全。他们其实就是一群残酷的杀手、贪婪的畜生。
我强烈恳求我们的当局放弃这种无知而短视的做法。我们应该靠自己承担起弘扬法律和秩序的职责。如果再这样继续下去，我们就会毁了我们自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Political Dissident Assassinated!
ESP.TRADUIT: 异议政见者被暗杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate the NCR's head bounty hunter, &PCName;, recently assassinated Jacob Powers, head of the Ghoul Liberation Army, a centre-left organization dedicated to protecting the civil rights of ghouls through nonviolent means. "Jacob Powers is a hero to ghouls everyone. He will be remembered as a hero and a martyr," said Nathaniel Keller, a ghoul merchant.
NCR Officials had accused the GLA of unorthodox recruitment methods, and utilized the spurious charges to legitimize their efforts to snuff out Powers' strident dissent. "He never hurt anyone," said Mary Lang, ghoul, "And this goes to show how the NCR really views its ghoul population. It makes me wonder if we'd be better off on our own, away from human bigotry."
In addition to wanton vigilantism, &PCName; can now add political terrorism to the list of offenses. As we approach the centennial of our fair republic, we should reflect on some of its founding principles: liberty, equality, and opportunity. I believe that President Tandi would shudder at the widespread use of mercenaries and assassins to subjugate the Mojave. Our leaders should be ashamed.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出，NCR的头号赏金猎人&PCName;最近暗杀了雅各布.鲍尔。鲍尔是食尸鬼解放联盟的领袖，这个组织意在以非暴力和平方式争取整个莫哈维地区食尸鬼的公民权利。“雅各布.鲍尔斯是每一个食尸鬼的英雄，他是一名烈士，他是一个传奇。”食尸鬼商人纳撒尼尔.凯勒说。
NCR官方指责GLA的招募士兵行为，称这对地区的和平安全造成严重损害。“他从来不伤害任何人，”食尸鬼玛丽.朗说，“这彻底揭露NCR对食尸鬼群体的态度。这让我怀疑我们是否还有必要和人类生活在一个屋檐下。”
除了威胁社会治安，&PCName;现在又开始涉嫌政治恐怖主义。随着我们纪念共和国百年庆典的到来，我们应该回顾当初我们成立的基石：自由、平等、机会。我相信我们的丹迪总统会为目前在莫哈维横行的暗杀行为和拜金主义战栗的。我们的领导人应该为此感到羞耻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pinko Zombies Eliminated!
ESP.TRADUIT: 左倾分子被歼灭！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials recently confirmed that the Mojave's sterling champion, &PCName;, managed to kill Jacob Powers, a known kidnapper, murderer, and communist. For years Powers had overseen the kidnapping and ghoulification of defenseless humans from across the Mojave.
Based in an underground compound beneath the old test site, Powers was protected by an army of feral ghouls and heavily-armed militants. Braving heavy radiation and hordes of ferocious zombies, &PCName; successfully infiltrated Powers' compound and terminated the foul terrorist. "This was a remarkable operation - no other bounty hunters considered Jacob Powers to be a feasible target. I should've learned by now not to underestimate &PCName;," said Captain Larry Scull, Commander of the Boulder City Jail Detachment.
Powers' organization was responsible for over thirty kidnappings; most of the victims were children. Ghoul and human alike were pleased to learn of his death, as Stephanie Hicks, ghoul, said, "I hope humans understand that Powers was not indicative of ghouls in general. He was a hateful fanatic, and all right-minded ghouls are glad to see him go."
The Coyote Courier would again like to challenge NCR officials to augment &PCName;'s compensation for the hazardous work and personal sacrifice required to bring such nefarious outlaws to justice. If the NCR can afford the assortment of pusillanimous plutocrats that litter its territories, certainly it can properly reward a valiant soul like &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方最近证实，莫哈维的守护神&PCName;已经成功杀死集绑架、谋杀、密谋叛乱于一身的雅各布.鲍尔。这些年鲍尔从莫哈维绑架了大量毫无防御力的平民，并将他们人工转化为食尸鬼。
鲍尔把基地建立在一个旧核试验测试中心的地下，那里武装着大量食尸鬼。迎着严重的核辐射危险和大量武装部队的迎面痛击，&PCName;成功侵入到鲍尔基地内部，将那里所有的恐怖分子扫荡一空。“这真是一件壮举！没有任何人能比得上&PCName;，而我也学到了不要轻易低估任何一个人的实力。”巨石城监狱的长官，拉里.斯科尔上尉说。
鲍尔的组织要为超过30起绑架案负责，其中大部分受害者都是儿童。不论是食尸鬼还是普通平民都为他的落网感到高兴，正如一个食尸鬼斯蒂芬妮.希克斯说的，“我希望人们相信，鲍尔并不能代表我们这一类所有人的意志。他不过是个妄想狂徒，所有心智正常的食尸鬼都希望他早点死。”
山狼快递处依然要向NCR官方挑战他们对&PCName;的补充，就这么一点奖赏是远远不够弥补&PCName;为了完成任务所要冒的风险的，更何况遭受大量核辐射还会对&PCName;的身体产生严重影响。我们强烈要求NCR官方正面回复我们的质疑。现在在莫哈维，还有谁能质疑&PCName;为我们所有人做出的贡献呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Family Slaughtered!
ESP.TRADUIT: 家族的覆灭！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate &PCName; recently killed "Red Kelly" and the entirety of the Kelly family in a serpentine ambush near Spring Mountain Ranch State Park. The slain include five unarmed adults, two infants, and a helpless puppy. NCR officials declined to comment, and ostensibly no charges will be filed against &PCName;, who has once again flouted justice with these monstrous acts.
The Kelly family had subsisted in the wilderness in recent months, forced out of their home by the avarice of politicians. Fearing for their lives, the Kelly family spent most of their existence underground, only venturing out to scavenge supplies and gather food. By all accounts they were harmless. "They never hurt nobody," said Gary Straight, prospector, "And the damn government just kept shitting all over them, just like the rest of us. Goddamn taxes and bureaucrats. Maybe Caesar should take over!"
Suspected of committing misdemeanor robbery and vandalism, the Kelly family soon found themselves in the sights of &PCName;, who capitalized on the opportunity to supplant an ever-growing body count of innocents. "That bounty hunter just stomped that baby to death, then fed it to coyotes," said Bart Thompson, merchant, "And it just made me want to vomit. Of course, I didn't say nothing cause &PCName; would sure as slit my throat if I did!"
The NCR now has the blood of the Kelly family on its hands, thanks to the ongoing support for misanthropic animals like &PCName;. After due research I unearthed a quote from a tribal chieftain of the old world, Thomas Roosevelt, who said, "For a people who are free, and who mean to remain so, a well-organized and armed lunatic fringe, enthroned an invisible government owing no allegiance and acknowledging no responsibility to the people is required." We should bear this in mind when considering the actions of &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出，&PCName;最近在春泉山农场国家公园屠杀了“莱德.凯莉”和他整个家族。受害者包括5名成年人、两给小孩和一只可爱的小狗。NCR官方拒绝就此评论，看起来&PCName;不会受到任何指控，他又一次成功地逃脱了法律的制裁。
凯莉一家最近几个月一直在荒野求生，他们之前因为一些政治家的贪婪被赶出了自己的家园。为了坚强地生存，他们被迫活在地下，只是偶尔出来寻找一些补给和食物。种种迹象表明，他们完全是无辜的平民。“他们从来不伤害任何人。”探险家加里.斯威特说，“可恶的政府相对野狗一样对待他们，我们也是。可恶的税收和愚蠢的官僚，要是凯撒能接管这里该多好！”
由于涉嫌小型抢劫和艺术品破坏，凯莉一家被&PCName;盯上。“那个赏金猎人只会把小孩摔在地上，然后扔去喂野狼。”商人巴特.汤姆森说，“他的行为让我感到恶心。我永远也不想再提起这个让我倒胃口的名字！”
现在NCR的手上沾满了凯莉一家的鲜血，这完全是由于那个反人类的野兽&PCName;造成的。在经过一番调查，我找到了一位来自旧世界的部落首领，托马斯.罗斯福，他说：“水能载舟，亦能覆舟。”我们要牢记他的格言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall & Associates - Now Hiring!
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔同盟会

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Randall & Associates is accepting applications for the following positions: - Bounty Hunter
Job Description: Pursue high-risk bounties on behalf of various clients, utilizing any and all means to apprehend and/or terminate contracted targets.
Job Requirements: - Should have experience with firearms, explosives, or energy weapons - Must be organized and self-sufficient - Interpersonal ability is helpful, but not essential - Unarmed or Melee skills a plus - Moral Flexibility preferred
Pay/Benefits: - Work at your own pace, on your own schedule - The initial contract is 125 caps. Proven effectiveness will lead to more lucrative payments. - Potential rewards include a custom revolver and duster
To apply, see Steven Randall at the offices of Randall & Associates.
DISCLAIMER: Randall & Associates is not responsible for injuries and/or death incurred while pursuing said contracts. Randall & Associates is an equal opportunity employer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
“兰道尔同盟会”正在接收以下职位申请： - 赏金猎人
职位描述： 代表不同客户追踪具有高风险的目标，允许使用各种方法逮捕并、或击毙目标。
职位要求： - 需要对各种枪械、爆炸装置、能量武器有丰富经验 - 要绝对自律，能独立完成任务 - 人际交往能力可以为你加分，但不是必须 - 拳击或近战略知一二 - 品行端正的尤佳
支付/回报： - 遵循你自己的时间表，按自己制定的步骤完成任务 - 第一份合同250个瓶盖。如果能证明自己的能力，以后的回报会更丰富 - 潜在的奖励包括一把自定左轮和一根鸡毛掸子
想要申请，到“兰道尔同伙会”办公室会见斯蒂夫.兰道尔
声明： “兰道尔同伙会”对在执行任务过程中对执行人本身可能发生的一切后果受伤，或是死亡不承担任何责任。“兰道尔同伙会”向任何人提供机会均等的工作选择。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Organized Crime Purged!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有组织犯罪被清除！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
While the disease of crime has long plagued New Vegas, it was only recently that organized mobsters made serious inroads into our fair metropolis. Led by a malign, illiterate maniac known only as "Zimmer" a collection of well-dressed thugs began squeezing local residents and businesses through intimidation and deliberate, systematic extortion.
With no assistance offered by feckless NCR officials, residents were nearly resigned to neverending subserviance to criminals until &PCName; once again intervened and delivered swift, impartial justice to the offending party. Though bitterly resisted by throngs of murderous gunmen, &PCName; rapidly rooted out the rascals behind New Vegas' woes. After an exhaustive, bloody campaign, the intrepid Courier finally faced off with the rabid madman, Zimmer. Though &PCName; made every effort to render a peaceful resolution, Zimmer's ambition and bloodlust could only be undone in a quick, merciful death.
Soon thereafter &PCName; uncovered the gangsters' ill-gotten spoils, which even included an extensive store of Enclave bullion. In a gracious, philanthropic gesture, &PCName; stated that this wealth would be re-distributed to the poorest citizens of our city, particularly in the form of non-profit welfare programs spearheaded by the Followers of the Apocalypse. Let us hope that our leaders will begin to emulate the bold, just spirit and deeds of &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
虽然犯罪问题长期困扰着新维加斯，但直到最近，有组织的暴徒才开始大规模入侵我们这个美丽的大都市。在一个名叫“齐默”的邪恶文盲疯子的领导下，一群衣着考究的暴徒开始通过恐吓和蓄意的系统勒索来压榨当地居民和企业。
没有负责任的NCR官员提供帮助，居民们被迫几乎永远臣服于罪犯，直到&PCName;再次介入并迅速、公正地审判了违规方。尽管遭到了成群凶残的持枪歹徒的顽强抵抗，他仍然迅速铲除了新维加斯灾难背后的流氓。经过一场穷途末路、血雨腥风的战役，无畏的邮差终于与狂暴的疯子齐默狭路相逢。尽管&PCName竭尽全力想要和平解决问题，但齐默的野心和嗜血欲望只能在迅速而仁慈的死亡中化为乌有。
不久之后&PCName;发现了匪徒的不义之财，其中甚至包括大量英克雷金条。以亲切、博爱的姿态，&PCName;将这些财富重新分配给我们城市最贫穷的公民，特别是以“天启追随者”牵头的非营利性福利项目的形式。让我们希望，我们的领导人将开始效仿&PCName;的勇敢、公正的精神和行为。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gold Cache Stolen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 金库被盗！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Unsated by the bloody profiteering enjoyed as a bounty killer, the venal villain known as &PCName; has now begun a career as a murderous treasure hunter. Accounts indicate this grasping gold digger unscrupulously acquired leads on a trove of Enclave bullion. Sources tell the Coyote Courier that &PCName; exchanged sex acts in order to attain keys to select bunkers that retained the treasure.
Incapable or unwilling to brave the hazards of long-abandoned Enclave facilities alone, &PCName; apparently relied on a lone militiaman from Westside to lead their party. "The only reason &PCName; got Bradley to help was by sucking his cock," said Bobby Batts, a Freeside entrepreneur.
After scouring a number of empty sites, the disgraceful duo finally uncovered the Enclave stores in a shelter directly under the ruins of old Las Vegas. Though the gold was by all rights the property of the NCR, &PCName; flouted legal precedent and common decency without hesitation, claiming the stores in their entirety. Furthermore, when the kind, elderly guide inquired into earning a meager portion of the spoils, &PCName; casually gunned him down, leaving his corpse to fester in the bowels of an old war tomb.
Sources indicate &PCName; is now bent on hoarding this newfound wealth, having refused all requests for charity. Let us hope that some brave soul has the moral courage and intenstinal fortitude to finally face down &PCName; and bring the renegade to justice.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
不满足于血腥的暴利享受作为赏金杀手，贪得无厌的恶棍被称为&PCName;已经开始了杀人寻宝的职业生涯。资料显示这个贪婪的淘金者不择手段地获取了英克雷黄金的线索。消息人士透露野狼邮差&PCName;通过交换性行为，以获得掩体保存宝藏的钥匙。
无法或不愿独自面对长期废弃的英克雷设施带来的危险;他们依靠一个西区民兵来领导他们的组织。“&PCName;让布拉德利帮忙的唯一原因就是给他口交，”西区的企业家鲍比·巴茨(Bobby Batts)说。
在搜索了一些空的地点后，这对可耻的二人组最终在拉斯维加斯废墟下的避难所中发现了英克雷的战利品。尽管黄金所有权应该归NCR， &PCName;毫不犹豫地藐视法律先例和一般礼仪，拿走了所有的战利品。此外，当这位善良的年长导游询问要不要从这些战利品中分一点时，&PCName;迅速开枪打死了他，让他的尸体在一个旧战争坟墓里溃烂。
&PCName;表明，现在正致力于囤积这些新发现的财富，拒绝了所有的慈善请求。让我们希望一些勇敢的灵魂有道德的勇气和内在的刚毅之士，最终能将&PCName;这个叛徒绳之以法。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Khan Activist Slain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮激进主义者被杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources indicate &PCName; recently killed "The Mongol Kid", leader of The Mongols, a Khan activist organization. The insensate bounty hunter resisted the kid's pleas for mercy, and instead executed the hapless youth. "The kid might have been a punk, but he didn't deserve that," said an unnamed source within the Khans.
Of course, the NCR is mum about the actions of &PCName;, who continues to flout the boundaries of law and morality for personal profit. It's a repulsive state of affairs when our leaders are utterly insouciant about utilizing such dregs in the name of justice. I call upon our elected officials to put a halt to this practice, and bring fitting charges against &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
有消息指出&PCName;最近杀了蒙格尔.基德，他是蒙格尔帮的首领。这个没有丝毫怜悯心的赏金猎人拒绝了基德宽恕的请求，无情地结束了他可怜的生命。“尽管基德不是一个好人，但他不该遭受如此的下场。”一位来自大汗帮的匿名人士说。
当然，现在的NCR就是&PCName;前的一道屏障，尽管这个家伙的所作所为都是为了个人利益，但任何对他的指责都动摇不了NCR对他的支持。我强烈呼吁，现在是到了我们重新审视当前态势的时候了，有关当局应立刻停止这种百无利而存弊的做法，针对&PCName;之前犯下的所有有关罪行提起诉讼。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Barbarian Slain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 野蛮人被大屠杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials stated that &PCName; recently terminated the outlaw known as "The Mongol Kid", a known felon wanted on charges of kidnapping and murder. "Freak was too big. Cut his head off," said an anonymous NCR ranger.
The Mongol Kid developed a reputation as a fearsome kidnapper prone to kill his victims regardless of ransom payment, and as such was ejected from the Khans. Consequently the kid formed a radical group called "The Mongols" which targeted NCR citizens.
While the precise circumstances surrounding the Mongol Kid's death are unknown, sources indicate he obstinately resisted offers to surrender, and remained bent on a violent death, which &PCName; grudgingly provided.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
NCR官方宣称&PCName;最近终结了一个叫“蒙格尔.基德”的罪犯，这家伙被指控犯有绑架和谋杀。“这家伙个头太大。把头直接割了了事。”一位匿名NCR游骑兵如是说。
蒙格尔.基德以恐怖的绑架闻名，因为他会不管被害者已提交的赎金，照杀不误，而这种做法在可汗帮自己人看来也无法接受。所以最终他不得不被迫远走高飞，成立自己的分支“蒙格尔人”，专门绑架NCR公民。
尽管关于他的死详情不明，但有消息说，因为他拒绝投降，所以被&PCName;绳之以法，就地处决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: &PCName; Crushes Fiends!
ESP.TRADUIT: &PCName;碾碎恶魔帮！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
The title of "Fiend" has developed into one that evokes fear, disdain, and pure hatred from the honest citizens of the Mojave. Not content to merely poison themselves with narcotics in a lifelong fit of self-pity, they turn their addiction into a vehicle for aggression and wanton destruction, preying on innocents at every turn. For years, the NCR was at a loss as to how to undo their relentless grip on Vegas' ruins and Vault 3 - until &PCName; arrived.
Thanks to this gallant bounty hunter, the Fiends have found themselves on the defensive, their leaders repeatedly brought to justice by &PCName;'s daring actions. So used to acting as the terrorists, it was foreign for these shiftless barbarians to find themselves suddenly terrorized, and it has shown. Unfortunately, a new leader recently emerged: Lobo.
The lupine maniac managed to rally the Fiends and urge a new offensive, wreaking havoc on convoys, caravans, and other innocents. He was rumored to throw puppies and severed heads off the roof of Zapp's Neon Signs as a source of amusement.
Knowing that &PCName; would eventually come calling, Lobo set a devilish trap in the old neon sign factory, confident the bounty hunter would finally be felled by feral cunning and deception.
Instead, the intrepid hunter broke through the ambush, and ultimately disemboweled the nefarious Lobo with his own chainsaw. As it now stands, the Fiends are on the brink of annihilation, having sunk to the depths of the lowly Jackals and Vipers. We can hope that time and their innate disorganization will hasten their collective demise.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
恶魔帮，现在已经成为制造恐惧、高傲自大和撒播仇恨的代名词。不用说他们荒淫无尽的生活充满了腐烂和罪恶，对毒品的上瘾和滥用也令他们的身躯走向狂暴与自我毁灭。他们在莫哈维的每一个角落制造混乱，所过之处断壁残垣伤痕累累。NCR在维加斯的边缘废墟和3号避难所与他们的战斗中损失惨重。然而，随着&PCName;的到来，一切出现了转机。
由于这位豪侠一般的赏金猎人的出现，恶魔帮突然发现他们已经处于防御态势，他们的领导人一次又一次地命丧黄泉。以前他们一直扮演恐怖分子的角色，现在他们反而成了恐怖分子&PCName;的受害者。关键时刻，一个新的领导人最近站了出来，他名字叫洛勃。
这个凶残的疯子重新聚集起了恶魔帮，行成一股强壮的力量，再次对莫哈维的安全造成威胁。有谣言说，他喜欢把狗头钉到霓虹灯上，因为他喜欢这样消遣。
由于清楚&PCName;一定会有所反应，洛勃在老霓虹灯工厂设下了一个致命的陷阱。他相信自己的狡诈，自信可以轻松等待&PCName;自投罗网，然后让他命丧此地。
然而，我们无谓的勇士突破了埋伏，将洛勃等一干人马全数歼灭。自此一役，恶魔帮元气大伤，处于崩溃边缘。他们退居废墟深处，隐藏在豹狼帮和毒蛇帮之后。此一新维加斯大患终为&PCName;所灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Entrepreneur Slain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 企业家被谋杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
Sources report that &PCName; has assassinated Sergio Booth, mayor of Valle del Hierro, respected entrepreneur, and musician. Before murdering the town's democratically elected leader, &PCName; slaughtered the entire population of Valle del Hierro, leaving over twenty three dead and countless wounded behind. "It was a fucking massacre, and that bounty hunter didn't even try to talk... that crazy fuck just came in guns blazing! All my friends are dead," said Joe Silver, a surviving citizen who suffered a leg wound.
After finding Valle del Hierro a derelict ghost town, Booth successfully transformed the dusty shell into a bustling hub of free commerce, unencumbered by government regulation or interference. Now his dream is another victim of &PCName;, who has served to undermine justice, civility, and commerce at every opportunity.
Thanks to this new class of bounty hunters, life is cheapening in the Mojave. I fear these depredations will soon be at the doorstep of the average citizen, and not just those at the fringes of government reach. Perhaps the NCR will begin dispatching their assassins for offenses like loitering, jaywalking, and other misdemeanors.
To employ these bloody rogues is not the act of a reasoned government, but a paranoid police state. Caesar's Legion will find the Mojave warm and receptive if this naked oppression persists.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
消息报告说，&PCName;涉嫌谋杀瓦尔德耶罗的市长、杰出的企业家和音乐家--塞尔吉奥.布斯。在杀害这名由当地民主选举推选出来的领导人之前，&PCName;血洗了整个小镇，一路留下了超过23具尸体和数不胜数的伤员。“这简直就是场大屠杀。从头到尾他连眼都没眨。我的朋友都死了！”乔.席尔瓦说。乔虽然幸存下来了，但是只剩下了一条腿。
在发现瓦尔德耶罗这座被遗弃的鬼城后，布斯成功地将这座空荡荡的小镇变得人声鼎沸，热闹非凡。他通过杰出的领导才能在当地建立了有效的司法系统，是整个小镇逐步走上复兴的轨道。
由于赏金猎人这个阶级的出现，人命开始变得越来越不值钱，我担心有一天他们会把枪口对准无辜的平民。他们现在看起来道貌岸然，其实背地里都是贪婪金钱的亡命之徒。也许将来NCR有一天会发现，他们在这条路上已经走得太远了而无法回头。
雇佣这些嗜血之徒不该是一个理性政府的所作所为，除非他们对局势的控制已经无能为力。如果再这样持续下去，相信不久，凯撒军团一定会发现这个地区对他们的到来会非常欢迎和包容。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tribal Leader Murdered!
ESP.TRADUIT: 部落首领被杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
The murderous rampage of &PCName; continued recently with the violent death of "Red Bear", a respected tribal chieftain traveling through the Mojave. Sources indicate &PCName; conducted an exhaustive pursuit of Mr. Bear, pertinaciously stalking him into the Spring Mountains. Amidst alpine serenity, &PCName; handily dispatched the hapless chieftain. Sources also state the vigilante mutilated Mr. Bear's corpse, collecting fingers and various organs as macabre trophies. Afterwards the bounty hunter submitted one of the gory tokens to NCR authorities.
This begs the question - why does our fair republic utilize such ghastly, barbaric methods for confirming bounties? More importantly, why are our taxes bankrolling this vile practice? Rewarding a malevolent sociopath like &PCName; is all but criminal, and therefore I beseech more reasoned leaders in our government to abandon this modus operandi.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森.安布罗斯
&PCName;的疯狂杀戮最近一直在持续，又一个倒霉鬼--红熊死在了他手里。消息指出，他一路追踪红熊来到春泉山脉，在风和日丽的阳光下残忍地将红熊杀害。还有人看见他近乎暴虐地折磨逝者的尸体，不仅剁下血淋淋的手指，而且丧心病狂地挖出新鲜的内脏，也许是想作为战利品。之后，他把其中一枚手指作为纪念品送给了NCR当局。
我请求回答--为什么我们公正的共和国会以这样的残酷方式确定目标的生死？更重要的是，为什么我们纳税人的钱会不经同意滥用于这种方式？给&PCName;这样一个恶毒的反人类分子奖赏，政府良心何在？我强烈要求举行公开辩论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hero Slays Outlaw!
ESP.TRADUIT: 英雄剿匪实录！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
In a time marked by barbarism, treachery, and strife, true heroes are scarce. However, the Mojave now has a veritable champion wandering its lawless expanse, &PCName;. The title of "Bounty Hunter" doesn't do this person justice, as they've single-handedly reversed the insidious onslaught of organized criminality in the region. Recently &PCName; conducted a laborious pursuit of "Red Bear", a ferocious killer and slave trader. Despite seemingly insuperable obstacles and the murderous machinations of his prey, &PCName; persevered and terminated Red Bear; the decision to utilize lethal force was made only after strenuous efforts to capture the criminal alive and render due process proved unsuccessful. It is only fitting that Red Bear met a violent end after ferrying so many innocents to an untimely demise.
I wish to commend &PCName; for this accomplishment, and I hope the NCR will consider augmenting the bounty hunter's compensation. We are seldom blessed by such intrepid souls who are willing to brave the feral hazards beyond civilization, ergo it is necessary to reward their sacrifice.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
在一个充满野蛮与暴虐、背叛与变节、争斗与冲突的时代，英雄，是极其稀少的。然而莫哈维是如此得幸运，拥有一名英雄气概的真正的守护者，不遗余力地为正义而战，他有一个响亮的名字--&PCName;。这位自称为“赏金猎人”的英雄为这片废土抛头颅洒热血，流尽了每一滴汗。最近，他费尽心血终于终结了一个废土“红熊”，这个家伙是一个穷凶极恶的杀手和丧心病狂的奴隶交易贩。尽管在追击途中面临一系列艰难险阻，但&PCName;以坚韧的毅力顽强地战胜一切困难，最后终结了红熊的生命。再使用致命武力之前，他仍然试图为法律的实现活捉红熊，但在红熊坚强的抵抗和严峻的形势下，他不得已采取了以保卫人民生命财产为优先的最终选择。他的选择是明智的，他的选择是伟大的。
考虑到&PCName;在追击过程中的艰险重重，我强烈建议NCR当局对我们的英雄做出物质或财力上的补偿。我们需要改变，我们需要重新审视&PCName;为我们带来的这一切的价值。不要让我们的英雄受苦受累，因为他为我们付出得太多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Raider Kingpin Killed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 强盗首领被杀！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
By Jayson Ambrose
NCR Officials reported that &PCName; has slain Sergio Booth, the kingpin of Valle del Hierro, and an aspiring warlord. Booth's death was the culmination of a dangerous operation outside NCR territory, as Captain Larry Scull, Commander of the Boulder City Jail, said, "This was a high-risk operation, so I sent in the very best, &PCName;." Despite a rampart of countless raiders and bloodthirsty miscreants, the gallant bounty hunter stormed the town and felled the devious Booth.
In recent months Valle del Hierro burgeoned as a nest for the collective slime of the wastes - raiders, slavers, outlaws, and other parasites flocked to the festering enclave in the Sheep Range. "They was like flies to dogshit. Should've hanged em," said an unnamed NCR ranger. Their reunion was no accident - Sergio Booth masterfully engineered the town's growth, all while consolidating his power in the region's underworld. If not for the acts of &PCName;, Booth's nefarious ascent would have gone unchecked.
Citizens were relieved to hear about the news. "I hope that bounty hunter kills them all, goddamit! Raiders made my dog into jerky," said Joe Parmley, prospector. The collapse of Valle del Hierro capped off a broad decline in organized crime in the Mojave since &PCName; began making inroads against villainy.
Sergio Booth had long marauded through vast territories between Nevada and the Great Plains, and was reputed to be of relation to the shadowy mass murderer known as "Marko", whose whereabouts are unknown. We can hope that &PCName; will continue this righteous crusade and root out the furtive evildoers lurking in our midst.
OBITUARIES Lt. John Ramsey, 29, died in service of his country at Valle del Hierro, Nevada.
At his request, no service will be held.
Lt. Ramsey was born May 30, 2252, in Cloudcroft, New Mexico. At a very early age, his family was killed and he was enslaved by Caesar's Legion. He managed to escape at age 14 and join the Desert Rangers.
Lt. Ramsey served in the New California Republic Rangers for over ten years as a scout/sniper, operating in multiple theaters. He spent 8 months at Firebase Zulu, where he distinguished himself in combat and earned a battlefield commission. In 2281, Lt. Ramsey was transferred to the Boulder City Jail.
He is survived by a son, Abraham.
Condolences may be sent to the Boulder City Jail.
ESP.TRADUIT:
记者：杰森·安布罗斯
NCR官方报告，&PCName;已经杀死了瓦尔德耶罗的领主--塞尔吉奥.布斯。刺杀塞尔吉奥的行为是NCR最近几年在地区之外执行的最危险的任务。巨石城上尉拉里.斯科尔说：“这项行动具有极高风险，因此我们派了我们最好的部下&PCName;前往执行命令。”尽管那里有无数的强盗和数不尽的嗜血佣兵，英勇的&PCName;还是像秋风扫落叶一般轻松扫荡整个城镇，并当场致塞尔吉奥于死地。
回首最近几个月，瓦尔德耶罗逐渐成为一个新的犯罪分子聚集地--那里汇集了来自各地的强盗、土匪、奴隶、逃犯以及各种被常规社会所抛弃的人。“他们就像涌向狗屎的苍蝇，真该把他们绞了。”一位匿名NCR游骑兵说。这群人重新聚集在塞尔吉奥身边，企图继续加强自己的实力，吸引更多的邪恶之徒前来此地。但这一切计划在&PCName;到来之后都成了泡影。
公民们听到这条消息一定会感到很轻松。“我就知道那个赏金猎人没问题！草，早知道我就把我的狗推荐给他了。”探险家乔.帕姆雷说。瓦尔德耶罗的覆灭大大降低了莫哈维边境的犯罪现状，&PCName;重新为这片土地带来了安定的曙光。
塞尔吉奥长期在内华达和大平原之间流窜犯案，他与一个叫“马尔科”的影子一般的杀手有着千丝万缕的联系，而那个家伙至今行踪不明。我们希望&PCName;能够继续他追寻正义与和平的旅程，为莫哈维的和平与稳定做出自己的贡献。
讣告
中尉. 约翰.拉姆齐, 29, 死于执行任务过程中, 地点：瓦尔德耶罗, 内华达
按他生前所愿，不得举行任何典礼仪式。
拉姆齐中尉于2252年5月30日，在新墨西哥的克劳德克罗夫特出生。在他很小的时候，他的家人就被凯撒军团所杀。他在14岁的时候从军团脱离，加入了沙漠游骑兵。
拉姆齐中尉，于新加州共和国游骑兵军队里，驻守过多个区域，累计担任10年狙击手和侦察兵。在祖鲁火焰基地，他赢得了一场战斗的胜利，为自己和NCR赢得了荣誉。2281年，他被转入巨岩城监狱。
他就像你的孩子一样，亚伯拉罕，请收留他。
吊唁请寄往巨岩城监狱。谢谢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Help Me
ESP.TRADUIT: 请帮助我

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I'm being held captive by the Vipers, so I'm writing this at night. They're all drunk right now, and tired from... using me. I'd run, but this slave collar will blow me to bits if I get more than 50 meters away from Slade. He bought me from Red Bear for 10 bottles of whiskey... I guess that's what I'm worth out here.
As bad as Slade is, he's still an improvement over Red Bear. At least they give me food and water, and they don't beat me as much. They mainly just... well, you know...
Don't tell my family about the bad stuff if you find this. Just tell them I'm alive, that's all. They don't need to hear anything else. God willing, I'll make it through this. Slade is taking me to their camp, though I don't know where it is. I'm so scared... I think they're going to just use me up and then do away with me. I have to stay strong. Tell Ma and Pa I love them.
Please help me, Janie Parker
P.S. They kept saying something about "The 95" when they mentioned where we're going.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我被毒蛇帮的人俘虏了，这封信是我在黑夜里写的。他们现在喝醉了，而且累了……用我用累的。我想跑，但只要我离那个斯雷德超过50米，我脖子上的项圈就会把我炸成碎片。他从红熊那用50瓶威士忌买了我……我现在大概也就只值这些了。
虽然他也很坏，但至少比红熊好那么一点。至少他们给我食物和水，而且很少打我。他们只是……额，你知道……
如果你发现这封信，不要告诉我的家人在这里发生的一切。只要告诉他们我还活着，就行了，他们不需要听到别的。上帝保佑，我一定要挺过来。斯雷德要把我带到他的营地去，我不知道那是哪，我很害怕……我想他们就是想每天弄我方便。我一定要坚强起来。告诉我的妈妈和爸爸，我爱他们。
请帮助我, 珍妮.帕克
P.S. 当他们谈到要去的地方时，他们一直说什么“第95”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank You For Your Purchase
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您的购买

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Mr. Idaho,
I'd like to personally thank you for your recent purchase. We stand by our pledge to provide you reliable, economic tools to ensure stability and control in your place of business.
A new feature of the SS-250 model is its nifty fail-deadly protocol; should any calamity befall you, all your property would justly perish as well. This is the latest and most effective measure against the violent impulses of human property.
Please contact us if the product is defective or unsatisfactory in any way.
Sincerely, E. Jones President, Servitude Solutions, Inc.
ESP.TRADUIT:
爱达荷先生：
我仅以个人名义向你最近的购买表示感谢。我们保证，可以向你提供可靠的经济工具来帮助你稳定和控制你的生意。
SS-250模型的一个新特征就是它的一个极好的“保护”协议：如果有不幸发生在你身上时，你的财产也会同时全部毁灭。这是来避免个人财产受到严重冲击的最新的而且最有效的方法。
如果你发现这个产品有任何缺陷或令人不满意的地方，请及时和我们联系。
真诚的， E.琼斯 董事长，奴役百事通 公司

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Judge Is Dead?
ESP.TRADUIT: 审判官死了？

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Luther,
Did you hear that someone plugged "The Judge"? Is that bullshit or what? I wasn't sure if he even existed, but the word is that some stone-cold killer strolled into his bunker and cleaned them out! You know how the wasteland is - it's probably just horseshit propagated by the NCR is scare us. I think it was Gustav who told me about it... figures.
-Slade
ESP.TRADUIT:
卢瑟,
你听说有人干掉审判官了吗？这他妈是真的还是谣传？虽然我不确定到底是否有这么个人，但据说那个石头一样的杀手扫荡了整个地堡！你知道废土是什么样，就是一帮NCR傻逼一天到晚找我们麻烦，现在看来又多了个麻烦的家伙。
这条消息是古斯塔夫告诉我的。
- 斯雷德

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lose The Helmet
ESP.TRADUIT: 扔掉那个头盔

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jack,
Stop wearing that ridiculous helmet on duty. I know you're worried about the lakelurks, but Jackson's death was due to his stupidity as much as anything. Besides, that helmet will only obstruct your vision, and it has to be hotter than hell in the daytime. Suck it up, stay alert, and you'll be fine. There are worse things than lakelurks out there, believe me.
- Drake
ESP.TRADUIT:
杰克,
下次再执行任务时，不许再戴那个可笑的头盔。我知道你是担心那些湖藻蟹的袭击，但你要记住杰克森的死完全是因为这样类似的愚蠢。此外，那个头盔会影响你的视线，对你的预判造成影响，而且白天戴着它就跟享受蒸炉一样。不要管它了，随时保持警惕，你才能活命。在莫哈维有很多比那些湖藻蟹还要危险的东西，相信我。
- 德雷克

ESP.ORIGINAL: I Got It Coming
ESP.TRADUIT: 我快死了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I got it coming. Gutshot, just waiting to pass out from the blood loss.
Ronnie told us it would be a holdup, then we'd split. All the workers got behind him, since Jim was cutting wages and upping the hours. We figured we'd get our fair due since we'd been breaking our backs for that asshole.
Ronnie lied to us all. If I had known what he was, I might have put him down myself, but we were committed, caught up in the moment. There was no turning back once he shot those customers. The Andersons were witnesses. I guess we didn't have a choice.
Ronnie had a look in his eyes when we took them upstairs, like he was getting a birthday present or something. We were scared shitless, and he was acting like it was a fucking party.
What a coward I've been. I ran from my girl, all my responsibilities, thought I'd strike it rich here. Got caught up with that sick fuck, just nodded my head and did what he said. "Break Jim's kneecaps," he said. I took to the boss with that slugger, no questions asked. He begged for his wife and children, even after the bones started breaking. He never tried to save himself.
We held him down, made him watch as Ronnie did the girls. We figured he was so busted from the bat that he'd stay down. I didn't notice till he pressed that Dillinger against my stomach, then I heard the pop. Ronnie finished him with the shovel, and just laughed at me when I started screaming.
They took turns with the females, then slit their throats. They left me here, all of them too scared to second-guess Ronnie. They said they were taking the little one east, gonna sell him to the Vipers. I guess Robert got away after they wounded him outside. I didn't see it go down.
It's strange, the blood loss. I feel light, empty. Fading. I got it coming.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我快死了。我中弹了，仅仅在等待失血过多晕过去。
罗尼告诉我这是抢劫，然后我们决裂了。所有的工人都支持他，因为吉姆削减工资还增加劳动时间。在罗尼突然背叛之前，我都以为我们会受到公平的对待。
罗尼骗了我们所有人。如果我知道他是什么样的人，我就会拒绝他。但是我们同意了，在那一刻被他迷惑住了，一旦他向顾客射击，那么一切就没有退路了。安德森家族为证，我觉得我们没有选择了。
当我们带他们去楼上的时候，罗尼的眼神很不安分，就像他获得了生日礼物之类的东西那样。我们非常的害怕，而他却像是开展一场该死的派对那样。
我真是个懦夫。 我逃离了我的女儿，我所有的责任，以为我会在这里发财。我被那该死的杂种迷惑住了，只是对他的说话不断的点头。“打断吉姆的膝盖”，他说。我走向老板然后重击了他，没有问任何问题。他为他的老婆和孩子求情，甚至在膝盖碎了之后也是。他没有为自己求饶。
我们控制住了他，让他看看罗尼怎样对待那些女人。我们认为他遭受这样的对待崩溃了，所以他只是蹲着。我没有注意到罗尼的逼近直到他朝我的肚子来上一拳，然后我听见了枪声。罗尼用铁铲干掉了他，而当我开始尖叫的时候他只是朝我大笑。
他们轮奸了那些女人，然后割掉了她们的喉咙。他们把我留在这里，他们太害怕受到罗尼的责问。他们在谈论要将最小的孩子带到东边，然后卖给毒蛇帮。在他们从外面挂着上回来后，我猜罗伯特已经逃走了。我不知道接下来的事情了。
真奇怪，鲜血一直在流。我感觉好轻，好空虚。越来越虚弱了。我快死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I Will Find Them
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会找到他们

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Today I buried my father, mother, and sister. Tomorrow I will search for my brother, who is now a slave.
After that, I will find the man responsible and make him taste God's judgment. It will be slow. It will be painful. Above all, it will be righteous.
I used to believe that men could be saved, but I have learned the truth: there is no place for mercy or restraint here. I will make my own way and deliver justice by my own hand, guided by God.
In time, they will fear me, and when my knife is at their throat, they'll beg for mercy.
And I'll say no.
It begins with Ronnie. It will end with &PCName;.
ESP.TRADUIT:
今天我埋了父亲，母亲，还有妹妹。明天我会去找我的弟弟，现在他是一个奴隶了。.
在那之后，我会找到那个该为此负责的男人，然后让他尝尝上帝的审判。这将是漫长的。这将是痛苦的。不过，这是正义的。
我曾经相信一个人能够被拯救，但是我知道了一个事实：这里没有仁慈和约束的能够存活的地方。我会使用自己的方式并用自己的双手实现正义，在上帝的指导下。
随着时间的推移，他们会害怕我，并且当我的刀子架到他们脖子上的时候，他们就会求饶。
而我会拒绝。
从罗尼开始。到&PCName;结束。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Live It Up
ESP.TRADUIT: 狂欢一场

ESP.ORIGINAL:
&PCName;,
I hope you're having a great time in the Mojave. Gambling, drinking, sex - everything we live for. Enjoy it, because soon you're going to be a corpse.
I know what happened to Zimmer. He was the closest thing to a son I've ever had, and you cut him down, just as he was getting on his feet. You could have walked away and left us to our business. Perhaps in time we could even have been allies.
You can forget about that now - mercy, forgiveness, reconciliation. You are now marked by our organization. I want you to know this: men are coming to kill you. You won't know the time or the method, but they're coming, sure as God's vengeance. I want you to taste the fear and the anxiety of knowing - but not really knowing.
So have a shot of expensive Scotch, eat a good meal, and sleep in a comfortable bed with your favorite whore. But know that we're coming, and you'll soon answer for everything you've done.
- K.
ESP.TRADUIT:
&PCName;，
我希望你在莫哈维玩的愉快。赌博，喝酒，性 - 所有我们盼望的事。享受它吧，因为很快你会变成一具尸体。
我知道吉玛发生了什么事。他就像我的儿子那样，而你杀了他。你可以一走了之，而我们还有事业。也许某些时候我们还会成为盟友。
你可能忘记了这些 - 仁慈，宽恕，和解。你已经上了我们的组织的名单。我想让你明白：有人会去杀了你。你不知道何时和何种方式，但是他们来了，显然是上帝的复仇。我想让你尝尝“了解”的恐惧和焦虑 - 但不是真正的了解。
所以尝尝昂贵的苏格兰酒吧，吃美食吧，在舒适的床上跟你最喜爱的妓女睡觉吧。但是要知道我们来了，而你将很快就对你所做的事情负责了。
- K.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lea Esto, Pendejo
ESP.TRADUIT: 快读，傻瓜

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chingate, pinche mercenario hijo de puta!
ESP.TRADUIT: 奶奶的，赶快带些雇佣兵干掉这个混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maria Lopez's Diary
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛利亚·洛佩兹的日记

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Day 1: We're here! It's amazing to finally have a place of our own, without some landlord lording over us. There is room to move, air to breath, and a chance to make our living.
Folks at Silverwood warned us about the tribals, but they can't be any worse than the 80's. We all know how to handle a rifle, and we have a good view of the canyon. Tomorrow, we're going to build fences!
Day 2: Ground is tough here, and the digging was exhausting, but we got it done. I never want to touch a post hole digger again. Grandma looked after Juanito while we were outside. He makes her so happy, it's a such a delight to see her eyes light up when she's holding him.
Frank started to make a move on me tonight, but we were both too tired. Besides, one baby is enough for now. We have to buy livestock tomorrow.
Day 3: We went to meet with the herder outside Silverwood, and he sold us five head of Brahmin. I also made sure to buy some seed from the general store. That man Dobbs seems like a nice fellow. Some drunk named Charlie almost vomited on my dress. I wish they'd run off that sort of riff-raff. I'm so glad we aren't crammed in that cesspool.
Day 4: This morning was frightening. We heard a sound at dawn, and Frank went for his rifle, I grabbed the baby. All he found was a single tomahawk that had been lodged into the door. It was so primitive, yet deadly. I imagine these tribals are angry about our presence. Can't they understand we just want to live in peace?
Frank went to talk with the sheriff while I planted some crops. Sheriff told him that there aren't enough militia to spare, and that we'll just have to "remain vigilant". What a pendejo!
Day 5: The Brahmin are all dead. They killed them in the night, with nary a noise, just cut their throats, even the calves. The land office told us this was safe, a way to avoid the crime and cost of the city. If I'd have known what kind of people these tribals were, I don't know if I'd have made the same decision.
Frank and I are armed at all times. I'm scared.
Day 6: Frank killed one of them last night.
He couldn't sleep, so he just sat in a chair, watching the door, clutching his rifle. I drifted off around midnight, but the gunfire woke me up a few hours later. It was a young man - a boy, really, armed with a club and some spears. Frank said he wasn't alone, that they'd tried to enter through the front door. Thank God Frank was waiting for them. We're going to leave this place once Frank gets a job in town, probably at the mine.
Day 7: While Frank was at town, I saw the tribals kill a hunter from town. I was tending the garden when I heard the gunfire and screams down in the valley. The three tribals had been waiting on the hunter. He caught a spear in his leg and went down.
He managed to fell one of the savages, but the other two were on him in an instant. They did things to him, things I can't describe. I keep remembering it, hearing the hunter's awful, ungodly screams, like an animal being butchered. The tribals laughed.
Day 8: Frank said the mine won't hire him. We will have to stay here, or move into town and live in the streets. We're going to pray tonight, ask God to watch over us, and then make a decision. I have lived on the streets before, and I'd almost rather die than experience it again. This farm is our future, and we have to be strong, if only for Juanito's sake.
We will stay here. We will hope. We will pray.
ESP.TRADUIT:
第一天:
我们来到了这里!我们终于有了自己的房子，再也没有什么房东会对我们颐指气使。真是太棒了，有活动的空间，有呼吸的空气，有生存的机会。
银木镇的人警告过我们要提防部落民，但他们不会比80年代帮更糟。我们都知道如何使用步枪，我们也能很好地欣赏峡谷。明天，我们要建篱笆!
第二天:
这里的土地很艰苦，挖掘工作也很辛苦，但我们完成了。我再也不想碰挖坑机了。我们在外面的时候，奶奶照看着华尼托。他让她很开心，当她抱着他的时候，我看到她的眼中充满喜悦。
弗兰克今晚开始对我动手动脚，但我们都太累了。再说，现在一个孩子就够了。我们明天得去买牲畜。
第三天:
我们去银木镇城外见了一个牧人，他卖给我们五个婆罗门首领。我还从杂货店买了一些种子。多布斯看起来是个好人。有个叫查理的醉汉差点吐在我裙子上。我真希望他们能和那种乌合之众断绝来往。真高兴我们没被塞进那个污水坑里。
第四天:
今天早上很可怕。我们在黎明听到一个声音，弗兰克去拿他的步枪，我抱住了婴儿。他只找到一把嵌在门上的战斧。它是如此原始，却又致命。我想这些部落对我们的存在很生气。难道他们不明白我们只想过和平的生活吗?
我在种庄稼的时候，弗兰克去和治安官谈了。治安官告诉他现在没有足够的民兵，我们只能“保持警惕”。傻逼!
第五天:
婆罗门都死了。他们在夜里杀了他们，没有一点声音，只是割了他们的喉咙，甚至包括小牛。土地办公室告诉我们这里很安全，可以远离犯罪和城市生活的成本。如果我知道这些部落是什么样的人，我不知道我是否会做出同样的决定。
弗兰克和我随时都带着武器。我很害怕。
第六天:
弗兰克昨晚杀了一个人。
他睡不着，就坐在椅子上，手握步枪，望着门口。我在午夜时分迷迷糊糊地睡着了，但几小时后枪声把我吵醒了。那是一个年轻人--一个男孩，真的，带着一根棍棒和一些矛。弗兰克说他不是一个人，他们试图从前门进去。感谢上帝，弗兰克在等着他们。等弗兰克在镇上找到工作，可能在矿场，我们就离开这里。
第七天:
当弗兰克在镇上的时候，我看到部落民杀死了一个镇上的猎人。我正在照料花园，突然听到山谷里传来枪声和尖叫声。三个部落民一直在等着猎人。他的腿中了一根矛，倒了下去。
他设法击倒了其中一个野人，但另外两个立刻扑了上去。他们对他做了我无法形容的事。我一直记着，听到猎人可怕的，邪恶的尖叫，就像动物被宰杀一样。他的族人都笑了。
第八天:
弗兰克说矿场不会雇他。我们将不得不留在这里，或者搬到城里住在街上。我们今晚要祈祷，祈求上帝保佑我们，然后做出决定。我以前在街上生活过，我宁愿死也不愿再经历一次。这个农场是我们的未来，我们必须坚强，哪怕只是为了华尼托。
我们要留在这里。我们会充满希望。我们会祈祷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't Get Out
ESP.TRADUIT: 出不去了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We have barred the passage. The door is sealed.
A few families are left, holding out here. The ammunition will run out soon. More keep coming from below.
They told us it was safe, nothing to worry about.
We cannot get out.
I can hear them. The scratching, the screams.
They are coming.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们已经封住了通道。门被封闭了。
一些家庭被遗弃，坚守在这里。 军火不久将会耗尽。下方来了更多
他们告诉我们这很安全，不用担心任何事。
我们不能出去。
我能听见他们了。刺耳的刮擦声，和尖叫。
他们来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Out For A Bit
ESP.TRADUIT: 出去一会儿

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Fergus,
We're going to hit an NCR caravan outside of town, and hopefully we'll pick up some munitions if the information is right. You did fine work putting that armor together, so expect a bigger cut from the take. We'll be back shortly.
- Red
P.S. I hope you got that Anti-Material Rifle sighted in. I've got a feeling that the NCR is gonna send that bigshot bounty hunter our way soon. &PCName;, that's the name - I want you to be ready when they come.
ESP.TRADUIT:
费格斯,
我们计划在镇外袭击一支NCR商队。如果情报无误的话，希望这次能多扒点弹药和补给。你把这些护甲放在一起干得很好，下次给你奖赏。我们很快就回来。
- 莱德
P.S. 我希望你已经拿到了那把反器材步枪。我有种感觉，那个赏金猎人正一步一步走向我们的陷阱。&PCName;，这就是他的名字，我希望你尽快准备好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank You For Your Purchase
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您的惠顾

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your Honor,
I'd like to personally thank you for continuing your biannual purchase of our top-line warrior slaves. You will find them pliant, imposing, and utterly proficient in all manner of combat. I personally managed your order, and each item is hand-picked from the most fearsome tribes across the continent.
As usual, your property will be outfitted with the SS-250 model, which features a fail-deadly protocol in the event of your untimely demise. It is 100% effective in deterring property "malfunction".
As an expression of my gratitude for your loyalty, I've included a special bonus, Vahsi. He's a former Vandal (a fierce tribe), captured in his prime and augmented with multiple combat implants. He will do your bidding without hesitation, fear, or remorse. He is the most lethal human property I've discovered to date, and he's all yours. Please, do not attempt to offer reimbursement for the gift - consider it a token of my gratitude.
Sincerely, E. Jones President, Servitude Solutions, Inc.
P.S. Thank you for referring Marko to our business. He was responsible for capturing Vahsi, so it seemed fair that you should reap the rewards of our new acquisition.
ESP.TRADUIT:
尊敬的阁下：
我以个人的名义向您的购买再次表示感谢。你会发现，我们这里的这些质量顶尖的奴隶性格温顺，身体强壮，而且还能参与各种战斗。我亲自执行了您的订单，手把手把他们从远方最恐怖的部落运送到这里来。
跟以前一样，您的资产被配以SS-250型号，具有双重终结优势的模块，可以100%有效制止您的财产“损失”。
为向您的忠诚表示致意，我送上一个小礼物，瓦希。他是一个汪达尔人（一个异常勇猛的部落），在他青壮年的时候被我们抓获。我们给他植入了多种战斗用植入器。他能做任何你要求他做的事情，而且毫不犹豫。这是我到现在位置见过的最优秀的东西，但他是你的了。请不要为这件礼物给我做任何补偿，因为只是我衷心送给您的礼物。
真诚的， E.琼斯 董事长，奴役百事通 公司.
P.S.感谢您曾推荐马尔科来参与我们的业务。他为抓捕瓦希起到了重要的作用。所以这看起来似乎还是很公平的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Red Bear's Return
ESP.TRADUIT: 红熊的回归

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Your Honor,
I have it on good authority that Red Bear will be returning to the Mojave with a bevy of slaves. While it's likely that he'll sell most of the women to the Vipers, I could have him hold onto several of the young boys for you, if you'd like.
I appreciate your continued support for my business endeavors in the Mojave. If you should need anything at all, Shadow Company is at your service.
Sincerely, Norman Meston Commander, Shadow Company
ESP.TRADUIT:
尊敬的阁下：
我已听说，红熊将要带着一队奴隶回到莫哈维。然而看起来他似乎要把大部分女人都卖给毒蛇帮。我能说服他留几个年轻的小孩给你，如果你喜欢的话。
我高度赞赏您对我再莫哈维生意上的支持。如果您需要任何东西，幻影公司随时为您服务。
真诚的， 诺曼.梅斯顿 将军，幻影公司

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time For Action
ESP.TRADUIT: 是时候行动了

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ingram,
Marko's lost it, brother, plain and simple. Damn bounty hunters are killing everyone, and he's content to stay hidden up in the hills and let us get butchered. It's high time we make our own way here.
I want you to gather up the crew and meet me near the canyon entrance. We're going to hit the bounty hunters where they sleep, then we'll hit the town. Fucking Marko always had us on a leash, holding us to a fucking double standard. No more.
- Saunders
ESP.TRADUIT:
英格拉姆，
马尔科迷失了，兄弟，真是简单明了。那些该死的赏金猎人正在杀死我们所有人，而马尔科会十分乐意躲藏在山上，放任我们被屠杀的。 现在是时候在这里走出自己的路了。
我要你召集你那群乌合之众在峡谷入口处等我。我们要去他们睡觉的地方好好“打赏”那些赏金猎人，然后再去镇上。
那个该死的马尔科总是把我们拴在一条皮带上，让我们遵守他那所谓的双重标准。去他妈的，这种事情再也不会发生了。
-桑德斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Words of The Brahmin Hunter
ESP.TRADUIT: 双头牛猎人的遗言

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Legs are crushed, think I'm bleeding inside. Won't last much longer.
It's this city - so dark. It was one of the dark figures. Goodman, I know it was him. Told the mutants I was coming, got me ambushed. They bashed my ribcage in like a bag of fucking carrots, and now they think I'm some kind of God.
Strange... I'd give anything for a muffin right now.
ESP.TRADUIT:
腿断了，我觉得我内出血了。活不了多久了。
这个社会 - 很黑暗。一定是个阴险的家伙弄的。古德曼，我知道就是他。就是他告诉那些变种人我来了，让我中了埋伏。他们像捣碎一袋胡萝卜那样重击了我的胸腔，而现在他们认为我是某种神。
真奇怪... 我现在愿意用任何东西来换一个小松饼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunter's Diary, Part 1
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎人日记 第一部分

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Damn this cold. Damn these people. Damn this place.
One last job, that's what I told myself. It's the voice, that devil inside me that whispers, "You have to be the best." Knowing that Marko is out here, thinking that someone else might get him before me, it's like a knife in between the ribs, scraping the bone and shredding my guts. Randall will get here soon, and &PCName; will certainly follow.
People say that you shouldn't be in this business for glory, but that's bullshit. It's all glory, every second of it. When I take a target down, it's a bullet in the brain of a critic or one of those fucks who pushed me around as a kid. I'd like to catch up with a few of them now.
Dad was right about me, though - I am a coward. I've faked being brave so long that it's almost believable, but I know the truth. People are afraid, but if they knew what I was, the things I'd done, they'd probably laugh. I guess if you kill enough bums and outlaws folks just take it for granted that you're some sort of bold spirit, or just plain crazy.
Susan told me it was foolish to come here, and she might have been right. She was always the smart one. I wonder why she stayed with me for so long. She seemed happy enough with the new guy. She was just waiting for the next letdown with me, I guess. It was good to see her one last time.
Fuck diaries. Why am I writing this?
"To remind yourself of what you are, to keep pushing," the voice says. Fuck you. I've been doing this for ten years, I know how to do my job. Marko's a killer, just like the rest.
"He'll kill you." Fuck you twice. I've killed legionaries, psychopaths, gunfighters, all type of wicked shit you can't imagine. I'll cut Marko's fucking head clean off and kick it down main street in that shitheap town.
"You're afraid." No shit, I'm afraid. Doesn't mean I have to be a pussy about it. I'm more scared of being forgotten. When Marko's dead I'll be a legend. You understand that, you snide fuck?
Is this what normal people write in their journals? Fucking feet are numb in this frozen fuckhole of a shack. I found it abandoned, figured it was better than staying in town. I don't know how many of those saps are in Marko's pocket. I have to admit the mountains have an intimidating beauty about them, but it's just a distraction from the very real dangers around here. Outlaws, mongrels, cannibals, all kind of strange shit. Why did I come here?
"Glory, stupid." Yeah, I suppose so. That's reason enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT:
诅咒这该死的寒冷，诅咒这些该死的人，诅咒这该死的地方。
这将会是最后的一次脏活,我总是这么告诉我自己的。 而这是我内心中，那魔鬼的声音低语道的, "你必须是最好的。" 在我得知马尔科在这里之后，我总以为有人会比我先抓住他，就好像一把利刃插在肋骨之间，刮坏我的骨头，撕碎我的内脏。兰道尔很快就会到的,还有&PCName;也一定如影随形。
那些人说我不应该为了荣誉而做这行，但那是纯粹的胡说八道。这都是荣耀，不论每分每秒。当我把一个目标打倒的时候，这消息会是那些批评家或把我当小孩推来推去乱搞的混蛋们脑子里一颗子弹。 而我现在就想追上他们中的一些。
不过，老爹说得对---我就是个懦夫。我一直假装勇敢，这几乎让我自己都深信不疑，但我心中知道真相。人们在害怕我，但如果他们知道我是什么，我做过些什么，他们可能会嘲笑我。 我想如果你杀了足够多的流浪汉和不法分子，人们就会想当然地认为你是一个勇敢的人，或者只是一个普通的疯子。
苏珊告诉过我，到这里来是愚蠢的，而且她可能是对的。她总是那个聪明的家伙。我想知道她为什么和我在一起这么久。她和那个新欢在一起似乎很开心。我猜啊，她只是在等我下次失望罢了。很高兴最后一次见到她。
去他妈的日记！ 我他妈的为什么要写这些垃圾。
"为了提醒你，你自己是什么，来保持行动," 那声音说道. 操你妈的. 我都他妈的做这件事超过十年了,我知道怎么完成自己的工作。马尔科只是个杀手罢了，就像那些其他垃圾一样.
"他会杀了你的。" 我再去你妈的. 我杀过军团士兵，变态狂，持枪劫匪，那些所有你想象不到的邪恶的东西。我要把那个马尔科的头割下来，像个痰盂一样踢到那个垃圾镇的大街上。
"你在害怕。" 不吹不黑，我是很怕。但这并不意味着我必须做个胆小鬼。更让我害怕的是被人遗忘。马尔科死后，我将会成为一个传奇。你明白吗，你这愚蠢的混蛋？
这会是正常人在日记里写的东西吗？该死的，我的脚在这间冰冷的破屋子里已经冻得麻木了。我发现这房子被遗弃了，但我想呆在这总比呆在城里要好。我不知道马尔科的口袋里有多少傻瓜手下。但我不得不承认这些山有一种不可描述的吓人的美，不过也只是分散了人们对周围真正危险的集中罢了。不法之徒，狗杂种，食人族，各种奇怪的东西。我为什么来这破地方？
"为了荣誉，你这傻逼。" 你说得对，我也这么觉得。 光是这个理由对我而言就足够了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hunter's Diary, Part 2
ESP.TRADUIT: 猎人日记 第二部分

ESP.ORIGINAL: Frosthill is an odd little town. I was asking around for information on Marko, hoping to pick up a lead, as it seems he's hiding in the hills somewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 霜地是个奇怪的小镇。 我在四处打听马尔科的情况，希望能找到线索，因为他好像就藏在山上的某个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How Do I Get Out of This Chickenshit Outfit?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈真想跑

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hicks,
Did you hear about the new order on posters and pornography? The fucking XO, Mr. Jackass himself said that there's supposed to be no girly magazines or anything, not even a goddamn centerfold! What kind of candy-ass unit doesn't let red-blooded men enjoy the sight of a beautiful woman when he's off duty? This is such bullshit... I should've stayed in the NCR.
Anyway, my tour's almost up. Two more weeks and I'm outa here! I heard that bounty hunters are making good money these days, so I may try my hand at that profession.
- Hudson
ESP.TRADUIT:
希克斯,
你听说了关于大幅海报和照片的新命令了？太你妈操蛋了！那坨废物居然认为这里什么都不该有，草！一个正常的男人在执行完任务后回来，他妈的连个看看女人照片的权利都没有，草他妈啊！……早知道还不如就呆在NCR。
总之，我在这下面的“观光”快结束了。再过两周我就可以出去了！我听说现在赏金猎人挺好赚钱的，我也想亲自尝试一下，或许换个职业也不错。
- 哈德森

ESP.ORIGINAL: Move Your Ass
ESP.TRADUIT: 快走

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck This Shit
ESP.TRADUIT: 他妈狗日的

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Danny,
That asshole has us pulling shifts, filling sandbags, sweating like pigs. I didn't throw in with this outfit to work like a dog.
I joined because we get high, we take what we want, and nobody fucks with us. Just because some stupid fucking mailman kills a few of our own, we gotta hunker down like fucking animals? Fuck this. We should do like Lobo said - take the fight to that mailman!
And while we're building stupid fucking walls and collecting rats? The Vipers are moving in on our turf. They're weak, but they aren't stupid.
At least we can still get high. Dumbass wastelanders and Westside maggots always got cash, and we can ransom survivors. The supply might not be what it was, but at least it's there.
I'm pushing off at eight, if you wanna get in on it.
- Oscar
ESP.TRADUIT:
丹尼，
那些混蛋让我们轮流值班，填充沙袋，忙的像猪一样。我这身工作服从未离身，我像狗一样工作。
我来这里是因为我们能够嗨，我们能得到任何想要的，而且没有人瞎指挥我们。 只是因为某个愚蠢的邮差杀死了我们一些人，我们就像该死的动物一样蹲着？我操，我们应该像罗伯说的那样 - 跟那个邮差战斗！
然而我们却在建造一个愚蠢的围墙并聚集老鼠？那些毒蛇帮正在我们的地盘上。他们虚弱，但并不愚蠢。
至少我们还能够嗨。愚蠢的游荡者和西区的蛆虫总是要现金，而我们可以赎回幸存者。补给不像原来那样了，但至少还有。
我会在8点离开，如果你也想，那就赶紧。
- 奥斯卡

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chester Is The Man!
ESP.TRADUIT: 切斯特是混蛋！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Jake,
Chester is the motherfucking man!
How about this gear? We are tooled the fuck up now, man. Nobody will fucking look at us wrong. Westside bitches are running scared, and even the NCR won't cross us now!
I heard that Chester took the baddest militiaman hostage, then came face to face with the mailman, &PCName;, then talked that little bitch down, made that fucker piss right then and there. So much for the legendary Courier! We are fucking rolling now, motherfuckers!
Have you seen Chester? Motherfucker is jacked, got that hypertension breather, or whatever the fuck implant. I don't know what they put in him, but he is fucking beast now. Amazing what a few caps can get you.
Gonna hit the range later tonight. We got some fresh captives to blast. I can't stop laughing when they turn into the fucking goo piles. The kids are the best, screeching, their eyes staring at you while the rest of them melts into green mush. Fucking awesome!
- Chris
ESP.TRADUIT:
伙计，
切斯特是他妈的混蛋！
这是怎么一回事？ 我们现在他妈的一团糟了，伙计。没有人会在乎我们的出问题了。西区婊子们现在杀气腾腾的，甚至NCR要干掉我们了。
我听说切斯特将那邪恶的民办作为人质，然后希望跟邮差,&PCName;面对面谈。然后那个小婊子谈妥了，然后他们当场就屈从了。 那个邮差是多么的传奇啊！我们他妈的现在被卷进来了，操他妈的！
你看见切斯特了吗？按个混账现在很暴力，还有高血压等等，都怪那操蛋的植入体。我不知道他们给他装了什么，但是他现在他妈的就是个野兽。这种震惊不是瓶盖可以给与的。
今晚就要突围。我们在那些新俘虏身上安置了炸药。我一想到他们变成一片片的就忍不住的大笑。那些孩子表现的最好，他们尖叫，他们用眼睛盯着你，而其他人却吓破了胆。真他妈棒极了！
- 克里斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Night Here
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一晚

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's the last night in the cabin, and I just felt like writing for some reason. Maybe it's the thought of Sandra. I can see her green eyes, haunting me as we lie together, still young and bold, alive. Our cabin wasn't too different from this one.
Was this all just a lie to make me feel alive again? Has it changed anything?
It's quiet up here, except for Tucker's snoring. The lights from Vegas peek through the cracks in the south wall. Some of the boys are bothered by the sound of coyotes, but they put me at ease. They're natural things, doing what they're supposed to. Maybe it's just my nature to do what I've been doing. I feel it's going to end soon.
What would Sandra say if she saw what I'd become? I can't think about it now.
We meet Hendershot tomorrow. Gonna need firepower for the next job.
ESP.TRADUIT:
这是我在小木屋的最后一晚了，不知为什么，我很想写点东西。也许是因为想到桑德拉。当我们躺在一起时，我能看到她那双绿色的眼睛萦绕在我的心头，她依然年轻，勇敢，充满活力。我们的小屋和这个没什么不同。
这一切只是为了让我重获新生的谎言吗?有什么变化吗?
这里很安静，除了塔克的鼾声。维加斯的灯光从南墙的缝隙中透出。有些男孩被郊狼的声音困扰着，但他们让我放松了。它们很自然，在做它们该做的事。也许做我一直在做的事正是我的天性。我觉得很快就要结束了。
如果桑德拉看到我变成这样，她会怎么说?我现在不能想它。
我们明天见亨德肖特。下一个任务需要火力。

ESP.ORIGINAL: GREETING
ESP.TRADUIT: 问好

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again, friend. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了，朋友。我能为你做什么？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello ma'am, what can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好，女士，我能为你做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Something I can do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's eating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有什么事情吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <happy bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <欢快地吠叫！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSaveBradleyQuest.set Rendevouz to 0 aaBradleyREF.evp
Oh, look who just showed up to the party! We kind of missed you back there in Utah, uh...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，看看谁来参加派对了！我们在犹他州的时候很想念你...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kind of a long, fucked up road here. I heard about what happened, real sad and everything. I really miss that place, especially the fucking snowmen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这条路又长又乱。我听说了发生的事，真的很伤心。我真想念那个地方，尤其是那些该死的雪人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well fuck me with a bag of dicks... I did not expect to see you. That was some crazy shit that went down up there, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧用一袋鸡巴操我......我没想到会见到你。这太疯狂了，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can I see your hands? No, wait, that's probably rude, I shouldn't ask that... just, uh, forget I said that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能看看你的手吗?不，等等，这可能很粗鲁，我不该问的...就当我没说过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crazy to see you here... God, I just... literally, list of people I expect to see, you're last person on that fucking list. Totally.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里见到你真是太疯狂了...上帝,我只是...我最想见的人名单上，你是最后一个，绝对的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So... you want a smoke or... drink or something? You can step down in the foxhole and steadily die from Cutty's farts, if you like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...你想抽支烟还是...饮料什么的?如果你愿意，你可以走到散兵坑里，让卡蒂的屁把你闷死。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mmm-hm.
Nng. Hi.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，嗨。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Howdy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RussellEndingTracker.CharlieMet to 1
Mmm hmm?
Set RussellEndingTracker.KatMet to 1
Yeah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set RussellEndingTracker.SullivanMet to 1
They're here, those things from The Divide! Ferals won't hold them off for long - I need your help, now!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们来了，那些来自分水岭的家伙！野狗不会拖住他们太久的-我需要你的帮助，马上！

ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care now.
