ESP.ORIGINAL: You look after yourself now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在照顾好自己。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Attack
ESP.TRADUIT: 攻击

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ain't fast enough for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对我来说不够快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hit
Shit, shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，他妈的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hit sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {撞击声}

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Hit sound}
ESP.TRADUIT: {撞击声}

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, shit, that hurt!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，这他妈痛死了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ow!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Flee
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃跑

ESP.ORIGINAL: Save me for Christ's sake!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看在上帝的份上救我！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to die!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不想死！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, no!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，不要啊啊！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mama!
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈妈！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run for it, we're fucked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 快跑，我们完蛋了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't take any more of this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我受不了了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Waitwaitwaitwaitwait, timeout!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，等等，暂停！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Assault
ESP.TRADUIT: 突击

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're paddling up shit creek.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你这是在自找麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Murder
ESP.TRADUIT: 杀人犯

ESP.ORIGINAL: You make me sick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真让我恶心。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: MurderNoCrime
{Approving}Mmmm-hmmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: {赞成}Mmmm-hmmm.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: FireExplosive
Fire in the hole!
ESP.TRADUIT: 小心手雷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: StartCombat
ESP.TRADUIT: 战斗开始

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这就去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Death
ESP.TRADUIT: 死亡

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Death Noise}
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡声}

ESP.ORIGINAL: AlertToCombat
Hey!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: NormalToAlert
I do believe someone is out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信有人在外面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AlertToNormal
Nothin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: CombatToNormal
And so the dust settles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一切尘埃落定了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: CombatToLost
Damn my eyesight... lost em'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，我看不见了
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostToNormal
I suppose they tired of the extracurricular activities.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他们厌倦了课外活动
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostToCombat
Right there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: AlertIdle
Hmm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: LostIdle
I'm looking.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在看
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: DeathResponse
Ah, panther piss!
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，豹尿！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shit, shit, shit!
ESP.TRADUIT: 该死，狗屎，妈的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这等着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all right. I'll console myself with some fine tobacco. You go on ahead and dodge bullets and all manner of nonsense. I'll be right here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。我要用上好烟草来安慰自己。你继续前进，躲避子弹和各种各样的废话。我就在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaDocFridayRef.Waiting to 1; aaDocFridayRef.evp;
I'll be here, steady as an oak. A drinking, smoking oak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在这里，像橡树一样稳重。 一颗喝酒，抽烟的橡树。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaDocFridayRef.Waiting to 1; aaDocFridayRef.evp;
{Sighs}Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: {叹息}好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellREF.Waiting to 1; aaRussellREF.evp
I'll be right here, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在那儿，长官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellREF.Waiting to 1; aaRussellREF.evp
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaGutsRef.Waiting to 1; aaGutsRef.evp;
{Sighs}Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Sighs}当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.Waiting to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
Smoke break!
ESP.TRADUIT: 掐灭烟头！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.Waiting to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
Well, shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，妈的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFordREF.Waiting to 1 aaFordREF.evp
Dime novels never said nothing about waiting around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 廉价小说里面从来没有写过让我要等在那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFordREF.Waiting to 1 aaFordREF.evp
And I'm supposed to just sit here like some kind of hobo? Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该像流浪汉一样坐在这里？行吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFordREF.Waiting to 1 aaFordREF.evp
I knew I should've brought a girly mag or something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道我应该带个避难所少女杂志什么的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaFordREF.Waiting to 1 aaFordREF.evp
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaCooperREF.Waiting to 1 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaCooperREF.evp
Wait here for me, Boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里等我，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's trade equipment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们交易装备吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I should hope you will respect the norms of personal property.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能尊重私有财产的规范。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
{Strains}Careful, I'm not a mule.
ESP.TRADUIT: {紧张}小心点，我不是骡子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
{Annoyed}Lugging your refuse is not the enterprise of a gentleman.
ESP.TRADUIT: {恼怒}拖着你的垃圾不是绅士该干的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Chems are good, weapons are better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毒品很好，武器更好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
The rifle and the blade are off-limits.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪和刀都是禁止入内的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
I think I've got some room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我得有一些空间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
If that scotch is weighing you down, I'll be happy to take it off your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果那瓶威士忌让你心烦，我很乐意帮你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Don't be stingy with the stimpaks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要吝啬你的治疗针。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Ok, goddamit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，该死的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Don't even think about touching my rifle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要打我的枪的主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Ok, but I'm not your fucking dress-up doll.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，但我他妈的不是你的洋娃娃。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Of course. Make the merc carry all your shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然。让雇佣兵带着你所有不要的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
This is so fucking amazing, I'm trading gear with the greatest bounty hunter in history!
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真是太他妈神奇了，我要和史上最伟大的赏金猎人交换装备！

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Sure, I'll carry anything. I'm the strongest motherfucker in this whole canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我什么都会拿上的。我是这个峡谷里最强壮的混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Give me some dynamite! I'll kill them so bad they'll forget how to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我一些炸药！我会杀了他们，让他们会忘记怎么死的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Hey, make sure you give me some of the good shit, would you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，一定要给我点好东西，好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Enough about tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不说战术了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panting}<pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: {panting}<喘息>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, fuck all this planning. Let's just go kill some shit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，去他妈的所有的计划。我们去杀点傻逼吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A sapient approach, if I may say so.
ESP.TRADUIT: 明智的做法，如果我可以这么说的话
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaDocFridayRef.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaDocFridayRef.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaDocFridayRef.evp
Good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaRussellREF.evp
{double confirmation bark}<bark! bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {double confirmation bark}<犬吠！ 犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaGutsRef.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set aaGutsRef.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaGutsRef.evp
Listen to you, laying down{Mispronunciation for effect} strategery. I'm on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你的，趴下来{Mispronunciation for effect} 这是策略，我会照做的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaBradleyRef.evp
I'll run right up their asses before they even know about it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会在他们还没意识到之前就把他们逼疯的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set aaFordREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaFordREF.evp
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaCooperREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingLong to 1 aaCooperREF.evp
All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ever stalwart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 永远坚定
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm right behind you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就在你身后。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not good. I am fucking incredible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是好，我是他妈的无敌！

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panting}<pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: {panting}<喘息>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦吼，行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like enamel on a tooth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像牙齿上的珐琅质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaDocFridayRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaDocFridayRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaDocFridayRef.evp
Got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 了解。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set aaRussellREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaRussellREF.evp
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaGutsRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set aaGutsRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaGutsRef.evp
Roger that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 收到。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyRef.evp
Yeah, like real partners. You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，就像真正的搭档。你应得的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set aaFordREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaFordREF.evp
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaCooperREF.evp
Stick close to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟着我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, like real partners. You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，就像真正的搭档。你应得的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaCooperREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaCooperREF.evp
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go right ahead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往前走
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, shoot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，开枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panting}<pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: {panting}<喘息>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fine. How do you want to do this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。你想怎么做？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where do you need me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你需要我在哪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to use ranged weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你使用远距攻击武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And the world is just as it should be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 世界就应该是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDocFridayRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set aaDocFridayRef.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaDocFridayRef.CombatStyleMelee to 0
Good call.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说得好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
{sad whimper}[Guts is incapable of ranged attacks and will continue using melee attacks.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {悲伤的呜咽}[古茨不能远程攻击，将继续使用近战攻击]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now you're talking. One shot, one kill, motherfucker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说的对。一次瞄准，一次杀敌，他妈的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 0
Nice! I am the fucking god of guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好！我可是无敌的枪神。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
Loaded and locked!
ESP.TRADUIT: 载弹完毕！索敌！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
Fuck yeah, I'm like a sniper, right? But with huge balls, like, like bighorner balls that make me invincible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妈的，我就像个狙击手，对吧？但是我有超大的勇气（蛋蛋），就像大角羊的蛋蛋一样，这会让我无敌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
You better watch out or I'll kill more than you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好用心点，否则我杀的会比你还多！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
I'm gonna kill everything in sight!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要杀死眼前的一切！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleRanged set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 0
{sad whimper}[Cooper is incapable of ranged attacks and will continue using melee attacks.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {悲伤的呜咽声}[库珀不能远程攻击，将继续使用近战攻击。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Switch to a melee weapon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 切换到近战武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Sighs}Lord help me.
ESP.TRADUIT: {叹息}上帝保佑我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaDocFridayRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee Set aaDocFridayRef.CombatStyleRanged to 0 Set aaDocFridayRef.CombatStyleMelee to 1
I can do that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaRussellREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1
{puzzled aroo}[Guts defaults to melee attacks since he has no ranged weapons.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {迷惑的声音}[古茨默认为近战攻击，因为他没有远程武器。]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Every heard the adage "Don't bring a knife to a gunfight"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人听过“不要在一场枪战中带着小刀”这个谚语吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaBradleyRef.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 1
Yeah, you got it. I'll stick em' in their ribs, cut their kidney. I'm gonna make em' wish that, that they, uh... that they hadn't been stabbed!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你会看到的。我会把他们的肋骨插进去，切碎他们的肾。我要让他们希望，他们，呃。。。他们没有被刺伤！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1
I'll stab them right in their assholes!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要把他们都刺死！

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFordREF.SetCombatStyle FollowersCombatStyleMelee set aaFordREF.CombatStyleRanged to 0 set aaFordREF.CombatStyleMelee to 1
{confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们谈点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm listening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在听。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {panting}<pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: {panting}<喘息>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就这样。我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: By all means.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lead the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {confirmation bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {confirmation bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good to go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy bark}<bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: {happy bark}<犬吠！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really? By all means, speak your mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的吗?无论如何，说出你的想法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: How so?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {questioning aroo}<aroo?>
ESP.TRADUIT: {questioning aroo}<啊呜？>

ESP.ORIGINAL: How so?
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么做到的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, all right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，好吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.TRADUIT: <吠叫！>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们谈谈你的战术吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What about them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们怎么样呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, you want to change anything?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你想改变什么吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: {questioning aroo}<aroo?>
ESP.TRADUIT: {questioning aroo}<啊呜？>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm all ears.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听着呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, you want me to shoot them in between the eyes? Or stab them in the balls? I'll kill them either way, you just tell me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好啊，你想让我在他们的眼睛之间开枪吗？还是刺他们的蛋蛋？不管怎样我都会杀了他们，你告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

It's time for us to part ways.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们该分道扬镳了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You really want to go it alone?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: You sure about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要这样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad whimper}<whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad whimper}<呜咽>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you sure you want me to go?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定要我离开吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {sad whimper}<whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: {sad whimper}<呜咽>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我们应该同行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So we shall. After you, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我们必须去。朋友，你先请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy bark}<bark!>

I need some real armor!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要一些真正的盔甲！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, fuck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦！干！

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponIneffective
I think I'm just pissing her off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我只是在激怒她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: WeaponBroke
This thing is on its last leg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这东西快完蛋了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: NoAmmo
I'm plum empty!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我什么都没有了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Crippled
ESP.TRADUIT: 残废

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lord help me, I can't feel my legs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑，我感觉不到我的腿了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't feel my legs! Help, please!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈感觉不到我的腿了！求求你帮帮我！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Poison
ESP.TRADUIT: 中毒

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Poisoned}Something ain't right here, can't see straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: {中毒}这里有些不对劲，我什么都看不清楚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersOverburdened
{Straining, defying body's signals}I can carry it, I can, I... fuck it, no way this is happening.
ESP.TRADUIT: {紧张，无视身体的提示}我应该可以携带它，我可以，我。。。去他妈的，这简直不可能！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll take that finger. Here's your reward.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把手指给我。这是你的报酬。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's plenty of bounties left, so come back when you're ready to put in more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这还有大量的赏金任务。当你准备好了就回来吧。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaQuigleyFinger 1 player.additem caps001 125 SetObjectiveCompleted aaBounties01 10 10 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 5 set aaBounties01.RandallGreeted to 5 Player.rewardxp 75
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. Here's your reward. Don't spend it all in one place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好，这是你的报酬。记得别把鸡蛋都放在一个篮子里。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come back when you're ready for the next job. Someone is always in need of killin'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好开始下个工作后就回来吧。替人杀人这项工作在世界绝对少不了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 15 player.removeitem aaOnodaFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100 SetObjectiveCompleted aaBounties01 20 20 player.removeitem aaQuantrillDiaryNotes 1
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I think every member of the male species is sleeping a little easier with that bitch dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了。相信她的死可以让每一种雄性动物都能睡个安稳的好觉了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 30 30 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 30 player.removeitem aaEileenFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.rewardxp 125
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding job. I hate zombies, particularly one that's a self-righteous child-killer. Here's a bonus for killing that freak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。我恨僵尸，尤其是那种自恋天杀的孩童杀手。给，这是为你杀死那个怪胎的额外奖励。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 80 80 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 80 player.removeitem aaFredFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding job. Come back when you're ready for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮！等你准备好接下一单工作就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 40 40 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 40 player.removeitem aaCullenFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Outstanding work. Take a break, kid. You've earned it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得漂亮。休息一下，小子。这是你应得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 50 50 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 50 player.removeitem aaTonyIdahoFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A kidnapping cannibal, you say? Shit, that's a surprise. Most of the cannibals around here have been put out of business by the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个专门绑架的食人魔？操，还有这种事。按理说大部分这样的家伙早就被NCR赶出这一带了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, here's your reward. Excellent work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，给，这是你应得的报酬。干得好！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 90 90 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 90 player.removeitem aaMagoFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a little surprised to see you unscathed. Good work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很惊讶你竟然毫发未损。干得好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 100 100 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 100 player.removeitem aaJackFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Terrific work, kid. Here's a bonus. Come back when you're ready for more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得很棒，孩子，这是一笔赏金。等你准备好做更多的工作再过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 60 60 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 60 player.removeitem aaTommyFinger 1 player.additem caps001 750 Player.rewardxp 115
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good work. You're bringing us a lot of business, so here's a bonus.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不错。你给我们带来了大量的生意。这是你的报酬。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 110 110 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 110 player.removeitem aaKurtFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1250 Player.rewardxp 150
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good, here's a reward, whether you want it or not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，这是报酬，不管你想不想要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm getting some very interesting contracts. Come back when you're ready to pursue them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在又得到了几份很有趣的合同。想继续的话随时欢迎到我这儿来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 70 70 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 70 player.removeitem aaAlexFinger 1 player.additem caps001 500 Player.rewardxp 100
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Good. I must admit - I harbor an acute loathing for traitors of any sort, so here's a bonus on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我必须承认-我对任何形式的背叛者发自内心地蔑视。给，这是你的报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 120 120 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 120 player.removeitem aaChuckFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1250 Player.rewardxp 150
Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're kicking ass out there, kid. At this rate I'm going to be out of contracts soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你太厉害了，孩子。你再这么快，我这边就快没合同了。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, there's plenty of work left. Come back when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，别担心，我开玩笑，还有很多工作等着你去做，等你准备好了就回来吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Steven Randall [06000ADD] (mod) Quest : ([06000AE1]aaBounties01) New Vegas Bounties EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: setobjectivecompleted aaBounties01 130 130 set aaBounties01.BountyKilled to 130 player.removeitem aaBillyFinger 1 player.additem caps001 1250 Player.rewardxp 150
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你点事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 比如？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know you only have one eye, but a blind man could have found that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道你只有一只眼睛，但这个盲人也能看出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck you, it was buried under boxes and shit. I'm a killer, not a fucking detective.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去你妈的，它被埋在箱子什么的下面了。我是个杀手，不是他妈的侦探
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [07004F33] (mod) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me see the note. Hmm... Hendershot. Never heard of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我看看笔记。嗯...亨德肖特。从来没听说过他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [07004F33] (mod) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he's any kind of arms dealer, I know a fellah who can point us in the right direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是个军火商的话，我认识一个人能给我们指明正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [07004F33] (mod) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ex-Ranger by the name of Vickers, lives in Freeside. Let's meet him and see if he can get us on track.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前游骑兵维克斯，住在自由城。让我们见见他，看看他能否帮我们走上正轨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [07004F33] (mod) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It mentioned someone named Hendershot. Do you know him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 上面提到了一个叫亨德肖特的人，你认识他吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never heard of him, but I know someone who might be able to point us in the right direction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没听说过他，但我认识一个人也许能给我们指明正确的方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [07004F33] (mod) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ex-Ranger by the name of Vickers, lives in Freeside. Let's track him down and see if he can get us on track.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前游游骑兵维克斯，住在自由城。我们去找他，看看他能不能帮我们走上正轨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Russell [07004F33] (mod) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellCAMPFIRE
You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上照办。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.showrecipemenu ReloadingBenchRecipes
I'd like to reload some ammunition.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要装填一些弹药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaMission01TitusIntro01
So... is this your brand of humor? Silverwood sends a bleeding bitch to test me? Are you mad, wench?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以...这是你特有的幽默吗?银木镇派了个婊子来测试我?你疯了吗，丫头?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07010EA6] (ID) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: No matter... if Silverwood wishes to entrust its fortune to the weaker sex, so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管了...如果银木镇想把自己的命运托付给弱者，那就交给他们吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07010EA6] (ID) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: One moment, I recognize the figure with you... yes, sweet, sweet amator, it's you, isn't it? What a fortuitous turn of events.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那一刻，我认出了和你在一起的那个人...是的，亲爱的，亲爱的情人，是你，对吧?真是个意外的转折。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [07010EA6] (ID) Quest : ([07005C11]aaRussellMission01) Hunter, Hunted EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellMission01.TitusGreeted to 2
Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where did you grow up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是在哪里长大的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, we're working right now. I'd prefer to focus on the task at hand, if you don't mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我们现在正在工作。如果你不介意的话，我想专注于手头的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Does it matter? Shit, ok. I was born a tribal, if you can believe it. One of the Fredonians, near the Grand Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有关系吗?他妈的,好吧。我出生在部落里，如果你相信的话。在大峡谷附近的弗里多尼亚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't remember too much, other than my mother, some of the men teaching me a few things here and there, some of the language.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记不太清了，除了我妈妈，有些男人时不时地教我一些东西，一些语言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do remember the trees, their smell, the cool air up on the rim. People forget how different it is up at the higher elevations.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得那些树，它们的气味，以及边缘的凉爽空气。人们忘记了在更高的海拔上有多么不同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It all ended when the Legion showed up, though. Like a bad dream or something, they just erased the Fredonians from history.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但当军团出现时一切都结束了。就像噩梦之类的，他们把弗雷多尼亚部落从历史上抹去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I couldn't have been more than three or four when they took me, made me a slave. Got sold to a centurion, and that was my upbringing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们把我抓去当奴隶的时候，我还不到三四岁。卖给了一个百夫长，我就是这样长大的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose you could call me the "Last of the Fredonians". Pretty fucking corny, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你们可以叫我"最后的弗雷多尼亚人"真他妈老土，是吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.GrowUp to 1
There's nothing left to see. All of it is under Legion control, anyway. I've never deluded myself into thinking I might stand on the rim again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么可看的了。反正都在军团的控制之下。我从来没有自欺欺人地认为我会再次站在边缘。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, Vegas is my home now. It's just pretty enough to make me forget the ugliness that's always lurking underneath... sort of like a hooker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，拉斯维加斯现在是我的家。它足够漂亮，足以让我忘记隐藏在它背后的丑陋...有点像妓女。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.GrowUp to 2
You ever thought about going back to the Grand Canyon, seeing your homeland?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有想过回到大峡谷，看看你的家乡？

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I best make use of your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎样才能最好地利用你的技能？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Uh, point me towards the fucking bad guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 呃，把我指给那些该死的坏蛋看？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Really, I've learned to make due with whatever I've got. I prefer an assault rifle, but I'm handy with a blade as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的，我已经学会了应付我所拥有的一切。我更喜欢突击步枪，但我也很会用刀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just don't stick me with some dumb fucking unarmed weapon, ok? Nothing worse than charging into a shootout with your bare fists.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别给我一些愚蠢的破武器，好吗?没有比赤手空拳发起枪战更糟糕的事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellAskFace
Oh, you really want to know? Fuck you. I don't ask about that scar on your dome, so pay me the same courtesy, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的想知道吗?去你妈的。我不会问你头顶上的伤疤，所以你也给我点尊重，好吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened to your face? I'd really like to know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的脸怎么了?我真的很想知道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a persistent fuck, aren't you? Well, back when I was... property of a certain centurion I made the mistake of defying his instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是个固执的混蛋，不是吗?当我还在...一个百夫长的财产我犯了一个错误，违抗了他的指示。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He assaulted me, so I removed one of his eyes with a knife. In turn, he broke my legs, chained me to a wall, then tortured me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他袭击了我，所以我用刀挖掉了他的一只眼睛。反过来，他打断了我的腿，把我锁在墙上，然后折磨我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He took a shiskebab, used it to cook my eye in the socket, then he took a few hours roasting my face. That answer your question? Good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他拿了一个羊肉串，在我的眼窝里烤了，然后他花了几个小时烤我的脸。这回答了你的问题吗?好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 1
Any chance you'll tell me what happened to your face now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在你能告诉我你的脸怎么了吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Titus Vulcanus, Centurion, Primum Pilus. He made a habit of repeating his station to me, so I wouldn't forget.
ESP.TRADUIT: 提图斯·伏尔甘，第一百夫长。他习惯向我重复他的地位，这样我就不会忘记。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's hard for most people to appreciate the depths of slavery. When you're chattel, there is no you, only the owner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数人很难理解奴隶制。当你只是动产的时候，没有你自己，只有主人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're an extension of their estate, nothing more. You must obey in all things, without question or doubt. Titus knew this better than anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只是他们财产的延伸，仅此而已。你必须毫无疑问地服从一切。提图斯比任何人都清楚这一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He loved to burn things, burn people, and to make others watch. Beyond that, he had only one other source of pleasure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他喜欢烧东西，烧人，让别人看。除此之外，他只有另一种乐趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He had a stable of boys in his tent, spent his nights... doing things to them. I was one of those boys. Wouldn't wish that on anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的帐篷里住着一群男孩，晚上在那里过夜...对他们做些什么。我就是其中之一。我不希望任何人这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 2 set aaRussellQuest.Titus to aaRussellQuest.Titus + 1
Earlier you mentioned that you were enslaved. Who was your captor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 之前你提到你被奴役了。抓你的人是谁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: After he burned me, he departed on an errand for Caesar, left me to be crucified. I was almost looking forward to it at that point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他烧了我之后，就为凯撒跑腿去了，留下我被钉在十字架上。那时候我几乎在期待了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you've been burned and fucked for twelve years, crucifixion doesn't seem so bad. I was ready to die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你被烧和操了12年，钉死在十字架上也没那么糟糕。我已经做好了死的准备。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Would've died just another nameless slave in Arizona strapped to a cross, if it hadn't been for the rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要不是游骑兵，他就会成为亚利桑那州另一个被钉在十字架上的无名奴隶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was back when the Desert Rangers were at war with the Legion, and they actually took the fight them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在沙漠游骑兵和军团作战的时候，他们真的和军团作战了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They slaughtered the Legionaries, freed the slaves, saved my life. I was fifteen, and right then and there I set out to repay them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们屠杀军团士兵，解放奴隶，救了我的命。我当时15岁，就在那时，我开始报答他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe it was a debt of honor, debt of life, something. You have to pay back those things, one way or another. I was reborn a ranger that day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许是一笔荣誉之债，生命之债，什么的。你必须以某种方式偿还这些东西。那天我转世成为了一名游骑兵。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I spent the next eleven years with a ranger troop. They taught me how to fight, survive, prevail. How to be a man. They even educated me a little.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来的11年，我在一个游骑兵部队里度过。他们教我如何战斗，如何生存，如何取胜。如何成为一个男人。他们甚至对我进行了一些教育。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Titus, I'm not sure. Heard he died at Zulu, but who the fuck knows?
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于提图斯，我不确定。听说他死在祖鲁，但谁知道呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he is out there, and I find him... not God, Mars, or baby Jesus will save him from my knife, I promise you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他还在，而我找到了他我向你保证，上帝、战神或小耶稣也不可能把他从我的刀下救出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 3
What became of Titus Vulcanus?
ESP.TRADUIT: 提图斯·伏尔甘后来怎么样了?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Best years of my life, no question. I was part of a family, fighting for our home, our real home, not some far-flung bullshit territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生命中最美好的时光，毫无疑问。我是这个家庭的一员，为我们的家而战，我们真正的家，而不是什么荒无人烟的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fought in over sixty-four engagements with raiders, tribals, and Caesar's Legion, never left a man behind, not once.
ESP.TRADUIT: 经历了64次与掠夺者，部落和凯撒军团的交战，从未丢下过一个人，一次也没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lot of outsiders will deny it, but we maintained a kill ratio of over thirty-to-one, no bullshit. Some units claimed fifty-to-one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很多外人会否认，但我们的杀人比例保持在三十比一以上，别胡扯了。一些单位的死亡人数是51比1。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man for man, I've never seen a better fighting force in my life, not in the NCR, and certainly not in the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只讨论人类，我这辈子没见过比这更好的战斗部队，不管是NCR，还是军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We had our ranks, our discipline, but there was so much more to it. You try to tell people about it, they don't understand. Never will.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们有我们的队伍，我们的纪律，但还有更多。你想告诉别人，他们不懂。永远不会懂的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess you just had to be there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你只是必须在那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Background to 4
What was it like serving in the Desert Rangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: 在沙漠游骑兵服役是什么感觉?

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you were a Desert Ranger, why not join the NCR? You'd still be fighting the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你是沙漠游骑兵，为什么不加入NCR？你还在和军团作战。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vegas is not NCR. The Desert Rangers fought to defend their homes, not expand some half-assed empire that touts liberty for all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维加斯不属于NCR。沙漠游骑兵是为了保卫家园而战，而不是为了扩张那些鼓吹自由的半死不活的帝国。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you swear the oath to NCR you become another cog in their machine, nothing more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你向NCR宣誓时，你就成了他们机器上的另一个齿轮，仅此而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were in a tight spot when the Bears swooped in with their offer - that's what they do. We sold our souls for some peace of mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 熊队突然提出报价时，我们正处于困境之中--他们就是这么做的。我们出卖灵魂，换取心灵的安宁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I always thought the Desert Rangers would die in a bloody, final stand against the Legion. Instead, we got a nice, polite funeral and a monument.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直以为沙漠游骑兵会在与军团的血战中死去。相反，我们得到了一个体面的葬礼和一个纪念碑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I hate that fucking thing. It tells everyone how the true rangers were neutered and filed away, forgotten.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我才讨厌那该死的东西。它告诉大家真正的游骑兵是如何被阉割，归档，被遗忘的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were the heart, no... the balls of the Mojave, and the NCR put the scalpel to us. Sometimes I wish I'd bought it before it happened.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是心脏，不...莫哈韦沙漠的蛋蛋，NCR给我们下了手术刀。有时候我真希望我在事情发生之前就买下它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Ranger to 2
Can you tell me anything else about Glanton?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我格兰顿的其他情况吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's a lot of scuttlebutt about his origins, stories of his family being killed by tribals, him swearing vengeance. Probably bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于他的出身有很多流言蜚语，他的家族被部落杀害，他发誓要复仇。也可能是胡说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not surprisingly, he's supposed to be a devil with a knife, very quick. Runs a tight crew, also, real authoritarian.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不出所料，他应该是一个手持刀的恶魔，速度很快。管理着一个严密的团队，真正的独裁者。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once he sets his sights on a tribe, they're gonna get theirs one way or another. He's never failed to fulfill a contract.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦他盯上了一个部落，他们就会以某种方式得逞。他从来没有不履行合同过。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Glanton to 1
Yeah, I just wish I could've been there to see him bleed out, watch that stupid, smug grin wiped from his face. You did good.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我真希望我能亲眼看着他流血而死，看着他那愚蠢的，自以为是的笑容从脸上消失。你做的很好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the bounty, it's yours. And don't fucking argue with me, just... keep it. If you're feeling guilty, just give me some scotch and chems.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于赏金，是你的了。别他妈跟我吵，就...留着它。如果你觉得内疚，就给我来点威士忌和药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Glanton to 2
You know I collected the bounty on Glanton, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道格兰顿的赏金是我领的吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever heard of a man named Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫马尔科的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard a few stories about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我听说过一些关于他的故事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man told me that Marko is the fastest pistol, and the purest killer alive, maybe the devil himself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人告诉我，马尔科是最快的枪手，也是世上最纯粹的杀手，也许他就是恶魔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With the way stories travel through the wasteland, this guy's probably just some asshole with a mean stare and gift for gab.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从废土上流传的故事来看，这家伙可能只是个眼神刻薄，能言善辩的混蛋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Most so-called badasses are all talk, get flustered or nervous when you put the screws to them. Then again... there's always that chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大多数所谓的坏蛋都只是说说而已，当你给他们施加压力时，他们会感到慌乱或紧张。再一次...机会总是有的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard plenty of hunters say they'd do this or that to Marko, and the few that actually acted on it, went after him? Gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听过很多赏金猎人说他们会对马尔科做这样或那样的事，而有几个真正采取行动的人，去追他?没有一个回来的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody once told me that hell is here on earth, and we're living in it. If that's the case... maybe Marko is the devil.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人曾告诉我，地狱就是人间，而我们正生活在其中。如果是这样的话...也许马尔科就是恶魔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生的看法呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the idea of giving total control of New Vegas to a single person, much less some freak who's living in a test tube.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢把新维加斯的全部控制权交给一个人，更不用说一个住在试管里的怪胎了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: House seems like he's shooting for perfection, and that ain't possible. No amount of securitrons can change human nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 豪斯似乎在追求完美，但那是不可能的。再多的电子守卫也改变不了人性。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only thing worse than a government is a government led by one man. Hell, it would be one man. That's a recipe for failure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 唯一比政府更糟糕的是由一个人领导的政府。见鬼，只有一个人。这是失败的秘诀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么看待军团？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, I save opinions for things like food, guns, women, that sort of thing. The Legion doesn't rate an opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道，我把意见留给食物，枪支，女人之类的东西。我的意见不给军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shit on the fucking Legion. An army of slaves is no army at all. They're insects who worship a dirty old man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的在军团头上拉屎。奴隶大军根本算不上什么军队。它们是崇拜肮脏老头的虫豸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All they have is their reputation, and let me tell you... it's bullshit. I've seen the hardest centurions piss themselves in their final moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们所拥有的只是他们的名声，让我告诉你...这是狗屎。我见过最强力的百夫长在最后时刻尿裤子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They like to pretend they're more than men, but they ain't. Stick a knife in their guts, turn it slowly, and they'll cry for their fucking mama.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们喜欢假装他们不仅仅是男人，但他们不是。 把刀插进他们的内脏，慢慢转动，他们就会哭着找妈妈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I was wrong... I do have an opinion. The Legion is an army of cunts, every last one of them, and they're going to lose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我错了......我确实有自己的看法。军团是一群婊子组成的军队，每一个都是，他们会输的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think about the prospect of an independent New Vegas?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认为一个独立的新维加斯前景如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd fight for it, and I'm sure that others would too. Most of the locals resent the NCR. This ain't California. It's motherfucking Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会为之奋斗，我相信其他人也会。大多数当地人都讨厌NCR。这不是加州。不要脸的拉斯维加斯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't trust House. Maybe a wild card is what we need. I'll take a bit of anarchy over some outsider telling me how to live my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不信任豪斯。也许我们需要一张万能牌。我宁愿接受一些混乱，也不愿外人告诉我该如何生活。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they were such badasses, why did they lose?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们真的那么厉害，为什么他们会输？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, and listen good. We didn't lose. We were sold out to the goddamn NCR because a few of the men were pissing their pants over the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，认真听好了。我们没有输。我们被该死的NCR出卖了，因为有些人对军团垂涎三分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won almost every battle, but we lost the war. Even if the NCR stops Lanius, the Mojave's identity will be gone, just like the Desert Rangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们几乎赢得了每一场战斗，但我们输掉了这场战争。即使NCR阻止了拉尼尔斯，莫哈韦人的身份也会消失，就像沙漠游骑兵一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what happened? Why'd they join the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以发生了什么事？ 他们为什么加入NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legion happened. It was a trickle at first, just the scouts. Then they started showing up in force. We'd kill them, and more would take their place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团出现了。一开始是涓涓细流，只有侦察兵。然后他们开始大批出现。我们可以杀了他们，但更多的人会取代他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Legionaries practiced total war, killing or enslaving entire towns that helped us. A lot of people started having a change of heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 军团开始实行全面战争，杀死或奴役帮助我们的整个城镇。 许多人开始改变主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With dwindling supplies and manpower, some of the rangers began to see our struggle as futile. We fought on, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着供给和人力的减少，一些游骑兵开始认为我们的努力是徒劳的。不管怎样，我们继续战斗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the Legion would've lost interest if we continued giving them bloody noses. I wish we'd had a nuke.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们继续把他们打得鼻青血肿也许军团会失去兴趣。我希望我们有核武器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We won almost every battle, but we lost the war. Even if the NCR stops Lanius, the Mojave's identity will be gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们几乎赢得了每一场战斗，但我们输掉了这场战争。即使NCR阻止了拉尼尔斯，莫哈韦人的身份也会消失。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingVickers
He would pray for the Courier... and for justice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会为邮差祈祷......也为正义祈祷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would be buried in an unmarked grave near Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将被埋在自由城附近的一个无名坟墓里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingCharlie
The townspeople ensured that Charlie was given a proper burial, with full honors, and his name included in a memorial to the fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 镇上的人确保为查理举行一个体面的葬礼，并把他的名字列在纪念阵亡将士的名单上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though Charlie's sacrifice was commended by the townspeople, the lack of service records meant he received an anonymous grave outside of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管查理的牺牲得到了镇上居民的赞扬，但由于没有服役记录，他被安葬在镇外的无名坟墓里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a result, he was given employment and free boarding by the mining company, and eventually thrived as an accountant.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果，他被矿业公司雇佣并免费寄宿，最终成为了一名会计师。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bitter and broken, he took his own life soon after the battle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战争结束后不久，痛苦而心碎的他结束了自己的生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though the citizens of Silverwood warmed to Charlie, he grew bitter at the lack of opportunities. Shortly after the battle, he took his own life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然银木镇的居民对查理有所好感，但他却因缺乏机会而变得郁郁寡欢。战争结束后不久，他结束了自己的生命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though initially hesitant, he eventually agreed, and won in a landslide victory. Hobo Charlie was no more - he was now Sheriff Charlie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他起初犹豫不决，但最终还是同意了，并以压倒性的票选获胜。查理不再是流浪汉，他现在是查理治安官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.CharlieTopic to 4 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; if (RussellEndingTracker.BriggsMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs elseif (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat endif
aaEndingFinley
With his final thoughts on his old friend, Chance, Finley hoped he would find peace in death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 芬利在临终前思念着他的老朋友吉斯，希望他能在死后得到安宁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Surprised by their compassion, he quickly shed his old identity and set out to heal others. He believed his friend Chance would've wanted it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的同情让他感到惊讶，他很快摆脱了自己原有的身份，开始帮助他人。他相信他的朋友吉斯会愿意看到的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 2 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; aaFinleyREF.disable aaFinleyREF.markfordelete
if (RussellEndingTracker.CharlieMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie elseif (RussellEndingTracker.BriggsMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs elseif (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif
In time, he would become one of the most feared raiders in the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 随着时间的推移，他将成为莫哈韦废土上最可怕的掠夺者之一。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 4 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; set SomeguyMaster.SpartacusStatus to 1 aaFinleyREF.disable aaFinleyREF.markfordelete if (RussellEndingTracker.CharlieMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie elseif (RussellEndingTracker.BriggsMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs elseif (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif
In his private moments, he hoped to live long enough to see the Khans revitalized - or mercifully destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在私底下，他希望能活得足够长，看到大汗帮重新崛起--或者幸运地被消灭。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set aaRussellEnding.FinleyTopic to 2 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX; aaFinleyREF.disable aaFinleyREF.markfordelete
if (RussellEndingTracker.CharlieMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingCharlie elseif (RussellEndingTracker.BriggsMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingBriggs elseif (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif
aaEndingBriggs
At his request, he was buried with his posters.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在他的要求下，他和他的电影海报一起被埋葬了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 3 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX if (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif
Mourned by hundreds in the growing film industry, he would be immortalized in a bronze statue outside Albert Breach Studios.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在不断发展的电影行业中，数以百计的人哀悼他，他将在艾伯特·布里奇工作室外的一座青铜雕像中永垂不朽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 5 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX if (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif
Though his business remained successful, he would grow disillusioned with his prospects in Silverwood. He would never marry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他的生意一直很成功，但他对在银木镇的前景逐渐感到失望。他一直没有结婚。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellEnding.BriggsTopic to 1 PlaySound OBJProjectorGOATNext; ApplyImageSpaceModifier FadeToBlackAndBackQuickHalfsISFX if (RussellEndingTracker.KatMet == 1) aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingKat else aaRussellNarratorREF.SayTo Player aaEndingMayor endif
aaEndingKat
Despite the objections of a few citizens, Miss Kat was buried with full honors, alongside the other fallen defenders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管有一些市民反对，凯特小姐还是被安葬在了其他倒下的守卫者旁边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingMayor
Brandon would live out the rest of his days in obscurity, dying penniless and alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布兰登将在默默无闻中度过余生，临终时身无分文，孤独终老。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the deacon caught Brandon in the act, he strangled the former mayor to death. It would be ruled as self-defense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当执事抓到布兰登时，他把前市长勒死了。这被裁定为自卫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: His term as mayor would eventually be commemorated with an ornate toilet constructed in the town hall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了纪念他的市长任期，在市政厅修建了一个华丽的厕所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEndingSullivan
Mourned by his peers, Sullivan was buried alongside the other defenders, his name included in a memorial for the fallen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的同伴们哀悼他，沙利文和其他守卫者一起被埋葬，他的名字也被列入了烈士纪念碑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though a valued employee, he would eventually be laid off when the mine dried up. After leaving Silverwood, he was never seen again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他是一名很有价值的员工，但最终当矿井枯竭时，他被解雇了。离开银木镇后，再也没人见过他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would be buried in a nondescript grave outside of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将被埋在城外一个不起眼的坟墓里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would go on to train some of the most successful prize fighters in New Reno.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他将继续在新里诺训练一些最成功的职业拳击手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So what do you do for fun?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你平时有什么娱乐活动？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fun? Well, if I'm not on a job, I love a sip of good scotch, the company of a beautiful woman, or a game of poker. Fuck Caravan.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣吗?嗯，如果我没有工作，我喜欢喝一口上好的苏格兰威士忌，和美女作伴，或者玩扑克。他妈的商队。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only thing about poker is that I can be a little... cantankerous if things don't go my way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打扑克唯一的好处就是我会有点...如果事情不像我想的那样，我就会发脾气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last time I played, some asshole beat my flush with four jacks. Bullshit, right? He started laughing, so I smashed a bottle over his head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 上次我玩的时候，有个混蛋用四个j打败了我的同花，狗屎,对吗?他开始笑，我就拿瓶子砸他的头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was forcefully escorted from the premises, asked not to return. As if I was the first motherfucker to fight in that shithole. Ridiculous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我被强行赶了出来，不准再次入内。好像我是第一个在那个鬼地方打架的混蛋。荒谬。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A wife? You fucking high? No, just... one girl, Mary. Haven't thought about her in... five years? She was special, but it wasn't in the cards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 妻子吗?你他妈的嗑嗨了?没有,只是...一个女孩,玛丽。我还没想过她...五年?她很特别，但已经不可能了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a girlfriend or wife somewhere?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在哪里有女朋友或妻子吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do the job, but I don't get my rocks off by killing people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是干这活的，但杀人不是我的目的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, whatever you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，随你怎么说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you and I are on the same page. It's a rush like no other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和我的想法是一致的。这种冲动是独一无二的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's it, partner. Good to know that we think alike on this issue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就是这样,合作伙伴。很高兴知道我们在这个问题上意见一致。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty +1
aaRussellAskBountyBusinessEnjoyKillingCheckSpeech
By the time I was eighteen, I had over twenty confirmed kills. The fact is... I excelled at killing people, and the rangers respected me for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 到我十八岁的时候，我已经杀了二十多人。事实是...我擅长杀人，游骑兵因此尊敬我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I started with the rangers as a beat-up, starving kid with no prospects. When I discovered my talent for killing, it gave me an identity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚加入游骑兵的时候还是个饥肠辘辘，前途渺茫的孩子。当我发现我的杀人天赋时，它给了我一个身份。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The first part of my life was spent in chains, subserviant to another person, with no will of my own.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我生命的前一部分是在枷锁中度过的，臣服于另一个人，没有自己的意志。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I learned I could alter a man's place in this world, snuff him out, it was the first time I felt power. I would never be a slave again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我知道我可以改变一个人在这个世界上的地位，掐死他，那是我第一次感受到力量。我再也不会做奴隶了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry if I've upset your delicate sensibilities, but I won't apologize for killing my enemies, nor for being damn good at it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我伤害了你的敏感，我很抱歉，但我不会为杀死我的敌人而道歉，也不会为我的演技而道歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not judging you, but the way you talk about it is a little unsettling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是在评判你，但你谈论这件事的方式有点让人不安。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've got good instincts. I'm glad you won't hesitate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的直觉很棒。我很高兴你没有犹豫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't, not ever. You start trying to make excuses for the other guy, he'll take advantage of the opportunity, and then you're dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能，永远不能。当你开始为另一个人找借口，他就会利用这个机会，然后你就死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm working with a psychopath. Great.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在和一个精神病患者合作。太好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a fucking hypocrite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的是个伪君子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Loyalty to aaRussellQuest.Loyalty -1
aaRussellAskBoone01Speech
Fine, it's your crew. I'll knock it off. Just don't expect me to be fucking friends with the guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，那是你的人。我会停止的。别指望我跟他做朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 5
Boone is a valuable part of this team, and your remarks are undermining our cohesion. Stop it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩是我们队伍中很有价值的一员，而你的言论正在破坏我们的凝聚力。停下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having a beef with the Legion is hardly anything special around here. The man is an uptight prick, and I've got every right to voice my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟军团有过节在这里没什么特别的。那人是个保守的混蛋，我完全有权利表达我的意见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You and Boone both hate the Legion. Why can't you just focus on your common interests?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和布恩都讨厌军团。你们为什么就不能专注于你们的共同兴趣呢?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fuck with Boone again, and I'll cook off the rest of your face over a campfire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再敢惹布恩，我就把你剩下的脸烧了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're serious? Fuck me! Christ, I... I just didn't know, ok? I'll stop! Not another word, I promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是认真的吗?他妈的我!基督,我...我只是不知道?我要停止!别再说了，我保证。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 5
aaRussellAskBooneGuns
The guys has good eyes and poise, I'll give him that. I didn't realize you relied on him so much. I'll take it down a notch, chief.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定，这家伙眼光不错，沉着冷静。我不知道你这么依赖他。我会低调一点的，头儿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaRussellQuest.Boone to 5
Boone is an expert spotter and an accomplished marksman, and you know it. We need him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布恩是鉴赏家也是神枪手，你知道的。我们需要他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nevermind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没关系。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRussellMaryWho
She was a caravan guard that I met not long after the treaty, when I was earning my salt as a hired gun. She had hair black as a dream.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是我在条约签订后不久遇到的一个商队守卫，当时我是一名职业枪手，挣着我的薪水。她的头发黑得像梦一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She was tough... hardest fucking woman I ever met, easily could've been a ranger. That's what I loved about her... she didn't compromise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她很坚强...是我见过的最厉害的女人，很容易就当上了游骑兵。这就是我爱她的地方...她从不妥协。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had little interest in guarding caravans until I met her, then I suddenly became invested in the affair. She noticed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在遇见她之前我对保护车队没什么兴趣，然后我突然对这件事投入了感情。她注意到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She called me "Rojo", cause of the beard. Not many redheads where she came from, further south. Fuck, I still remember her eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她叫我罗乔，因为我有胡子。在她的家乡，更南边的地方红头发人不多。妈的，我还记得她的眼睛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were close, but not an actual item. It was strictly physical, according to her. Just a passing pleasure out in the wilds.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们很亲密，但不是真正的伴侣。据她说，那完全是肉体上的。只是野外的短暂乐趣。

ESP.ORIGINAL: See, she already had a man, Faulk. He was a fat fuck who ran the company. Nice guy, but a fucking pussy. He had money, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她已经有男人了，福克。他是个开公司的肥佬。人不错，就是个娘娘腔。不过他有钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm the bad guy, you see? The ugly, crazy bastard that you fuck for fun, but never consider settling down with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才是坏人，明白吗?一个丑陋又疯狂的混蛋，只为了好玩才跟她上床，却从没想过要安定下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once Faulk proposed to her it was a done deal, we had to go our separate ways. I asked her to change her mind... but I wouldn't beg.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦福克向她求婚，这就成了定局，我们就得分道扬镳。我想让她改变主意。但我不会乞求。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I should've begged, just tossed any semblance of pride to the wind... but she might have just laughed at me. God, I loved that bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我应该乞求，把所有的骄傲抛到一边...但她可能只是嘲笑我。天啊，我爱死那个婊子了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No point dwelling on it now. After all, I'll always have my whores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在没必要再纠结了。毕竟，我的妓女永远在我身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, who was Mary?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，玛丽是谁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why did you shoot that man?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么对那家伙开枪？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that Ike was in the middle of a dreadful losing streak, and he elected to blame me for his misfortune.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我恐怕那家伙已经陷入了疯癫状态。自己运气那么倒霉，反而到来埋怨我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The poor soul... he was just too high-strung.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可怜的家伙...他刚刚就是有些兴奋过了头。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why do they call you 'Doc'?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么他们称你为“医生”？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the war I was an orthodontist, and while I've ceased practicing, I still enjoy using the title.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在战争开始前，我是一名医生，然而我早已经停止了那份本职工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It lends weight to the name, don't you agree?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在很享受这个称呼，它为我的名字增添了分量。你同不同意？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm trying to collect the bounty on Red Bear. Do you have any information that could help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想接受关于红熊的赏金行动。你有没有什么可以提供帮助的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need information on Red Bear, zombie. Start talking!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要关于红熊的信息，僵尸。说话！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What an ugly thing to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有个鸟好说的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aadocfridayfaction playerfaction 0 0 setenemy playerfaction aadocfridayfaction 0 0
Where can I find this guy?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪可以找到他？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only inside the bowels of a heavily guarded bunker. It's an unappealing route to Red Bear, but it's a route nonetheless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有在一个严密防御的地堡内部你才能找到他。通往那儿的路途非常险恶，但却是唯一的道路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's the location. Meston should have documentation of his dealings with Red Bear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是所在地点 [他在你的地图上指了指]。梅斯顿一定有和红熊之间交易的记录文件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not privy to the details, but they have been trading for at least a decade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对其中的细节并不清楚，但他们至少已经交往了很长一段时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anything else you can tell me about Meston and Shadow Company?
ESP.TRADUIT: 关于梅斯顿和暗影公司，你还有什么可以告诉我的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They call them "Shadow Company" for a reason. It's a crude, yet accurate description of their secretive nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这家公司被称为“暗影公司”是有原因的。那是一个十分自然而精确的对他们秘密本性的描述。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Various factions rely on them because they conduct all operations with the utmost confidentiality.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有很多集团都依靠他们，因为他们所有的运作都极其隐蔽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Meston, I don't know much about the man, other than he has a tremendous capacity for physical violence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就说梅斯顿吧，我对这个人了解不多，除了他臭名昭著的名声，据说他有一个冲满肢体物品的容器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Rumor has it that the company's profits finance his implants and other unnatural augmentations to the body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有谣言说，他用公司的盈利收集各种植物和非自然器官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And where you find Meston, you'll find his rabid lackey, Mr. Joshua. He's a vicious little cur, and utterly loyal to Meston.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你找到梅斯顿的时候，你自然能找到他的马屁精，约书亚先生。他是一个无恶不作的恶棍，对梅斯顿有着异于常人的忠心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see I haven't dissuaded you. If you manage to survive, I hope you return to the saloon and visit a bit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来我没有必要劝阻你。如果你能活下来，我希望你能回到这个沙龙来，没事和我聊聊天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And one more thing - if you are going to pursue this in earnest, I'd advise you to consult with Mr. Dent, the gentleman sitting at the bar.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，还有一件事，如果你想认真地对待这次行动，我建议你去向登特先生咨询一下。坐在吧里的那个绅士就是他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I believe he's had dealings with Shadow Company in the past, although they were anything but amicable. Farewell, and good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我印象中，他以前和暗影公司有过商业往来。现在的话，他们之间的友好关系早就灰飞烟灭了。好了，再见，祝你好运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaBounties02 18 setobjectivedisplayed aaBounties02 16 1
Do you have any information on Arthur Ribben?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有任何关于阿瑟·里本的消息吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never met him, but I had the chance to interact with his contemporaries.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没见过他，但我曾有机会和他的同伙交流过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever crimes the Enclave perpetrated, I was always impressed by their fastidious approach to oral hygiene, every last one of them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论英克雷犯了多少滔天罪行，我对他们“嘴上的卫生”依然感到十分震惊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for Captain Ribben, I understand he assisted with horrific experiments while serving under Lieutenant Colonel Charles Curling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于里本上尉，我很清楚他为什么参与这些恐怖试验，并同时服务于查尔斯上校。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: By all accounts, Captain Ribben was quite enthusiastic, but fortunately for all of us, some "Chosen One" stopped the whole affair.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总体而言来说，里本上尉是个狂热分子。但对我们而言幸运的是，某个“获选者”终止了这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never quite fathomed the appellations in such legends. Who chose this "one"? I certainly didn't.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从没调查过拥有这个传奇一般称号的人是谁。这个“被选中的人”到底有些什么故事我一点也不知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon me, you didn't inquire into my opinions on wasteland myths. To return to the matter at hand, I have no idea where Captain Ribben might be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 抱歉，我多嘴了，你可没问我关于这些废土传奇的观点。好了，回到我们原来讨论的东西上来，我真的不知道里本上尉会在什么地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: A few rumors persist, and they're dubious at best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我收集到过一些谣言，但听起来完全不值得相信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: One traveler purported that Ribben was now a wild man in the Spring Mountains, and had spawned a pack of feral orphans to do his bidding.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一个旅人说在春泉山看到里本，他养着一群野生的小动物不知道在做些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stranger things have happened, but I'm skeptical nonetheless. In the meantime, I will drink to your success, and bid you good luck in this manhunt.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使更奇怪的事也发生了，我也一点不会怀疑。同时，我将为你即将而来的成功举杯，祝你此次“狩猎”成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([08038180]aaSecondary14) Lathe Biosas EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, one thousand caps it is. We have a deal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就1000个瓶盖。成交。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent! You've made the right choice. And don't worry - this stays between us. You stay safe out there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 好极了！你做了一个相当正确的选择。别担心，这件事除了你我之外再无外人能知道。你放心！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0803BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0803BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary15.RzeznikGreeted to 11 player.additem caps001 1000 player.rewardkarma -50 setstage aaSecondary15 180
aaRzeznikDoorRef.lock 101 Player.moveto RzeznikTPMarker
I don't accept bribes. This is your last chance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不接受这些贿赂。这是你最后的机会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, that was your last chance. I'm sorry we couldn't do business together. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这是你最后的机会。我很抱歉这笔生意泡汤了。再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0803BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0803BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: startcombat player setenemy aaRzeznikFaction PlayerFaction
aaRzeznikDoorRef.lock 101 Player.moveto RzeznikTPMarker
<Bribe Barter Check>
ESP.TRADUIT: <交易检定>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Huh, I really underestimated you. Ok, two thousand caps it is. Now get the hell out of here before you run me out of business, you thief!
ESP.TRADUIT: 额，我真的低估你了。好，就2000个瓶盖。快拿了钱滚，别再妨碍我了，你个小偷！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Adam Rzeznik [0803BEE4] (mod) Quest : ([0803BEE3]aaSecondary15) A Weed that Grows on Every Soil EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSecondary15.RzeznikGreeted to 11 player.additem caps001 2000 player.rewardkarma -50 setstage aaSecondary15 180
aaRzeznikDoorRef.lock 101 Player.moveto RzeznikTPMarker
Make it two thousand and I'm in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 2000个，不是2000个我不干。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your story, Doc?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可以和我讲讲你的故事吗，医生？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up before the war, and was blessed with a strong upbringing and a classical education. Both have served me well in these troubled times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在战争打响前出生，生活在一个团结的家庭里，接受了良好的而优质的教育。这两者对我的影响都很大。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My father died when I was rather young, so my brother Joseph and I were close. That was a lifetime... two lifetimes ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我还很小的时候，我的父亲就死了，因此我的兄弟约瑟夫和我非常亲密。那听起来像是上辈子……不，上上辈子的事了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joseph was taken from me before the war. I don't normally like to speak of it, but it's been so long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约瑟夫在战争打响前从我身边被夺走了。我不想再回顾这段历史了，虽然这还是发生在不久以前的事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Joseph was the sheriff in our hometown. What he lacked in loquacity he made up for in decisiveness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 约瑟夫是我们家乡小镇的警长。尽管他废话特别多，但他执行其任务来非常坚决。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was an honest man - more honest than I ever was, at least. He was a rock - I thought he could never die.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个诚实的人——至少是我见过的最诚实的人。他的体型就像块石头，我觉得死和他根本就不沾边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One weekend a drifter made his way into town, and for no apparent reason killed Joseph. He shot him in the back, they said.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个周末，一个流浪汉来到了小镇，毫无原因地把他杀了。据说，他的后背中了弹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The state police eventually found the perpetrator, a man by the name of Johnny Rounder. He was tried and sentenced to death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 州警最后发现了这个罪犯，一个叫乔尼·朗德的家伙。他后来被判处死刑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He sat on death row for two years, and after countless appeals and delays the execution date was finalized: October 24, 2077.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他坐在牢里一直在等待死亡，整整两年。在数不尽的法庭纠纷和喧闹之后，审判日2077年10月24日突然降临。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a day too late, as things turned out. The airbursts over Ft. Benning produced enough radiation to kill almost everyone shortly afterwards.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事实证明，这一天来得太晚了。空气中巨大的热浪和辐射几乎可以杀死每一个人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I watched my family wither away... my own son turning pale, his hair falling out, crying... I wanted to die with them, but I lingered on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我眼睁睁地看着我的家庭一个接一个倒下……我的儿子脸渐渐发青，头发开始大片大片点脱落……我哭着，痛不欲生，想和他一起死。但那时的我在面对死亡时还非常懦弱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I fell asleep next to my wife as she died, and prayed to die with her. Instead, the next morning I woke up looking at Johnny Rounder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的妻子死后，我倒在她身边睡着了，向上帝祈祷着能陪她一起。然而，第二天我醒来时，却发现乔尼·朗德站在我面前。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was holding Joseph's badge, admiring it like it was a long-lost trophy. He had already changed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他抓着约瑟夫的警徽，以一种欣赏丢失已久的奖杯的眼神注视着它。他已经变了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He just looked at me and said, "Now you've got something to live for, Doc," and then walked away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他看着我，说：“现在，你有活着的理由了，医生。”然后就走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been following that bastard for two hundred years, and it's going to end here. I can feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经追踪那个混蛋快200年了。我有预感，这件事很快就要在这个地方有个了结。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How did you know Steven Randall?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你认识斯蒂芬·兰道尔吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was wanted for questioning in regards to a minor altercation in the adjacent territory. Randall was prompted by his employers to pursue me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我因为在邻近的地区涉嫌参与一场小纠纷被通缉。兰道尔被他的上司派来追查我的踪迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Randall was very professional about the whole affair, and realizing I was a fellow southerner, he was willing to discuss the matter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 兰道尔在这整件事件的处理上非常职业，在意识到我只是个普通的南方平民后，他愿意和我讨论一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We settled it with a card game, which I handily won. Randall was a gentleman about the affair, and left it at that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们之后以一盘扑克定夺，结果我轻松获胜。兰道尔很绅士地认输，然后就离开了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: In case you're wondering whether I cheated, I'll say this - any man who wouldn't cheat when gambling for his freedom is a damn fool.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了以防你指责我作弊，我先声明——任何需要以一场赌博来决定你人生自由的家伙，都会你妈毫不犹豫地作弊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's simply a shame what happened to Randall. He carried himself with a rare combination of strength and calm. He was very poised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于这之后发生的，我感到羞愧。他带着他的为实现的理想永远的沉睡了。他的死真遗憾，真可惜。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And I can tell you that if your profession depends on using a gun, poise counts for more than anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 同时我还想跟你说，如果你遇到什么事都指望手里的这把枪，那么你的姿势永远比其他任何东西都要重要。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have you ever heard of "Mr. Fisk"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过菲斯克这个人么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, he's a key figure in an organized crime syndicate. Supposedly he had extensive dealings with that corpulent pervert, The Judge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他是一个有组织犯罪团伙里的重要成员。据说他以前和一个人高马大的家伙有着大量的生意往来。对了，那家伙人称审判官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The prevailing rumor is that Mr. Fisk has come under significant pressure from his own superiors since you've disrupted their interests.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有流言说，菲斯克在他上级的巨大压力下开始有所行动，因为你搅乱了他们正常的经营秩序。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If Mr. Fisk is removed, it would only exacerbate the power vacuum rendered by the Judge's demise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果菲斯克也被你干掉了，那么由审判官之死引起的愤怒将会迅速加剧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I certainly wouldn't shed tears for either of those bastards, but I worry who might replace them. Nature abhors a vacuum.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我才不为那些混蛋的结局掉一滴眼泪，我担心的是是否有谁会迅速取代他们。通常，道高一尺魔高一丈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about a man named Sergio?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听说过一个叫塞尔吉奥的人么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's a veritable psychopath who places engraved harmonicas in the mouths of slain opponents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个神经病，喜欢在每一个被杀死的对象嘴里放一个精致的口琴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How he acquires such a steady supply of harmonicas and the means to engrave them is beyond me, but that is his monikor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于他从哪弄来这么多口琴，又是如何雕刻得那么精致，这我就不知道了，但他的所作所为令人非常恶心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was born from the same putrid stock as Marko, so villainy is in his bloodlines.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他和马尔科属于属于同一路货色，骨子里处处渗透着恐怖和邪恶。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Marko?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你了解马尔科吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He is an ill-bred, flagitious cur bent on pillaging and destruction. Despite his bucolic origins, he possesses considerable intelligence and cunning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的人性异常扭曲，穷凶极恶，丧尽天良。尽管他的出身于乡下，但他有惊人的智慧和狡诈的心机。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw him on one occasion in the town of Dalhart, a dusty stopover on the plains. He was trading in hides and chattel, an accepted practice there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我曾经在达尔哈特的一个小镇上见过他。那是位立于中部平原的某个灰尘肆意的小镇。他正在交易皮革和奴隶，看起来和一般人没什么区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: His eyes said it all - he had a stare that was more barren and dehumanized than that irradiated steppe. He was young, but I knew what he was.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他的眼睛袒露了一切——他的双眼透露着死寂的凶光，比那些受辐射腐蚀的双眼看起来还要人性泯灭。他看起来很年轻，但我能看得透他内心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He has long since been a pestilence in those parts, though I estimate he is aging by now. It's been... thirty years since I saw him that time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从各个方面来看，他都称得上是一种致命的瘟疫。他现在应该也已经不小了，距上次我见到他……已经过去30年了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If the law doesn't catch him, then time will, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果法律最终无法惩罚他的话，时间会的，我的朋友，因为时间对任何人都是公平的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two hundred years and you still haven't killed him? What gives?
ESP.TRADUIT: 200多年了你始终未能杀死他，为什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've killed each other several times over, if you're measuring pain. He had experience with a pistol, and was able to outduel me... at first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果仅用痛苦来衡量的话，那么我们双方已经相互杀死对方多次了。起初，他曾用一把手枪，在决斗中占了我的优势。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For years, it was just a game... he'd leave me broken and bleeding in some remote spot. But in time the games stopped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对时间而言，这只是场游戏……他令我的人生破碎残缺，独自滴淌着痛苦的鲜血。但是游戏，总会有结束的时候。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was around 2190, I think... we were somewhere in Texas, someplace where they still had trees, near Louisiana.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大约在2190年左右，我们大概在德克萨斯的某个地方，那里长满了树，好像还靠近路易斯安那。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I caught him coming out of the saloon, but it wasn't some craven ambush. I looked him in the eyes first, and then I put a .357 slug in his gut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正好看见他从一家沙龙里出来，而那次并不是什么伏击。看到他的第一眼我就掏出了.357左轮朝他肚子开了一枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He mangled my arm, and managed to get away, thanks to his gang. We've faced off at least a dozen times since then, but never with any resolution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他躲开了，然后压断了我的胳膊，成功跑掉了。那之后我们有打过几次照面，但一次也没有解决掉我们之间的矛盾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the last few years he's been running a gang outside the NCR and Legion's respective territories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在过去的这几年时间，他拉帮结伙，组成了自己的一个帮派，但行动范围始终在NCR和军团的领地之外。

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, with the regional power players and the Judge gone, there is opportunity for a ruthless prick like Johnny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，随着一些近期一些强有势力的人物的死亡，如审判官，对乔尼来说，他现在会感到心头有根刺一样，因为随时可能会要了他的命。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, I know how he thinks. He'll be here, sooner rather than later. If not for the power, than for me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除此之外，我知道他会怎么想。他迟早会来到这个地方的。如果不是为了别的什么事，那就一定是为了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever get a lead on him, look me up. I'd do anything to get another shot at him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你找到指向他的线索，一定记得跟我说，我一定要亲手在他脑袋上射个洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaScullDialogue.DocExplained to 1
Since I'm going after him, do you have any more information on Johnny?
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然我要去追踪他，那么你有没有一些关于他的信息？

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's certainly not lacking in manual celerity, but since I wounded him that time, he can't summon enough courage to face me alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的身手虽然依旧敏捷，但自从我那次伤了他之后，他再也不会有勇气单独面对我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regardless, it would be a fatal error to underestimate him. When the time for action arrives, festina lente.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，任何对他的实力的低估都会造成致命的失误。记住，一旦时机成熟之时，就要立刻抓住。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're no stranger to violence, so you'll be fine once the shooting starts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对暴力已经并不陌生，所以一旦战斗开始你不会感到无所是从。你去好好照顾其他帮派分子，我来亲自对付乔尼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I retrieved your brother's badge from Johnny Rounder.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从乔尼·朗德那里拿回了你兄弟的警徽。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never thought I would see this again. I've never had many friends, courier, but I'd be honored to be yours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从未梦想过我还能再见到它！我并没有多少朋友，邮差，但能成为你的朋友是我一辈子的荣幸。

ESP.ORIGINAL: People talk about you, you know? A veritable dealer of death, through-and-through, so they say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家都在谈论你，你知道吗？一个名副其实的死亡贩子，彻头彻尾的，人们是这么说的。
