ESP.ORIGINAL: I hung up my bounty hunting hat long ago, but hearing the tales they tell of you, makes me... excited, once again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很久以前就挂起了赏金猎人的帽子，但听到他们讲述你的故事，让我...再次兴奋起来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If ever you should need assistance, friend, my gun is yours. All you have to do is say the word, and we shall journey into legend together!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你需要帮助，朋友，我的枪是你的。你只要说出那个词，我们就能一起踏上传奇之旅！

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaFridayBadge 1 setobjectivecompleted aaSecondary21 20 1 player.rewardkarma 50 if aaDocFridayQuest.bDocHireable != 1 Set aaScullDialogue.DocBefriended to 1 set aaDocFridayQuest.bDocHireable to 1 endif
I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Bye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {whimper}<whimper>
ESP.TRADUIT: {whimper}<呜咽>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now, boy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就这些，孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaEpilogue07ChucklesIntercomChamber01Finish
Look at that, Poopsie! This one has a brain!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看那个，poopsie！这个有脑子！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你点事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then by all means, ask away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就千方百计去问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还想问你点别的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What else can I tell you?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎样看待NCR？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was good while it lasted, but Tandi's dream is fading, I'm afraid. The republic is simply too big for its britches.
ESP.TRADUIT: 稳定的时候还不错，但恐怕坦蒂的梦想正在消退。这个共和国实在是太大了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't get me wrong, I've got a real soft spot for the NCR, but I don't see it expanding past the Mojave, at least not for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要误会我的意思，我对NCR很有好感，但我认为它不会扩展到莫哈韦沙漠之外，至少暂时不会。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Personally, I find myself wondering what else is out there. I mean, the Legion will fade away soon enough. What's in Texas? Dixie? The Midwest?
ESP.TRADUIT: 就我个人而言，我发现自己在想还有什么。我是说，军团很快就会消失。得克萨斯州有什么?美国南部呢?中西部地区呢?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR can handle the Legion, but I'm not sure if it could handle someone with their shit together, using real weaponry. Oh, well.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR 可以对付军团，但我不确定它是否可以用真正的武器对付一个人。 那好吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of Mr. House?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对豪斯先生的看法呢？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before the war, I always suspected House was a species of pervert. There's no telling what type of debauchery he's engaged in up in that tower.
ESP.TRADUIT: 战前，我一直怀疑豪斯是个变态。真不知道他在那座塔里都干了些什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: He seemed the sort of man who fancied himself god, or at least god-like. Though there's no denying his brilliance, his hubris is worrisome.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他似乎是那种自以为是神的人，或者至少是像神的人。虽然他的才华无可否认，但他的傲慢令人担忧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What will you do after the Second Battle of Hoover Dam?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第二次胡佛水坝战役后你做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Given my state, I try not to ponder the far future. Some people envy ghouls for our longevity, but even that has its drawbacks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到我的情况，我尽量不去考虑遥远的未来。有些人羡慕食尸鬼长寿，但即使这样也有缺点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unless Lanius and his army of skirts sweeps through, I will stay put. The Mojave suits me, and I would be loathe to abscond prematurely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除非拉尼尔斯和他的军队胜利，否则我就留在这里。莫哈韦沙漠很适合我，我可不想过早地逃跑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your opinion of the Legion?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你对于军团的看法是？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a gang of catamites who ritually sodomize each other with broomsticks. That is the prevailing rumor, anyway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们是一群用扫帚在仪式上鸡奸对方的恶棍。 无论如何，这是盛行的谣言。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear travelers and traders laud the Legion from afar, citing security. They haven't seen a man crucified or children branded like cattle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到旅行者和商人在远方称赞军团的安全。他们没见过有人被钉死在十字架上，也没见过孩子像牛一样被打上烙印。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have, I won't forget it. Malo periculosam libertatem quam quietum servitium. I'll take dangerous liberty over peaceful slavery any day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有，我不会忘记的，“我愿自由而有危险，但不愿安宁而受奴役”，任何时候我都会选择危险的自由而不是安全的奴隶制
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about being a ghoul?
ESP.TRADUIT: 身为尸鬼的感觉如何？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some ghouls constantly bemoan their state, droning on about their decay and prejudice by "smoothskins". I could give a damn what people think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些食尸鬼不断地抱怨他们的状态，唠叨他们的堕落和对“光滑皮肤”的偏见。我才不在乎别人怎么想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will outlive the bigots, and anyone bold enough to upbraid me in public will find themselves in an... unenviable position.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会比那些偏执狂活得更久，任何敢在公众场合责骂我的人都会发现自己陷入......不令人羡慕的位置。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear the grumblings of fanaticism from Jacob Powers and his sort, crying for a ghoul revolution. Hogwash, all of it. He's just a criminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到雅各布·鲍尔斯和他的那种狂热的抱怨，呼喊着一场食尸鬼革命。 都是废话，他只是个罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sadly, courtesy is a fading commodity in the wastes, so I try to dispense it equally to both human and ghoul alike. That is all I have to say on it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可悲的是，礼貌是废物中逐渐消失的商品，所以我试着把它平等地分配给人类和食尸鬼。这就是我要说的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's up with Kate? She doesn't say much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 凯特怎么了？她话不多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's a sweet soul, but unfortunately, English is not her first language. How she came to arrive in North America is still a mystery to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她是个可爱的女孩，但不幸的是，英语不是她的母语。她是如何来到北美的，这对我来说仍然是个谜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would venture to guess that she is of Slavic extraction. I honestly don't know. Our interactions are largely of a... physical nature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我冒昧地猜测她是斯拉夫血统。我真的不知道。我们的互动很大程度上是一种......物理性质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Sergio out of the picture, do you think we'll see a drop-off in banditry?
ESP.TRADUIT: 塞尔吉奥不在了，你认为我们会看到盗匪活动减少吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firstly, please accept my heartfelt thanks for slaying that animal. To answer your question, I would venture to say... maybe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 首先，请接受我衷心的感谢你杀死了那个畜生。为了回答你的问题，我冒昧地说......也许吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: The big-name outlaws know that they're marked men out here, so they'll steer clear. However, some crazies can't be deterred.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那些大名鼎鼎的不法分子知道他们在这里被盯上了，所以他们会避开。然而，有些疯子是无法阻止的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pardon the cliche, but nature abhors a vacuum, and that's what we have now. Somebody will step in to fill it soon enough, mark my words.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请原谅我的陈词滥调，但大自然讨厌真空，这就是我们现在所拥有的。很快就会有人接手的，记住我的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you ever meet Ulysses in any of your travels?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在旅行中遇到过尤利西斯吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to forget him. We nearly came to blows in a saloon near Pahrump. He was the most self-important jackass I've ever met.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想忘掉他。在帕伦普附近的一个酒馆里，我们差点打起来。他是我见过的最自大的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He couldn't play poker without blathering about politics. If they had given Ulysses an enema, he could have been buried in a matchbox.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他不能在不谈论政治的情况下玩扑克。 如果他们给尤利西斯灌肠，他可能会被埋在火柴盒里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: He began moaning about dead nations, and I told him that if he'd been around before the war, we'd have tossed him in a padded room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他开始抱怨死去的国家，我告诉他，如果他在战前就活着，我们会把他扔进软垫病房。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On top of it all, there were vermin residing in his weaves. Every time he sneezed, lice littered the card table. It was revolting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最重要的是，他的衣服里还住着害虫。每次他一打喷嚏，扑克牌桌上就满是虱子。这是令人作呕的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and he refused to doff his mask, so he was doubly indiscernible during the game. After losing a score of denarii, he shambled back outside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对了，他还拒绝摘下面具，所以在比赛中他就更不容易被认出来了。输了二十个银币后，他蹒跚地走回门外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That was the first and last time I saw Ulysses.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是我第一次也是最后一次见到尤利西斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's the toughest person you ever met?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你见过的最坚强的人是谁?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm... I'll have to weigh that. Toughest might be another ghoul I met once, NCR Ranger by the name of Watson. Quiet, surly bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯...我得权衡一下。最坚强的可能是我曾经遇到的另一个食尸鬼，名叫华生的NCR游骑兵。安静,粗暴的混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Folks talk about Joshua Graham and the Judge, but I'd wager that Watson would scalp those twits in a heartbeat. Cold eyes and steady hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们都在谈论约书亚·格雷厄姆和审判官，但我敢打赌华生会瞬间剥下这两个蠢货的头皮。冷酷的眼神和坚定的双手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wasn't around him long, but it was enough to feel him out. Something was off about him... not malign, but just... secretive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然在他身边的时间不长，但已经足够了解他了。他有点不对劲......不是恶意，只是......神秘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's odd is that his partner is the most bombastic, drunken fool I've ever met, another ranger named Josey. He pissed himself and started a brawl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奇怪的是，他的搭档是我见过的最夸夸其谈，最醉醺醺的傻瓜，另一个叫乔西的游骑兵。他撒尿，然后开始打架。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Watson and Josey were good friends, though. You couldn't cross one without agitating the other. Suffice to say Josey did most of the agitating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 华生和乔西是好朋友。你不可能越过其中一个而不刺激另一个。我只想说，大部分都是乔西鼓动的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to like Guts. What's the problem?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像不喜欢古茨。有什么问题吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was silent out of politeness, but since you're inquiring... he's a drooling, hair-hacking meatbag, constantly pissing and growling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我出于礼貌保持沉默，但既然你问了他就是个流着口水，剪着头发的肉饼，不停地撒尿和咆哮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Disgust

ESP.ORIGINAL: That mongrel makes a habit of trying to copulate with my shins, staining my trousers in the process. You'd be better off with a goat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那条杂种狗总是想和我的小腿交媾，结果弄脏了我的裤子。你最好还是养只山羊。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyTravel01Yes
Ok, let's put that Pip-Boy to good use. Here are the coordinates for the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，让我们好好利用下哔哔小子吧。这里是避难所的坐标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [09001121] (mod) Quest : ([09000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: But before we head out there, I want to see this old man for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是在我们去那里之前，我想去亲自去看看这个老人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [09001121] (mod) Quest : ([09000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Puzzled

ESP.ORIGINAL: If he is who he claims to be, I at least want to look him in the eyes, see what sort of man he is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他是他声称的那样，我至少看他一眼，看看他到底是个什么样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [09001121] (mod) Quest : ([09000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Chalk it up to dumb curiosity. Let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这显然是愚蠢的好奇心。我们走吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [09001121] (mod) Quest : ([09000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 1 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleRanged to 1 Set aaBradleyRef.CombatStyleMelee to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 1 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 1 aaBradleyRef.SetIgnoreFriendlyHits 1 aaBradleyREF.evp
set aaBradleyCompanion01.BradleyConvinced to 2 setstage aaInheritance01 35 setally aaBradleyFaction playerfaction SHOWMESSAGE aaBradleyGetPerkMessage Player.addperk aabradleyperk
Sure, let's get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我们走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaInheritance01BradleyHubChoseCut
Fuck, I don't want to do this, but... fuck me! I'm.... I'm sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我不想这么做，但是...我操!我...我很抱歉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Bradley [09001121] (mod) Quest : ([09000ADD]aaInheritance01) The Inheritance EmotionType : Sad

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingDefault to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.IsFollowingLong to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 Player.Removeperk aaBradleyPerk
I want to ask you something.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想询问你一些事情。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do want to know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 想知道什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaRandallNextBounty
ESP.TRADUIT: aa兰道尔下一个赏金

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're off to a good start, then. I've still got a long list of names, so let me know when you're ready for the next target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我们有一个好的开始。我还有一长串的名字，所以等你准备好下一个目标的时候告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaGarzaFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 40 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 200
I killed Garza. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了加尔萨，这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose he kicked his last, then. Serves that savage right. Here's your reward. Come on back when you're ready for the next one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么，我想他踢了人生中最后一条狗。为那个野蛮人服务。这是你的奖励。等你准备好下一个再来吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKickingDogFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 60 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 200
I killed Kicking Dog. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀死了恶腿踢狗，这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes nicknames are just random or nonsensical, but his was dead on. Squirrelly, indeed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时绰号只是随机的或是荒谬的，但他的绰号已经过时了。真是疯了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You played this one smart, and I appreciate it. We're one step closer to Marko, and the townsfolk are starting to... hate us less.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你很聪明，我很感激。我们离马尔科又近了一步，镇民们开始...少恨我们一点了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was excellent work, so here's the bonus, as promised. Get rested and report back when you're ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一项出色的工作，所以这是我们承诺过的奖金。休息一下，准备好后再报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBillBlasiusFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 80 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.RewardXP 250
I killed Bill Blasius in self-defense. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我通过正当防卫杀死了比尔·布拉修斯。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is a time and place to shoot first. Hell, I'm all for shooting first, did it once in a fucking cantina with a smuggler.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时间和地点让你先开枪。见鬼，我完全赞成先开枪，因为我在他妈的酒馆和走私犯一起干过一次。

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, this was not one of those other moments... specifically, it was a time for you to follow instructions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而，这不是其他的时刻。。。具体来说，这是一个让你遵循指示的时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The bonus is gone, but that ain't the point. I need to know I can rely on you when shit starts to get serious around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 奖金没了，但那不是重点。我要知道当这里的事情变得严重的时候我可以依靠你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Soon there's gonna come a time when you can't retard your way through problems, and if you fuck up it will be more than your paycheck that suffers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很快就会有这样一个时刻：你不能迟迟不去解决问题，如果你搞砸了，你的损失将超过你的薪水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now get the fuck out of here, and don't come back until you've pulled your head out of your ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在他妈的滚出去，等你把脑袋从屁股里拔出来再回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBillBlasiusFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 80 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 75
I killed Bill Blasius, but I had to shoot first. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了比尔·布拉修斯，但我必须先开枪。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard... some kind of freak aneurysm, right? Just, uh... don't stare at me, please? Kind of creeping me out right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我听说。。。某种畸形动脉瘤，对吧？只是，呃。。。别盯着我看，好吗？我现在有点害怕。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, here's your pay, bonus included. Come back when you're ready for another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是你的工资，包括奖金。等你准备好另一份工作再回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaBillBlasiusFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 80 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.RewardXP 200
Bill Blasius had an... accident. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 比尔·布拉修斯发生了一个...意外。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know he wasn't as rough as some of the others, but it had to be done. His past was bound to catch up with him at some point.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道他不像其他人那么粗鲁，但这是必须的。他的过去罪行一定会在某个时候抓住他的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you caught your breath with Doolin, because the next one is going to be a bitch. Just let me know when you're ready for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你能和杜林在一起屏住呼吸，因为下一个会是个婊子。你准备好了就告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaOliverDoolinFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 100 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 200
I killed Oliver Doolin. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了奥利弗 杜林。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taking down a crazed super mutant is no small thing, so here's a bonus for seeing it through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 击倒一个疯狂的超级变种人并不是一件小事，所以这里有一个奖励来帮助你度过难关。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When you're ready for more work, just check in with me. The next one is a gunfighter, should be right up your alley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好做更多的工作时，就和我联系。下一个是枪手，应该就在你的掌心里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaPorterFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 120 player.additem caps001 750 Player.RewardXP 200
I killed Porter. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了波特。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent work. Killed him in the same exact way he gunned down so many others... fitting. Here's a bonus for doing it right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好。以他枪杀了那么多人的同样方式杀死他。。。太他妈适合了。这是你做对的奖励。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Come on back when you're ready for the next gig. We're coming down to the last of them, so it's gonna be tough. See ya later.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等你准备好下一场演出再回来。我们快要到最后一个了，所以这会很艰难。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.RewardXP 250
I killed Angel Lee in self-defense. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我用正当防卫的方式杀死了安杰尔·李。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stupid! Goddamn stupid! This bastard would have dueled Jesus Christ if he'd asked, yet you had to bushwhack him like a fucking idiot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 蠢货！你这该死的蠢货！如果他问的话，这个混蛋会和耶稣决斗的，但你不一样，你必须像他妈的白痴一样揍他！

ESP.ORIGINAL: No bonus, that's for fucking sure. Keep it up and we might just have to call the whole fucking thing off! Get the fuck out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有奖金，这他妈的是肯定的。继续这么做，我们可能就得把这一切都搞砸了！他妈的滚出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 75
I killed Angel Lee, but I had to shoot first. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了安杰尔·李，但我不得不先开枪。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally I'd call bullshit, but somehow I believe you. I don't know how you do it, but you can sure put the fear of God in a man.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常我会认为这是胡扯，但不知怎的我相信你。我不知道你是怎么做到的，但你可以肯定地把对上帝的恐惧加迫于一个人身上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: On account of your confidence in this outcome, I'll throw in half the bounty. Come on back when you're ready for work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 考虑到你对这个结果的信心，我将把赏金的一半投进去。当你准备好工作了就回来找我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaLeeFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 140 player.additem caps001 250 Player.RewardXP 100
Lee begged for his life after I wounded him. I convinced him to leave, so he won't be a problem.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我打伤他后，李哀求我放他一条生路。我说服他离开，所以他不会再对我们造成什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Damn, I figured Ketchum would run before he would swallow a bullet. They're fucking scared. They're starting to fear you more than Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: {格兰顿死了}该死，我以为凯彻姆会在他吞下一颗子弹之前就逃跑了。他们真的他妈的很害怕。比起马尔科，他们开始更害怕你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's losing his hold on this place, seeing as to how his men are dropping like flies. We're almost ready to go after him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他失去了对这个地方的控制，看他的人怎么像苍蝇一样掉下来。我们几乎要准备好追他了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This last one is gonna be rough. Get rested and squared away, then check in with me to get the ball rolling. We're almost there, partner.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一个会很艰难。休息一下，整理一下，然后和我一起去打那个混球吧。我们就快到了，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKetchumFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 160 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 200
Ketchum was dead when I found him. He had recently committed suicide. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我找到凯彻姆的时候他就死了。看起来他最近自杀了。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Glanton Dead}Damn, I figured Ketchum would run before he would swallow a bullet. They're fucking scared. They're starting to fear you more than Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: {格兰顿死了}该死，我以为凯彻姆会在他吞下一颗子弹之前就逃跑了。他们真的他妈的很害怕。比起马尔科，他们开始更害怕你了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We've got one name left on our list. I think it's high time we put everything in motion for the final push.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的名单上只剩下一个名字。我想是时候把一切都付诸行动了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaKetchumFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 500 Player.RewardXP 200
Ketchum was dead when I found him. He had recently committed suicide. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到凯彻姆的时候他已经死了。看起来他最近自杀了。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The old scalphunter got scalped. I understand you took him down without any collateral damage. That takes skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个老猎头被割了头皮。我知道你在没有任何附带损害的情况下把他送到了地狱。这可需要技巧！

ESP.ORIGINAL: You earned yourself a nice, fat wad of caps for this one. Only one thing left to do now, partner. We know where Marko is, we just have to get him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为这个赚了一大笔钱。现在只剩下一件事了，伙计。我们知道了马尔科在哪里，而我们只要抓住他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaGlantonFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 10000 Player.RewardXP 250
I killed Glanton. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了格兰顿。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word's already gotten out that he took out a passel of tribal kiddies with him... and you let it happen. Disgraceful, that's what this is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有消息说他带了一群部落小孩。。。然后你就这么眼睁睁的让它发生了。真是可耻，这整件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You fucking earned your caps, didn't you? I hope it was worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你他妈的赚了些瓶盖，不是吗？我希望这是值得的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, we'd best put that behind us, because we've got one name left on our list: Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们最好把它抛在脑后，因为我们的名单上只剩下一个名字：马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.removeitem aaGlantonFinger 1 setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 10000 Player.RewardXP 150
I killed Glanton, but there were some complications. Here's his finger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我杀了格兰顿，但那有一些复杂的事情发生。这是他的手指。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's a tough one, friend. I hate to let him go, as I know you certainly do... but no bounty is worth the lives of kids.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这真的是一次很难的赏金狩猎，朋友。我不想让他走，因为我知道你肯定会。。。但是孩子们的生命比起任何赏金都要有价值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Brookshire won't authorize the bounty, of course, but I can give you a little something for showing a little humanity. You have my thanks for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 布鲁克希尔当然不会批准赏金，但我可以给你一点东西，让你表现出一点人性。谢谢你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, we'd best put that behind us, because we've got one name left on our list: Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，我们最好把它抛在脑后，因为我们的名单上只剩下一个名字：马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got a few preparations to make, so just let me know when you're ready, and we'll round up the posse. The readiness is all, my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还有一些准备工作要做，所以你准备好了就告诉我，我们会把队伍召集起来的。准备就绪，我的朋友。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Main02 190 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.RewardXP 150
Glanton had taken some children as hostages, so I had to let him go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 格兰顿把一些孩子当作人质，所以我不得不放了他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3Side01BrookshireTURNIN
Really? That's surprising. I thought we finally had him nailed down. Guess he moved on to bigger and better things. Probably got scalped by 80's.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真的？这太令人惊讶了。我以为我们终于把他搞定了呢。我猜他是在追求更大更好的东西。可能在80年代帮被割了头皮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least I can check him off of my list. This isn't a full bounty, but I appreciate the fact that you made a good try of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少我可以把他从我的名单上除掉。虽然这不是一个全额的赏金，但我仍然很感激你做了一个好的尝试。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've still got more names on my list, so let me know if you're interested in another job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的名单上还有更多的名字，如果你对另一份工作感兴趣，请告诉我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 20 player.additem caps001 250 Player.RewardXP 75
<Lie> I couldn't find Godwin.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 我找不到戈德温。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excellent. This will be big news back west. Newspapers have been running stories on him for years, always made the Republic look impotent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了。这将是西部大新闻。报纸多年来一直在报道他，总是让共和国显得无能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You certainly earned your pay. I look forward to working with you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是你应得的报酬。我期待着与你再次合作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 20 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.RewardXP 200
Godwin is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 戈德温已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was always a slippery one. Here's a little something for your time, regardless.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他总是很狡猾。不管怎样，这里有些适合你的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 40 player.additem caps001 250 Player.RewardXP 75
<Lie> It seems that Jackson has already left the canyon. I couldn't find any trace of him.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎> 看来杰克逊已经离开了峡谷。我找不到他的踪迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're working out well for us, if I may say so. I have a few more contracts if you're still interested in additional work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我可以这么说的话，你对我们很有帮助。如果你还对额外的工作感兴趣，我还有一些合同。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 40 player.additem caps001 1000 Player.RewardXP 200
I took care of Jackson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我料理了杰克逊了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Two for the price of... one and a half. Sorry, but she was just a target of opportunity. Jackson was the real prize. Excellent work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 两个人有...一个半的价格。对不起，她只是个额外的目标。杰克逊才是真正的奖品。干得好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 40 player.additem caps001 1500 Player.RewardXP 250
I took care of Jackson and Esther.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我料理了杰克逊和以斯帖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That little bastard has a sixth sense, I swear it. You wouldn't believe how many times he's slipped through our fingers. We'll get him another time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个小混蛋绝对有第六感，我发誓。你不会相信他有多少次从我们的指间溜走。我们下次再找他算了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that's everything I have at present. Stick with Randall if you're looking for more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这就是我目前所拥有的一切。如果你想找更多的工作，就跟着兰道尔混吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaNVB3Side01 190 Player.RewardXP 75
<Lie> It seems that Joe Frost skipped town.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>乔·弗罗斯特似乎逃离了这座城市。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know it may not have seemed glorious, but you've done a great service for the NCR. When this is all done I make sure you get a commendation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道这看起来不太光彩，但你为NCR做了很不错的服务。当这一切完成后，我保证你会得到嘉奖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid that's everything I have at present. Stick with Randall if you're looking for more work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕这就是我目前所拥有的一切。如果你想找更多的工作，就跟着兰道尔混吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: player.additem caps001 2000 setstage aaNVB3Side01 190 Player.RewardXP 250
Joe Frost is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 乔·弗罗斯特死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get going.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我得走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now, Cooper.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在就这些，库珀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想谈谈其它的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant pant>
ESP.TRADUIT: <喘气 喘气 喘气>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you a question.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想问你一个问题。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, sure thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 行啊，当然。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Story Topic>
ESP.TRADUIT: <停止话题>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I came up on the family ranch west of New Reno, up in the mountains, you know? It wasn't too much different from here, actually.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从新里诺西部的家庭牧场过来的，在山上，你知道吗？其实和这里没太大区别。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was in the middle of like, seven kids. I had to toughen up quick. People stopped pushing me soon enough, since I was a regular ass-kicker.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我差不多有七个孩子。我得快点坚强起来。人们很快就不再接近我了，因为我是个经常“踢屁股”的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Herding bighorners ain't no life for a killer like me. I left the ranch a few years back, set out guarding caravans and hunting down bounties.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对于像我这样的杀人犯来说，放牧大黄蜂根本不算活着。几年前，我离开了牧场，开始看守商队，猎取赏金。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When I heard that the famous Steven Randall was tracking down Marko, I knew right away where I needed to be. It's my destiny to help you kill Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我听说著名的史蒂文·兰道尔正在追踪马克时，我立刻知道我该去哪里。我的命运是帮助你杀死马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bStory to 1
Where are you from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来自哪里？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you hope to gain from bounty hunting?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你希望从赏金狩猎中得到什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's the caps, enough to set me up for life. I heard you getting all rich from Randall's bounty hunting back in Vegas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有瓶盖，多到足以让我活下来。我听说你从兰道尔在维加斯的赏金狩猎中发了一笔横财。

ESP.ORIGINAL: After all this is done, I'm gonna be neck-deep in pussy, no question about it. Girls love confidence. I might even start my own bounty hunting firm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这一切都结束后，我会陷入小穴的，毫无疑问。女孩都喜欢自信的男人。我甚至可以开自己的赏金猎头公司。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might even let you work for me when I get everything set up. Of course, I'd be the fucking boss, and I wouldn't take none of this mercy nonsense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我安排好一切的时候，我甚至可以让你为我工作。当然，我会是他妈的老板，我不会接受你这种仁慈的胡说八道。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We'd be the greatest bounty hunting business in history! We might even kill Lanius himself!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们将成为历史上最伟大的赏金猎手！我们甚至可以亲手杀了拉尼厄斯！

ESP.ORIGINAL: How can I make the best use of your skills?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你究竟有哪些得意的本领？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I grew up shooting geckos on the farm, so I'm pretty good with a gun. I'm actually one of the best shots around. That's what everybody else tells me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从小在农场里射杀壁虎，所以我很会持枪。我是最棒的射手之一。其他人都这么跟我说。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can use a blade, too. This one time, I was visiting this saloon, and there were like three hobos... and they all jumped me!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也很会刀。有一次，我去这家酒馆，那里有三个流浪汉。。。他们都向我走来！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was all like, pht, pht, pht, yeah, you want some of this? And they were like, "Oh, no, don't kill me. You're so cool."
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就像这样，乒，乒，乓，是的，你想尝尝这个吗？而他们说，"哦，不，别杀我。你太酷了。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 1
Because of my balls, that's why. I'm also fucking smart. I'm talking street smart. I'm a goddamn street genius, I can read people a mile away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我有种，没别的了。我他妈的也很聪明。我说的是街头智慧。我可是个街头天才，我能在一英里外读懂人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day I'll be remembered as the greatest killer ever, maybe even better than you and Randall. You wait and see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总有一天我会被人们记成是有史以来最伟大的杀手，也许比你和兰道尔都要好。你等着瞧吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 3
Why do you think you're such an effective killer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么认为你是个有效的杀手？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is some kind of like... a fucking test, isn't it? You're trying to mind-fuck me with proctology? I'm a born killer, nothing else for me to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这有点像。。。这他妈的是个测试，不是吗？你是不是在用直肠病学来动摇我的观念？我可是个天生的杀手，而且我可没别的事可做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: People talk about rangers and centurions, they don't scare me. You know I kicked the shit out of a ranger once?
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们谈论游骑兵和百夫长，但他们吓唬不到我。你知道我曾经把一个游骑兵打出屎么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was in a bar outside Reno. Some ranger came in, started laying hands on the bartender, Pam. I told him to knock it off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是在里诺外面的酒吧里。有个游骑兵走了进来，开始动手打那儿的酒保，帕姆。我叫他停下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He said, "I'm a Ranger, you little maggot." And I told him, "I'm Ford, the famous bounty hunter." I could tell he was scared.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他说，"我是一个游骑兵，你这个小蛆。"我告诉他，"我是福特，著名的赏金猎人。"我可以看出他被吓到了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went for his pistol, but I shot it out of his hand. So we squared off, and he gave me his best shot!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他去拿手枪，但我开枪从他手里把它打掉了。所以我们摆好了肉搏的架势，他给了我他最好的一下！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pow! Right in my kisser. I didn't even flinch. Then I gave him the palm strike of death, like this! <He twirls about while flailing his arms>
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘭！就在我的嘴上。但我甚至没有动一下，因为我根本不怕他。然后我给了他致命一击，就这样！<他一边旋转一边挥舞手臂>

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could've broken his neck, but I held back. One hit was all it took to knock him out. Then Pam kissed me, and we fucked in her room. Rangers, pfft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本可以折断他的脖子，但我忍住了。只要一拳就能把他打倒了。然后帕姆吻了我，我们就在她的房间做爱了。呵，游骑兵(轻蔑的态度)。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaFordQuest.bKiller to 4
Have you ever considered doing something other than bounty hunting? You might not be cut out for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你有没有考虑过除了赏金狩猎以外的其他事情？你可能不适合干这行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you feel about working for the NCR?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得为NCR工作怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's the best. I would've enlisted, but I have a minor asthma condition. Doesn't mean I can't hack it, though. Nobody fucks with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是最好的。我本想参军的，但我有点哮喘。但并不意味着我不能容忍它。没人能搞烂我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The best thing about the NCR is freedom. You accept it, or we'll fuck you in the ass. Pretty soon we're going to fuck the Legion, too. You watch.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR最棒的地方就是自由。你接受吧，否则我们就操你的屁股。很快我们也要操军团了。你等着好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Man, they're all pussies except the bear. NCR is a fucking supertastic system that will bring law and order, and I'm going to help them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 伙计，除了熊，他们都是娘娘腔。NCR是一个他妈的超级系统，它将带来法律和秩序，而我将帮助他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sister's Legion is a bunch of fucking weirdos who stick rods up their asses for pleasure. They better not try that on me, or I'll fuck them first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 婊子军团是一群他妈的怪人，他们为了享乐而把自己的屁股竖起来。他们最好别这样对我，否则我会先操他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I heard about this guy named House. He drinks piss and throws puppies from some tower in New Vegas. True fucking story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我听说过一个叫豪斯的人。他喝着尿，从新维加斯的某个塔上扔小狗。这可是真事！

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think of the different factions in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得莫哈维的不同派系怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're trying to like, mind-fuck me, aren't you? Won't work. I am the greatest mind-fucker of all time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是不是尝试，让我混淆是吧？这不会起作用的。我可是有史以来最伟大的疯子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have so much fucking charisma that random women just walk up and ask permission to suck my cock. I'm a giant fucking pussy magnet, I can't help it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我他妈的魅力太大了，随便哪个女人都会走上前去请求我的允许。我他妈是个巨大的吸铁石，我可情不自禁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have to ask - do you really believe the things you're saying?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不得不问-你真的相信你说的话吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: They learned to fear me right from the start since I'm a killer. I'm not afraid to criticize em', either. They respect my advice, because I am smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们从一开始就害怕我，因为我是个杀手。我也不怕批评他们。他们尊重我的建议，因为我很聪明。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One time this guy got in my face cause I told him he was dressed like a girl. I punched him in the balls and he started crying like a bitch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一次这家伙因为我告诉他他穿得像个婊子似的而惹我生气。我揍了他一拳，他哭得也像个婊子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nobody fucks with me, cause they know I'll punch them in them in the dick, if they're lucky. Piss me off good and I'll show you my killer side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人能干死我，因为他们知道如果他们幸运的话，我会揍他们一顿。把我惹火了，我会让你看到我杀手的一面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do you get along with the other bounty hunters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你和其他赏金猎人相处得怎么样？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have the spirit of a deathjaw, and when I'm stirred up good and proper I'll unleash the animal inside me. Nothing can stop me then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一种死颚的精神，当我被良好和适当地唤醒时，我会释放我体内的动物本能。没有什么能阻止我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's like I'm possessed by some demon, and I just kill everything I see. All my enemies piss their pants and flee, sort of like in the novels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像我被恶魔附身了，我把看到的一切都杀了。我让所有的敌人都尿裤子逃跑了，就像小说里那样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm a mind-fucking whirlwind of bullets and mayhem, sent by Jesus Christ to make the world right. It is in the bible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是一个让人胆寒的子弹和混乱的旋风，是耶稣基督为了让世界变得正确而派来的。这就写在圣经里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this "Killer Side"?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这"杀戮之间"是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because I'm the fucking best! I've seen and done it all. People should be honored when I take a shit on them. End of story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为我他妈是最棒的！我都看过了，都做过了。当我对他们大动干戈的时候，他们应该受到尊敬。故事结束了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My words are like gold nuggets that I shoot from my dick with the speed of a tornado, smashing your face with truth. {Pleased with himself}Yeah.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的话就会从我的鸡巴像龙卷风的速度一样射出来金块，用真理砸碎你的脸。{对自己很满意}是的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why are you so critical of everyone and everything around you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么对周围的人和事都这么挑剔？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm scared of Jesus and {Struggling to recall name}Doctor... Doctor Duluth? I can't remember his name. They say he roams the wastes with deathjaws and zombies at his side.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我害怕耶稣和{努力回忆名字}医生。。。德卢斯医生？我记不起他的名字了。他们说他在废土里游荡，死颚和僵尸在他身边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear he hunts children and rapes them in power armor, then sends roaches to eat their corpses. True fucking story. That shit scares me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他猎杀孩子，强暴他们，然后派蟑螂吃掉他们的尸体。这他妈的是真事。那鬼东西吓到我了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Regaining confidence}You know, of course, I'd still kill him. I'd shoot his dick off and make him eat it, just like that other guy.
ESP.TRADUIT: {重拾信心}你知道，当然，我还是会杀了他。我会把他的鸡巴射下来让他自己吃了，就像那个人一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is there anyone that you're afraid of?
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你害怕的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your braggadocio suggests a raging superiority complex. You need to take it down a notch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的自吹自擂意味着一种强烈的优越感情结。真是自卑，你得把它降低一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Look, you can stow all your fancy book learnings. I am from the school of hard knocks, I don't need no book smarts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？听着，你可以把你所有花哨的书本知识都收藏起来。我来自艰苦的学校——死斗，所以我不需要书本知识。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whatever, bub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，随你便了，伙计。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No whatever about it. One day I'm gonna be the best bounty hunter who ever lived. Then they'll be writing dime novels about me. You'll see.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么不管怎么样的东西。总有一天我会成为世上最棒的赏金猎人。然后他们会写很多关于我的廉价小说的。你会明白的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand you completely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我完全理解你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew you would. One day, when I'm king of this wasteland I'll make sure to remember how you accepted my wisdom in these moments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会的。总有一天，当我是这片废土的国王时，我会记得你是如何在这些时刻中接受我的睿智的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a disease.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真是人类的一种恶疾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If there was a disease making you badass, you'd be right. Maybe that's exactly what I am. I infect people with fear because they know I'm a killer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果有一种疾病能让你变成了混蛋，你是对的。也许我就是这样。我用恐惧感染人们，因为他们都知道我是个牛逼的杀手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please explain how you'll kill Marko.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请解释你将如何杀死马尔科。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's gonna be just like in the novels. We'll meet in a street, and he'll have my girlfriend hostage. You know, I don't have one yet, but I will soon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就像小说里那样。我们会在街上碰头，他会把我女朋友当作人质。你知道的，虽然我还没有一个，但我很快就会有的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll say, "You can't beat me, Ford. I heard you're a dangerous killer, but I have Satan in this pistol." And I won't even flinch.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会说，"你赢不了我，福特。我听说你是个危险的杀手，但我把撒旦放在这把手枪里。"而我甚至都不会退缩一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll say, "The forces of evil won't save you, evildoer." He'll draw, but I'll be faster, and I'll put a bullet right through his heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会说，"那邪恶的力量救不了你，邪恶的人。"他会拔枪，但我会加快我的速度，我会用子弹射穿他的心脏。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I'll whip out my footlong cock and begin pissing on his face and I'll be like, "This is for Randall, you devil worshipper!"
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我就把我那只有脚那么长的鸡巴抽出来，开始在他脸上撒尿，然后我会说，"这是给兰道尔的，你这个魔鬼崇拜者！"

ESP.ORIGINAL: He'll be all like, "That's the biggest dick I've ever seen. You won." My girlfriend will fling herself at me and we'll fuck right on top of his body!
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会说，"那是我见过的最大的鸡巴。你赢了。"我的女朋友会朝我扑过去，然后我们就在他身上做爱！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've come to realize that most everything you say is unadulterated bullshit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我逐渐意识到你说的大多数话都是一派胡言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very funny. My older brother Tommy used to call me a liar until I did a roundhouse kick to his throat. You wanna see my kick? <He flails about>
ESP.TRADUIT: 很有趣。我哥哥汤米过去常叫我骗子，直到我狠狠地揍了他一顿。你想看我的踢技吗？<他开始到处猛踢>

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's just disgusting, even if it is a complete lie.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那太恶心了，即使这只是个彻头彻尾的谎言。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't handle the hard, gritty reality of it. I thought you were a real bounty hunter. Maybe you're going soft.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你无法面对这艰难的现实。我还以为你是个真正的赏金猎人呢。也许你变得软弱了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for clarifying that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你的澄清。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got it, anytime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你懂了，随时都行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm pretty familiar with ballistic trauma inflicted by shotguns, and your story is ludicrous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很熟悉散弹枪造成的弹道创伤，你的故事真的很可笑。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You weren't even there. He ate his own dick, swallowed like it was a bloody hot dog. The whole town saw it, and they were cheering.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你甚至都不在那里。他吃了自己的鸡巴，吞得像个热狗一样。全镇的人都看到了，而他们为此欢呼着。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaNVB3EndingTopic01Intro
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题01导入

ESP.ORIGINAL: Their actions had reshaped Frosthill and irrevocably changed the fortunes of numerous inhabitants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们的死斗，行动深深地改变了霜地的面貌，并且不可挽回地改变了无数居民的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic01 to 2 if (aaCockerCuttyMetQuest.CockerCuttyMet == 1) aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill else aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana endif
aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局吉尔主题02

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shortly before the massacre at Frosthill, an argument between Cocker and Cutty resulted in Cutty actually walking the fuck out the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 就在霜地惨案发生前不久，科克尔和卡蒂之间的一场争吵导致卡蒂真的走出了他们的家门。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic02 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic02Jill
aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题03达娜

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Freeside Suicide}Unable to retain ownership of the family farmstead, Dana soon uprooted and moved to Westside in the hopes of finding gainful employment.
ESP.TRADUIT: {自由城自尽}由于无法保留家庭农庄的所有权，达娜很快就背井离乡，搬到了西区，希望能找到一份有报酬的工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic03 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic03Dana
aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题04杜林

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed by player}Unsung and soon forgotten, Doolin was just another notch in the Courier's belt.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死}生死不明，并很快就被遗忘了，杜林只是邮差腰带上的另一个刻痕罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic04 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic04Doolin
aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题05波特

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed by player}For all his rage and ferocity, Porter could not cope with the Courier's fatal attack.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死}尽管他狂怒凶残，波特还是无法应付邮差的致命攻击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic05 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic05Porter
aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题06李

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Killed by player}Though sure of himself at the time, Lee's decision to fight the Courier resulted in quick death.
ESP.TRADUIT: {被邮差杀死}虽然当时对自己很有信心，但李与邮差作战的决定，导致了他的快速死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic06Lee
His cadaver was dumped on the outskirts of town, where it was torn asunder and consumed by local predators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的尸体被丢弃在城郊，在那里被撕碎，并当地的捕食者吃掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 2 if (GetQuestCompleted aaNVB3Side01 == 1) aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin else aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford endif
Fearful of incurring the Courier's wrath, Lee became a librarian in a small town. He never raised his hand in violence again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于害怕招致邮差的愤怒，李成了一个小镇的图书管理员。他再也没有尝试过施暴了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 2 if (GetQuestCompleted aaNVB3Side01 == 1) aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin else aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford endif
Before Lee fired a shot, a round from Ranger Watson's revolver ploughed through his brain, killing him instantly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在李开一枪之前，游骑兵沃森的左轮手枪的一发子弹就穿透了他的大脑，让他当场死亡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic06 to 3 if (GetQuestCompleted aaNVB3Side01 == 1) aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin else aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford endif
aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
{Survives, continues making bombs}Godwin continued raising bighorners while secretly manufacturing mail bombs sent to NCR offices.
ESP.TRADUIT: {幸存下来，并继续制造炸弹}戈德温在秘密制造寄给NCR办公室的邮件炸弹的同时，继续放牧大角羊。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic07 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic07Godwin
aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题弗罗斯特08

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Alive}Frost continued to move from town to town, always vigilant against the threat of assassination.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着}弗罗斯特继续从一个城镇搬到另一个城镇，时刻警惕着暗杀的威胁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic08 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic08Frost
aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题09福特

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Dead}Ford's dream of becoming a wasteland legend died with him in Frosthill when he met the Courier's wrath.
ESP.TRADUIT: {死亡}福特想成为荒原传奇的梦想在他遇到了邮差的怒火时，与他一起被埋葬在了霜地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic09 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic09Ford
aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题10库帕

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Alive}Like the Courier, Cooper survived the ordeal of near-death, and became closer to his new master as a result.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着}像邮差一样，库珀在濒死的折磨中幸存下来，并因此与他的新主人更加亲近。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic10Coopers
He followed the Courier to the Mojave, determined to remain a loyal companion, no matter the end.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他跟着邮差来到莫哈维废土，决心不管结局如何，都要做一个忠诚的伙伴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
It is said that a mysterious traveler buried Cooper next to his former owner, Steven Randall.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据说一位神秘的旅行者把库珀葬在了他的前主人史蒂文 兰道尔的旁边。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic10 to 2 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题11伊瑟

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Left Alive, Jackson Alive}Esther acknowledged the Courier's mercy as an opportunity to finally turn away from her criminal past and focus on her new family.
ESP.TRADUIT: {活着，杰克逊也是}以斯帖承认邮差的仁慈，作为一个机会，她终于摆脱她的犯罪过去，专注于她的新家庭。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic11 to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic11Esther set SomeguyMaster.EstherStatus to 3
aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
ESP.TRADUIT: aaNVB3结局主题12索恩

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Doesn't go home, resumed work with Followers}Just north of the Mojave, Thorne said his goodbyes to the Courier and headed towards the setting sun.
ESP.TRADUIT: {没有回家，继续与追随者工作}就在莫哈维北部，索恩向邮差道别，朝着落日走去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaNVB3Ending.Topic12bThorne to 1 aaNVB3NarratorREF.SayTo Player aaNVB3EndingTopic12bThorne
Whatever its faults, I'm partial to democracy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管它有什么缺点，我都偏爱民主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, no shit, that's NCR. Accept it or we fuck you. I fucking love democracy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，不开玩笑，那就是NCR。接受它吧，否则我们会操你的。我他妈的爱民主。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would rule as a dictator.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会以独裁者的身份统治。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha! You'd fuck it all up in a week. The people would revolt and feed you to the dogs, no doubt about it. I'd rule forever, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈！你一周内就会把事情搞砸的。毫无疑问，人们会反抗，把你喂给狗吃。不过，我会永远统治世界的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd kill everyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会杀了所有人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Uncertain, faking humor}That's a good one... heh. You know, I think we should keep moving.
ESP.TRADUIT: {不确定，假装幽默}这是一个很好的。。。嘿。你知道，我认为我们应该继续前进。

ESP.ORIGINAL: My first act as mayor would be to shoot you in the face.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我做市长的第一件事就是朝你的脸开枪。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd fucking miss, and then I'd shoot you in the face! Then I'd get a medal from the NCR and a parade, and then we'd make your death a holiday. Ha!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会他妈的打偏，然后我会朝你脸上开枪的！然后我会得到NCR的奖章和游行，然后我们会让你的死成为一个节日。哈！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不在乎。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Seem that's your problem. You act like you don't give a fuck, but deep down you do. Are you listening to me? This is important!
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来这就是你的问题。你表现得好像一点也不在乎，但内心深处你是在乎的。你在听我说吗？这很重要！

ESP.ORIGINAL: To hell with governments.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让政府见鬼去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's crazy talk. Are you one of those... antichrists? You have to have government, like the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那真是疯子的话。你是那种。。。反基督者？你必须有一个政府，比如NCR。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Shut up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 闭嘴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, government is important, and you should listen to me. You have an obligation to hear my opinions and agree, at least if you're smart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，政府很重要，你应该听我的。你有义务听取我的意见并同意，至少如果你聪明的话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaJoseyCurrentMission
Look at you, delivering babies and saving people left and right. We just gonna have to put some wings on you, let you fly up to heaven, ain't we?
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看你，接生，救人。我们只需要给你戴上翅膀，让你飞上天堂，不是吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you ascend to sainthood, we got one other matter that'll take your mind off of that real quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你升为圣徒之前，我们还有一件事可以让你很快忘掉这件事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Big group of Cazadores been stinging and killing the slaves coming over. Go over and kill them old bug things.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一大群猎蜂一直在杀死前来的奴隶，去解决那些老虫子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They're a real pain in the ass, you know. Just shoot 'em, smash 'em, usual kind of bullshit. Don't get stung or you fucking die. That's about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 它们真的很讨厌，你懂的。射它们，砸它们，就像平常一样。别被蜇了，不然你就死定了，就这些。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaTBA01 75
I helped the slave deliver her baby.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我帮那个奴隶接生了她的孩子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's damn good. Nobody likes them damn devil bugs. We've got a little bit before Legion comes on in, so get your shit together.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这可太棒了，没人喜欢这些该死的臭虫。军团来之前我们还有点事，所以你得帮我收拾好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Final steps and all that... take a shit, jerk off, whatever you gotta do. Let me know when you ready to get dug in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后的步骤...拉屎，打飞机等等，随便你怎么做。准备好了就告诉我一声。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want, you can have a little chat with old butter bars over there or anybody else, give 'em a little pep talk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你愿意，你可以跟那边的老黄油棒或者其他人聊聊，给他们打气。

ESP.ORIGINAL: setstage aaTBA01 85
I killed all of the Cazadores.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我摧毁了猎蜂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTBAIntroSlidesTOPIC01
We got a ways to go, so listen up. Ain't no secret that the Legion treats slaves like dogshit. Pretty much the norm all through their territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们还有很长的路要走，听好了，军团对待奴隶就像对待狗屎，这不是什么秘密。在他们的领地里，这几乎是常态。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaFUCKMESLIDEREF.disable set aaTBAIntroSlides.Topic to 3 aaTBANarratorREF.Say aaTBAIntroSlidesTOPIC01
That continued until some fellah named Spartacus figured they'd had enough of their old bullshit. Rose up and formed a slave army, kicked ass.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一直这样，直到有个叫斯巴达克斯的家伙觉得他们受够了以前的鬼话，奋起组建了一支奴隶军队，狠狠地揍了他一顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaTBAIntroSlides.Topic to 4 aaTBANarratorREF.Say aaTBAIntroSlidesTOPIC01
Though it ain't clear why, the slave army got split up. Legion took the opportunity to chew 'em up one piece at a time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然还不清楚原因，但奴隶军队分裂了。军团抓住机会把它们一块一块地吃掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaTBAIntroSlides.Topic to 5 aaTBANarratorREF.Say aaTBAIntroSlidesTOPIC01
Since then, we've gotten reports that a big bunch of slaves is heading towards the Colorado, with a Legion army right on their tail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 从那以后，我们接到报告说一大群奴隶正朝科罗拉多河进发，身后跟着一支军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaTBAIntroSlides.Topic to 6 aaTBANarratorREF.Say aaTBAIntroSlidesTOPIC01
That's why we're heading to, yes, thank you Watson, FOB Omega, so that we can watch for the slaves, and if need be, stand tall against the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是为什么我们要去，是的，谢谢你，沃森，欧米茄前线作战基地，这样我们就可以监视奴隶，如果需要的话，我们可以挺身对抗军团。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTBAEndingCutty

{Cutty and Cocker both survive - publish book and resume cutting hair}Having defended their position and survived against overwhelming odds, Cocker and Cutty emerged from battle with a new lease on life.
ESP.TRADUIT: {卡蒂和科克都活了下来 - 出版了书籍并继续理发}在捍卫了自己的地位并战胜了压倒性的困难后，科克尔和卡蒂从战斗中重生了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTBANarratorREF.SayTo Player aaTBAEndingCutty
{Cutty dies - Cocker becomes taskmaster NCO}Devastated by the death of his comrade, Cocker was consumed by hatred for the Legion and became obsessed with discipline.
ESP.TRADUIT: {卡蒂死了 - 科克尔成为军士长}由于战友的阵亡，科克尔被对军团的仇恨所吞噬，并沉迷于训练。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTBANarratorREF.SayTo Player aaTBAEndingCutty

{Cocker dies - Cutty starts charity for wounded and homeless veterans}Cutty was never again seen in NCR, but the legend of a murderous mutant who quietly butchered Legionaries would endure for years in Arizona.
ESP.TRADUIT: {科克尔死了 - 卡蒂开始赈济伤员和家属}卡蒂再也没有出现在NCR中，但关于一个悄悄屠杀军团士兵的凶残变种人的传说将在亚利桑那州持续多年。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ;NEXT SLIDE aaTBANarratorREF.SayTo Player aaTBAEndingSlaves
aaTBAEndingCourier
{Male}By standing with the garrison of FOB Omega and safeguarding hundreds of helpless slaves, the Courier managed to exorcise some of the demons of Utah.
ESP.TRADUIT: {男}通过与欧米茄前线作战基地的守军一起保护数百名奴隶，邮差设法驱逐了犹他州的恶魔。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaTBANarratorREF.SayTo Player aaTBAEndingCourier
How's the army treating you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在部队里过得怎么样?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, imagine that you're like, a puppy. Really happy... and then a bunch of ants start ripping your skin off and eating you alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，把你想象成一只小狗。很高兴......然后一群蚂蚁开始剥你的皮，把你活活吃掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, and it's fucking hot, and you get fed shit all the time. That pretty much sums it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这里太他妈热了，而且你总是吃屎。差不多就是这样了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, I don't want to insult you, but that's a pretty fucking stupid question. I could have snowmen there. It was nice and cold.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不想侮辱你，但这是个很蠢的问题。我可以在那里堆雪人。天气很好，很冷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: People complain about cold... all you got to do is put a fucking jacket on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 人们抱怨寒冷......你只要他妈穿件外套就行了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, a hundred fucking thousand degrees, you could be butt ass naked and you're still gonna feel like you're in the pits of hell!
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这里，十万度的高温，就算你光着屁股你还是会觉得自己在地狱里!

ESP.ORIGINAL: No fucking snowmen...I can't even build a fucking sand castle-man-person-thing! I fucking miss my snowmen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有他妈的雪人...我甚至连个沙堡都造不出来!我他妈想念我的雪人了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You miss Frosthill?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你想念霜山？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What have you been up to since you left Utah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你离开犹他州后都在做什么?

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's basically been a lot of marching and waiting, and being treated like a piece of shit most of the time, yeah, that's basically what it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 基本上就是行军和等待，大多数时候被当成一坨屎，是的，基本上就是这样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCuttyCutHair
Absolutely! I really miss cutting hair. This is gonna be great!
ESP.TRADUIT: 绝对的!我真的很怀念剪头发的日子，那太棒了!

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbarbermenu
I'd like a haircut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想理发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaCockerCutHair
Just tell me how you want it, and I'll make it happen!
ESP.TRADUIT: 只要你不要求高腰紧身衣，就行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: showbarbermenu
I'd like a haircut.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想理发。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You feeling all right about the battle?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得这场战斗还好吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure! I'm just gonna face certain death for a bunch of hobos that probably hate and despise me as a supermutant, but fuck it, that's life, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然!我要为一群可能憎恨鄙视我这个超级变种人的流浪汉面对死亡，但管他的，这就是生活，对吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: In all seriousness, I've been through worse. Remember, I was in the Master's fucking army... bunch of guys in skirts throwing spears... kiss my ass!
ESP.TRADUIT: 说真的，我经历过更糟的。记得吗，我他妈在主教的军队里...一群穿着裙子扔长矛的家伙...吻我的屁股!

ESP.ORIGINAL: What was that? Sorry, I've got this ringing shit in my hear, I can't fucking hear anything. Goddamn, that was crazy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是什么?抱歉，我耳朵里响个不停，我什么都听不见。该死，太疯狂了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey, thanks for sticking it out with us. You know, I don't know if we'd have made it without you, so... really, thank you, and...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，谢谢你陪我们坚持到最后。我不知道没有你我们能不能撑过去，所以...真的，谢谢，还有......

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever need a haircut, just look me up in some place where it's hot and shitty, and you'll find me there, most likely.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想剪头发，就去一个又热又脏的地方找我，我很可能就在那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess this is it. I'm heading back to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候了，我要回莫哈韦去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I gotta bury my friend now... then I'm gonna kill some fucking Legion. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在要埋葬我的朋友...那我就去杀一个军团。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess this is it. I'm heading back to the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想是时候了，我要回莫哈韦去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ready for this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess the best part about dying... is that I won't have to be in this fucking shithole next to Cutty anymore. So yes, I'm fucking ready.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想死亡最好的部分...就是我不用再和卡蒂待在这个破地方了。所以，是的，我他妈的准备好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Am I holding up okay? Well, I've got shrapnel in my ass... and I've been shot at, nearly had my head cut off...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还撑得住吗?我屁股里有弹片...我还中过枪差点被砍下脑袋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And now Cutty's farting again in the foxhole. So yes, I guess I'm A-fucking-okay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在卡蒂又在散兵坑里放屁了。所以是的，我想我他妈还行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Excuse me, just a little battle fatigue, as they say. Thank you for your help. You need anything, just look me up. Take care of yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不好意思，就像他们说的，有点战争疲劳。谢谢你的帮助，需要什么尽管来找我。照顾好自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You holding up okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: Cutty's dead. Nothing more to say. Goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 卡蒂死了，没什么好说的了。再见。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You holding up okay?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还好吧?

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaKOTRAnnounceEnd
{Successful TITLE DEFENSE}Ladies and gentlemen, we have a winner... the champ!
PlaySound aaPittCheer01
startquest aaKOTRTimer02 set aaKOTRTimer02.DoOnce to 0 PlaySound aaPittCheer03
aaFordGenericGoodbye
You got it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我马上照办。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSaveBradley01
Look, I don't want to waste your time or mine. Are you sure about this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我不想浪费你我的时间。你有把握吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I might be able to make a Chem that'll make you appear dead. That should be enough to fool them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该能制造一种能让你看起来像死人的化学药品，这应该能骗到他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSaveBradleyYES
Fuck, I... Can't see straight...
ESP.TRADUIT: 操，我...我看不清楚...

ESP.ORIGINAL: set aaSaveBradleyQuest.Saved to 1 set aaSaveBradleyQuest.Rendevouz to 1 set aaSaveBradleyQuest.Fatigue to 1 Set aaBradleyREF.Waiting to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.L38 to 0 Set aaBradleyREF.HasBeenHired to 0 aaBradleyREF.SetPlayerTeammate 0 Player.Removeperk aaBradleyPerk aaBradleyREF.evp aaBradleyREF.resetai

player.rewardkarma 50 aabradleyref.setav fatigue -1000
setobjectivecompleted aaInheritance01 70 1 setstage aaInheritance01 80 showmessage aaBradleyKilledMessage aaHubDoorRef.unlock set aaInheritance01.ChoseCut to 2 aaBradleyREF.setunconcious
<1 Buffout, 1 Jet, 1 Med-X> I'm sure. We'll rendevouz in Freeside when this is all over, alright?
ESP.TRADUIT: <1壮大灵、1杰特、1放射线-X>我确定。等这一切都结束了，我们在自由城会合，行吧？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我操...

ESP.ORIGINAL: <1 Buffout, 1 Jet, 1 Med-X Needed> Fuck, I don't have the right ingredients.
ESP.TRADUIT: <需要1壮大灵、1杰特、1放射线-X>妈的，我没有合适的原料。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaSaveBradleyNVM
Oh, fuck...
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢我操...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, this isn't going to work. We'll have to do this their way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，行不通。我们还是得照他们说的做。

ESP.ORIGINAL: aaGutsGoodbye
DocFridayQuestionsBye
So long.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没什么问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DocFridayQuestionsSomethingElse
What else would you like to speak about?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你还想说些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough questions, lets talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 问的够多了，我们聊点别的吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: DocFridayCaravan1
Let's play.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们玩玩看。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Friday [0800159B] (mod) Quest : ([080A3EF7]aaDocFridayQuest) Doc Friday Companion Quest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Vickers about his addiction.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟维克斯谈谈他的毒瘾。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enter Cholla Caverns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 进入仙人掌洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Hendershot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找亨德肖特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ask Hendershot about Glanton's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向亨德肖特询问格兰顿的下落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Kill Hendershot.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）杀了亨德肖特。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Activate Cholla Mountain's defense systems.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）激活仙人掌山脉防御系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Defend Cholla Mountain from the Tunnelers.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）在挖掘者的攻击中保卫仙人掌山脉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Finley about Glanton's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟芬利谈谈格兰顿的下落。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Kill the Tunneler Queen.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）杀了挖掘者女王。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search Hendershot's corpse for information regarding Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在亨德肖特的尸体上寻找有关格兰顿的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Hendershot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与亨德肖特对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Hendershot.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与亨德肖特对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate Spears Cavern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查长矛洞穴。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Deal with Solomon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对付所罗门

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with O'Doyle about the contract with Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与奥多伊尔谈谈格兰顿的契约。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Check the road south of Primm for signs of Glanton's gang.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去普里姆以南的路上找找格兰顿团伙的踪迹。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Determine where Glanton and his gang fled.
ESP.TRADUIT: 确定格兰顿和他的团伙逃到哪里去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Glanton's trail through the Ivanpah Colony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 沿着格兰顿的踪迹穿过伊凡帕殖民地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Escape from the colony.
ESP.TRADUIT: 逃离殖民地。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Search the duffel bag for information on Glanton's whereabouts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在行李袋里搜索有关格兰顿下落的信息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Travel to Caruthers Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前往卡拉瑟斯峡谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找格兰顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Kill Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）杀了格兰顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Speak with Mayor Brandon about Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）与布兰登市长谈谈格兰顿的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Tell Glanton you'll assist him with his mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）告诉格兰顿你会协助他完成任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Speak with the Sand Wolves chieftain about signing a peace treaty.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）与沙狼酋长谈谈签署和平条约的事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Convince Glanton to abandon his mission.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）说服格兰顿放弃他的任务。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Convince Glanton to surrender.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）说服格兰顿投降。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Sheriff Richardson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与理查德森治安官对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Mayor Brandon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟布兰登市长谈谈。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform the mayor that you will help defend the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知市长，你会帮助保卫这座城镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform the mayor when you're ready to defend the town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当你准备好保卫城镇时，通知市长。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Convince citizens of Silverwood to assist with its defense.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）说服银木镇的居民协助防御。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 寻找格兰顿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Flee Caruthers Canyon.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）逃离卡拉瑟斯峡谷。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defend Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保卫银木镇。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen to the Courier's report.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听听邮差的报告。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Face the Legion commander.
ESP.TRADUIT: 面对军团指挥官。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Retrieve weapons and armor from the miltia stores.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）从民兵商店取回武器和盔甲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Mayor Brandon that the town is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知布兰登市长小镇安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Assist Glanton in exterminating the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）协助格兰顿消灭沙狼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Stop Glanton from exterminating the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）阻止格兰顿消灭沙狼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: View the aftermath of Glanton's attack on the Sand Wolves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看格兰顿袭击沙狼的后果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform Barking Tree that the tribe is safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通知咆哮之树，部落安全了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Glanton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与格兰顿对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: View the aftermath of the Legion's attack on Silverwood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看军团攻击银木镇的后果。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Return to the Mojave Wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 返回莫哈维废土。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speak with Handley.
ESP.TRADUIT: 与汉德利对话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Investigate the Lopez's shack.
ESP.TRADUIT: 调查洛佩兹的小屋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Report the fate of the Lopez family to Sheriff Richardson.
ESP.TRADUIT: 向理查德森治安官报告洛佩兹一家的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Inform the Mayor of the Sand Wolves' fate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉市长沙狼的命运。

ESP.ORIGINAL: (Optional) Wait for Hendershot to investigate the security breach.
ESP.TRADUIT: （可选）等亨德肖特来调查安全漏洞。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Head That Wears a Crown
ESP.TRADUIT: 皇冠之颅

ESP.ORIGINAL: Russell's Perk
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔的Perk

ESP.ORIGINAL: This perk contains a collection of buffs for Russell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个Perk包含了拉塞尔的所有Buff

ESP.ORIGINAL: Swift Strike
ESP.TRADUIT: 静谧速度

ESP.ORIGINAL: One of Russell's most valuable skills is his ability to always be quick on his feet. While Russell is a companion, you move 10% faster while sneaking or aiming. In addition to this, you will also deliver 15% additional damage with all rifles, Russell's weapons of choice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当拉塞尔是同伴时，你在潜行时的移动速度会提高10%，并且使用步枪能造成额外伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Last Stand
ESP.TRADUIT: 子弹上膛

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Bradley as your companion, your chance to land a critical hit increases by 10% for every 10% you are below your maximum health.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当布拉德利作为你的同伴时，你的生命值每降低10%，暴击几率就增加10%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Your Nose
ESP.TRADUIT: 紧跟嗅觉

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Cooper at your side, you'll smell enemies coming from miles off! While Cooper is your companion, you can detect enemies on your compass from 10% further away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 库珀是同伴时，玩家可以探测到更大范围内的敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Faithful Companion
ESP.TRADUIT: 忠实的伙伴

ESP.ORIGINAL: With Guts by your side, you can detect threats from 5% further away and can run 5% faster. What a good boy!
ESP.TRADUIT: 有了古茨在你身边，你对于危险的检测范围扩大了5%，移动速度增加了5%。真是个好孩子!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Champ
I am the greatest! As the reigning champion, you deal 15% additional Unarmed damage.
Bloodshot
ESP.TRADUIT: 充血

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc Friday has mastered the arts of both healing and killing. With Doc Friday as your companion, your health will be restored by 5% for every kill you make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 星期五医生精通治疗和杀戮的艺术。当星期五医生作为你的同伴时，你每击杀一名敌人，生命值就恢复5%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Luck Beats Skill
ESP.TRADUIT: 运比技强

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ford must have been blessed with a great amount of luck to have survived, and thrived, in the Bounty Hunting world. While Ford is a companion, your Luck is increased by 1 and your chance to land critical hits and the damage they deal are both increased by 10%.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当福特是同伴时，你将从运气的增加中受益。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Scarred
ESP.TRADUIT: 历战勇猛

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a result of your scars inflicted by Marko, your rate of fire with Guns is decreased by 10% and your gun draw speed will also be decreased by 25%, however you will also now deal 10% more damage with all types of Guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于你在与马尔科的对决中获得的伤痕，你的射速和拔枪速度会受到影响，但死斗的经验让你能相对的造成更大的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Avenged
ESP.TRADUIT: 温柔的雪耻

ESP.ORIGINAL: You used Sweet Revenge to finally put an end to Marko's evil, avenging Randall, his family, and so many others. Sweet Revenge now deals 25% additional damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 甜蜜的复仇（兰道尔的.44马格南左轮）现在会造成额外的伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Having avenged Randall, you will now deal 25% additional damage with Sweet Revenge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为兰道尔报仇后，你现在使用甜蜜的复仇（兰道尔的.44马格南左轮）可以造成额外伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Avenged
ESP.TRADUIT: 温柔的雪耻

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Russell's Swift Strike perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你失去了拉塞尔的静谧速度技能。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Russell has gained the Desert Ranger Combat Armor, fitted with extra armor and storage designed to help a ranger in front-line combat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉塞尔现在装备了沙漠游骑兵战斗装甲，配备了额外的护甲和存储设计，旨在帮助前线战斗的游骑兵。这不会影响他的负载能力。
